1a1(mdo sde): @#/ /mdo nga pa bzhugs so//
1b1(mdo sde): @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ku sha la mU la saM pa ri d+ha ra nA ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod
1b2(mdo sde): skad du/ 'phags pa dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ /bam
1b3(mdo sde): po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad
1b4(mdo sde): bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka
2a1(mdo sde): lan+ta ka gnas pa na 'di lta ste/ bsam gtan pa rnams kyi gnas/ gnas med pa rnams
2a2(mdo sde): kyi gnas/ stong pa nyid la gnas pa rnams kyi gnas/ mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa dang / smon pa med pa la
2a3(mdo sde): gnas pa rnams kyi gnas na 'di lta ste/ dge slong 'bum gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs
2a4(mdo sde): te| thams cad kyang sgra bskyungs pa/ dben pa la gnas pa/ nang du yang dag 'jog la mngon par brtson pa sha stag
2a5(mdo sde): go / de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu nang du yang dag 'jog las langs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste
2b1(mdo sde): phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go / tshe dang ldan pa maud+gal gyi bu chen po dang / tshe dang
2b2(mdo sde): ldan pa kA t+yA'i bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa ka pi na dang / tshe dang ldan pa skul byed chen po dang / tshe
2b3(mdo sde): dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang / tshe dang ldan pa don yod rgyal po dang / tshe dang ldan pa rlangs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun
2b4(mdo sde): dga' bo dang / tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed dang / tshe dang ldan pa ci 'jigs dang / tshe dang ldan pa nyer sbas dang / tshe dang ldan pa mis byin gyi bu dang /
2b5(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa thang la gnas pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo ki la dang / tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor dang / de dag dang / gzhan yang dbang dang ldan par
2b6(mdo sde): g yur pa lnga brgya tham pa phyem red kyi dus kyi tshe nang du yang dag 'jog las langs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan
3a1(mdo sde): 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /yang de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa grags sbyin dang /
3a2(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong dang / tshe dang ldan pa las mchod dang / tshe dang ldan pa grags 'dod dang / tshe dang ldan pa dga' sde dang / tshe dang
3a3(mdo sde): ldan pa dga' 'dod dang / de dag dang / gzhan yang dge slong lnga brgya tham pa lam du zhugs pa las dbyar mnyan yod na gnas nas/ rgyal
3a4(mdo sde): po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan+ta ka gnas pa ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi
3a5(mdo sde): zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma pham pa/
3a6(mdo sde): de dang 'dra ba'i byang chub sems dpa' stong dang lhan cig tu yul tsam par dbyar gnas nas lam du zhugs te rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal
3b1(mdo sde): bya ka lan+ta ka gnas pa ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /yang
3b2(mdo sde): de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzang skyong dang / dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang / ded dpon bzang po dang / phug sbas dang / mis byin dang / dbang pos byin dang / chu
3b3(mdo sde): lha dang / tshangs lha dang / stobs bzang dang / bla ma'i blo gros dang / khyad par blo gros dang / 'phel ba'i blo gros dang / mthong ba don yod dang / legs par yang dag zhugs dang / rab kyi
3b4(mdo sde): rtsal gyis rnam par gnon dang / rtag tu brtson dang / brtson pa mi gtong dang / nyi ma'i snying po dang / 'gro ba 'dzin dang / sa 'dzin dang / bdud rtsi 'dzin dang / blo gros rab gnas dang /
3b5(mdo sde): blo gros mtha' yas dang / brtan pa'i blo gros dang / 'jig rten gsum rnam par gnon dang / mtha' yas rnam par gnon dang / dpag med rnam par gnon dang / rdo
3b6(mdo sde): rje'i gom pas rnam par gnon dang / don yod pa'i gom pas rnam par gnon dang / mi g.yo ba'i gom pas rnam par gnon dang / spobs pa chen po dang / spobs pa rnon po dang / spobs
3b7(mdo sde): pa zab ba dang / spobs pa mtha' yas dang / spobs pa dpag med dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / pad+ma dpal gyi snying po dang / chos 'phags dang / lag na rin
4a1(mdo sde): chen dang / rin chen 'dzin dang / bskal pa 'gyur ba mtha' yas par go cha bgos pa dang / bud med 'gyur ba'i go cha bgos pa dang / skyes pa
4a2(mdo sde): 'gyur ba'i go cha bgos pa dang / sems can 'gyur ba'i go cha bgos pa dang / mtha' yas khyu mchog dang / dpag med khyu mchog dang / dmigs pa thams cad rnam
4a3(mdo sde): par 'jig pa'i khyu mchog dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad kyang tha mi dad par spyod pa'i go cha bgos pa sha stag ste/ yul tha dad pa
4a4(mdo sde): rnams su dbyar gnas par gnas nas yul rgyu zhing gcig tu 'dus te/ rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan+ta ka gnas pa ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba
4a5(mdo sde): der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'
4a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po de dag 'dus par thugs su chud nas/ rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad pas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po 'od ma'i
4a7(mdo sde): tshal bya ka lan+ta ka gnas pa na dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma ji snyed gnas pa de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / phyag
4b1(mdo sde): 'tshal ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan+ta ka gnas pa ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
4b2(mdo sde): mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad do/ /de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po lus
4b3(mdo sde): 'phags ri'i dbang po'i brag phug na dge slong lnga brgya tham pa thams cad kyang dgon pa pa/ bsod snyoms pa/ phyag dar khrod pa/ chos gos gsum pa/ tsog pu pa/ rtswa'i
4b4(mdo sde): gding ba pa/ shing drung pa/ 'dod pa chung ba/ chog shes pa/ rab tu dben pa pa/ chos gos ngan pa 'chang ba sha stag dang lhan cig tu 'dug go /de nas bcom ldan 'das
4b5(mdo sde): kyi rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad pas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dge slong lnga brgya tham pa de dag dang lhan cig tu lus 'phags ri'i dbang po'i
4b6(mdo sde): brag phug nas mi snang bar gyur te rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan+ta ka gnas pa na 'dug pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad de/ bcom ldan
4b7(mdo sde): 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po rgyang ring po nyid nas 'ong ba gzigs te/ gzigs nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /
5a1(mdo sde): gnas brtan 'od srung chen po 'ong ba 'di ni/ dgon pa pa/ bsod snyoms pa/ phyag dar khrod pa/ chos gos gsum pa/ chos gos ngan pa 'chang ba/ bas
5a2(mdo sde): mtha'i gnas mal la gnas pa/ 'dod pa chung ba/ chog shes pa/ rab tu dben par gnas pa/ ma 'dres pa/ chos thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa ste/ dge slong dag /
5a3(mdo sde): nga'i nyan thos ji snyed pa ni/ dge slong dag /da ltar dge slong 'od srung chen po'i sbyangs pa'i yon tan dag dang mtshungs pa'am 'dra ba ni/ ngas yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo / /
5a4(mdo sde): dge slong dag /dge slong 'od srung chos gos gsum pa ni/ lha rnams dang yang smra ba dang / kun tu smra bar mi 'dod na/ mi rnams dang lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de nas bcom ldan
5a5(mdo sde): 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po rgyang ring po nyid nas 'ong ba gzigs nas bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung tshur shog /'od srung / khyod legs par 'ongs so/ /kye ma gnas
5a6(mdo sde): brtan 'od srung gis ni/ 'di lta ste/ 'dir 'ong bar bya ba'i phyir yun ring po nas rnam grangs byas so/ 'od srung / khyod gdan 'di'i phyed la 'dug cig /ces bcom ldan 'das kyis
5a7(mdo sde): gnas brtan 'od srung la gdan gyi phyed gnang ma thag tu de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan de las bskyod pa dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'gul/ rab
5b1(mdo sde): tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul/ g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ ldeg rab tu ldeg /kun tu rab tu ldeg cing / 'jig rten du snang ba chen po 'ang byung bar gyur to/ /stong
5b2(mdo sde): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ni/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ yul ma ga d+ha'i khar ba'i snod la lcags kyi thu lum gyis bsnun na 'ur 'ur ba zer ba de bzhin du btsun pa 'od
5b3(mdo sde): srung chen po la gdan gyi phyed gnang ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdan las bskyod nas/ de nas de ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong
5b4(mdo sde): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di sgra skad chen po 'byin to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po chos gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha sa la btsugs te/ bcom
5b5(mdo sde): ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du phyin te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos gtugs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
5b6(mdo sde): gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ni/ bdag gi ston pa lags la/ bdag ni/ nyan thos lags pas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
5b7(mdo sde): rgyas kyi chos gos sam/ lhung bzed dam/ gdan nam/ de las gzhan pa'i longs spyod rnams nyan thos rnams kyis longs spyod par rdo mi thogs lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/
6a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das/ de dag ni/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mchod rten du gyur pa lags shing / bcom ldan 'das/ bcom
6a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das las sha na'i ras phyag dar khrod pa gang dag blangs pa de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das/ mchod rten du gyur pa lags pa'i slad du ste/ de dag bdag gis ma spyad lags so//
6a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das/ de slan chad 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par brtags pa'am/ gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par
6a4(mdo sde): brtags pa'am/ 'dod chags kyi yongs su gdung pas gdungs par gyur pa'am/ zhe sdang gi yongs su gdung ba dang / gti mug gi yongs su gdung bas yongs su gdungs par
6a5(mdo sde): gyur par ma dran lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ mdor na slob par gyur pa bdag gis bcom ldan 'das las sha na'i ras phyag dar khrod mnos pa rnams mi slob pa'i sa la thug
6a6(mdo sde): gi bar du spyi bos mnos lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis longs spyad pa'i slad du blangs pa ni/ ma lags kyi/ gdams pa dang / rjes su bstan pa las brtsams nas
6a7(mdo sde): blangs lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de dag blangs nas sems mtho ba'am dma' bar gyur par mi dran lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sha na'i ras phyag dar khrod de dag chos
6b1(mdo sde): gos ma mchis pa'i lus la sbyar bar mi dran lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ phyag dar khrod de dag sug pa ma red pas reg par mi dran lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang dang gang du mchi
6b2(mdo sde): ba de dang der sha na'i ras phyag dar khrod de dag mgos 'tshal cing mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sha na'i ras phyag dar khrod de dag yan lag mi gtsang ba gang gis kyang reg par mi
6b3(mdo sde): dran lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sha na'i ras phyag dar khrod mchod rten du gyur pa de dag bcangs lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de dag ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis spangs shing
6b4(mdo sde): gnang ba lags te/ de dag ni/ bdag gis bcangs lags so/ /sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa ma lags par de las gzhan snyoms par 'jug pa dag gis bdag gzhan du gnas par
6b5(mdo sde): mi dran lags so/ /bdag ji ltar gnas pa na sa la sa'i 'du shes su ma gyur pa dang / chu la chu'i 'du shes dang / me la me'i 'du shes dang / rlung la rlung gi 'du shes su ma gyur pa dang /
6b6(mdo sde): 'jig rten 'di'i 'du shes dang / 'jig rten pha rol gyi 'du shes su ma gyur pa dang / bcom ldan 'das/ gang mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / bye brag phyed pa dang / rnam par shes pa dang /
6b7(mdo sde): yid kyi rjes su brtags pa dang / rjes su bsam pa de la'ang bdag 'du shes su ma gyur pa dang / bcom ldan 'das/ gang 'du shes med pa'i gnas pa dang / 'du shes med pa'i snyoms
7a1(mdo sde): par 'jug pa'i gnas pa dang / gang 'du shes las yang dag par 'da' ba'i gnas pa dang / gang 'du shes med pa las yang dag par 'da' ba'i gnas
7a2(mdo sde): pa dang / gang 'du shes kyi gnas pa dang / gang 'du shes med pa'i gnas pa dang / gang 'du shes thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba'i gnas pa de'ang slob pa'i gnas pa
7a3(mdo sde): dang / mi slob pa'i gnas par bdag gis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gnas pa de la de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rjes su ma
7a4(mdo sde): mthong / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong lags te/ bdag ni/ de ltar gnas lags so/ /bcom
7a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das/ dper bgyi na/ nam mkha' bla gab ma mchis pa la ming dang / brda dang / gdags pa rnam pa sna tshogs bgyis pa dag /bcom ldan 'das/ ming dang / brda dang /
7a6(mdo sde): gdags pa gang dag gis nam mkha' zhes tha snyad du btags pa dang / nam mkha' zhes brdar btags pa dang / nam mkha' zhes rten du bgyis pa dang / bcom ldan 'das/ nam
7a7(mdo sde): mkha' zhe'am/ bla gab ma mchis pa zhe'am/ stong pa zhe'am/ gsog ce'am/ gsob ce'am/ ya ma brla zhe'am/ gzung ba ma mchis pa zhe'am/ tshad ma mchis pa zhe'am/
7b1(mdo sde): rten pa ma mchis pa zhe'am/ blang pa ma mchis pa zhe'am/ dor ba ma mchis pa zhe'am/ lus ma mchis pa zhe'am/ ji lta ba bzhin zhe'am/ yongs su dag pa zhe'am/ bar snang zhe'am/
7b2(mdo sde): thogs pa ma mchis pa zhe'am/ dngos po ma mchis pa zhe'am/ bstan du ma mchis pa zhes de dag dang / gzhan yang tha snyad kyi brda tha dad pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brjod pa ni/ bcom
7b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ tshad 'di tsam mam/ yongs su bcad pa 'di tsam mam/ mnyam pa'am/ mi mnyam pa zhes ming ngam/ brda'am/ rten rnams kyis 'tshal bar mi nus
7b4(mdo sde): lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang dag de'i phyogs tsam zhig 'tshal ba de dag thams cad kyis kyang kha dog gam/ dbyibs sam/ dmigs pas nam mkha' de tshad 'di tsam dang /
7b5(mdo sde): mchog 'di tsam zhes bgyi ba ma 'tshal lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du gang de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bgyi'am/ sangs rgyas zhes bgyi ba'am/ ston pa zhe'am/ skyabs
7b6(mdo sde): she'am| dpung gnyen zhe'am/ gnas she'am/ 'dren pa zhe'am/ rnam par 'dren pa zhe'am/ yongs su 'dren pa zhe'am/ sman pa zhe'am/ gso ba zhe'am/ lam ston pa zhe'am/
7b7(mdo sde): lam brjod pa zhe'am/ gzhan yang tha snyad tha dad pa'i tshig rnam pa sna tshogs brjod pa'i tha snyad kyi tshig gang dag gis mkhas pa rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das bstod pa dang / bkur
8a1(mdo sde): ba dang / bsngags pa dang / rab tu bstod pa dang / rab tu bsngags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das/ tha snyad kyi tshig gang dag gis 'jig rten mngon par
8a2(mdo sde): brjod pa'i chos de dag ni/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ma 'tshal/ mi rten/ ma mthong lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos thams cad ni/ ngo bo nyid kyis
8a3(mdo sde): ya ma brla dang / ngo bo nyid kyis gsob lags pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dper bgyi na/ sgyu ma mkhan gyis rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba/ dpung
8a4(mdo sde): gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang ldan pa/ rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa'i 'khor los bsgyur ba zhig sprul par gyur la/ bcom ldan 'das/ de'i thad du gling bzhi pa'i 'jig
8a5(mdo sde): rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnam par rgyal bar bgyi pa la gnas pa mtha' yas pa de dag thams cad lhags shing / bcom ldan 'das/ de la lus tha dad
8a6(mdo sde): par yang gda' la/ bcom ldan 'das/ de la sems can lus tha dad par yang mthong lags mod kyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ sgyu ma mkhan gyis sprul pa'i 'khor los bsgyur
8a7(mdo sde): ba'i rgyal po de 'di snyam du bdag gis ni/ dpung gi tshogs 'di'i bdag po bya zhing / gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rjes su 'jug par bya'o/ /snyam du mi sems lags
8b1(mdo sde): la| dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi po de'ang 'di snyam du 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po 'di ni/ bdag cag gi gtso bo yin pas bdag cag ni/ 'di'i rjes su 'jug par bya'o/ /snyam du
8b2(mdo sde): mi sems lags mod kyi/ de dag de'i rjes su 'jug par bgyid par yang gda' lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du chos de dag gi chos nyid gang lags pa de la/ bcom
8b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa'am/ nyan thos sam/ slob pa'am/ mi slob pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas sam/ so so'i skye bo ma mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos
8b4(mdo sde): nyid de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid dmigs pa'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid mngon pa'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid rten pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
8b5(mdo sde): chos nyid dmigs pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos nyid mngon pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos nyid rten pa'am/ nyan thos kyi chos nyid dmigs pa'am/ nyan thos kyi chos nyid mngon
8b6(mdo sde): pa'am| nyan thos kyi chos nyid rten pa'am/ so so'i skye bo'i chos nyid dmigs pa'am/ so so'i skye bo'i chos nyid mngon pa'am/ so so'i skye bo'i chos nyid rten pa'am/ gzugs kyi
8b7(mdo sde): chos nyid dmigs pa'am/ gzugs kyi chos nyid mngon pa'am/ gzugs kyi chos nyid rten pa'am/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i
9a1(mdo sde): chos nyid dmigs pa'am/ rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid mngon pa'am/ rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid rten par mi 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan
9a2(mdo sde): 'das| chos nyid de la gzugs stong pa dang / 'dis gzugs stong ba dang / 'di la gzugs stong pa dmigs pa dang / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam
9a3(mdo sde): par shes pa stong pa dang / 'dis rnam par shes pa stong pa dang / 'di la rnam par shes pa stong pa dmigs pa dang / de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa stong pa dang / 'dis de bzhin
9a4(mdo sde): gshegs pa stong pa dang / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa stong pa dmigs pa dang / de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid stong pa dang / 'dis de bzhin
9a5(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i chos nyid stong pa dang / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid stong pa dmigs par mi 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du de la nyan thos ma
9a6(mdo sde): mchis| nyan thos kyi chos nyid ma mchis/ so so'i skye bo ma mchis/ so so'i skye bo'i chos nyid kyi bar du ma mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dper bgyi na/ sgyu ma mkhan
9a7(mdo sde): gyis 'khor los bsgyur ba'am/ dpung gi tshogs sprul ba de la 'khor los bsgyur ba ma mchis/ dpung gi tshogs ma mchis lags so/ /sgyu ma la ma mchis/ sgyu ma'i chos nyid
9b1(mdo sde): la ma mchis/ sgyu ma mkhan rnams la ma mchis lags so/ /sa la ma mchis/ chu la ma mchis/ me la ma mchis/ rlung la ma mchis/ nam mkha' la ma mchis/ rnam par shes
9b2(mdo sde): pa la ma mchis lags so/ /sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / nam mkha'i khams rnams la ma mchis/ rnam par shes pa'i khams la ma mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan
9b3(mdo sde): 'das| chos thams cad ni/ de dang 'dra lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ de dag la/ bdag ni/ rlom sems su mi bgyid/ de dag la bdag ni/ byung bar ma gyur/ de dag bdag
9b4(mdo sde): gis ni| ma smras lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar bdag ni/ yon tan gyi chos rnams nyid las dben pa lags pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos rnams rjes su dran
9b5(mdo sde): par bgyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ lam lags/ de ni/ tshul lags te/ lam de la gnas pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo lam de rjes su thob pa rnams ni/
9b6(mdo sde): 'di snyam du gzhan yang dag par blangs la 'jug par bya zhing / ston pa'ang gzhan btsal bar bya la/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze gzhan smra ba'i gdong du gyen du blta bar bya zhing / tshe
9b7(mdo sde): dang ldan pa 'di ni/ shes bzhin pas shes/ mthong bzhin pas mthong / yang dag pa'i lta ba'ang 'dogs bzhin pas 'dogs par byed do/ /snyam du mi sems lags te/ de
10a1(mdo sde): ni| gnas ma mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gnas pa 'di la ni/ bdag som nyi ma mchis pa thob pas gnas lags so/ /chos kyi sgo de'ang
10a2(mdo sde): rjes su thob pas gnas lags so/ /chos thams cad ni/ 'di lta ste/ dben pa'i tshul dang / skye ba ma mchis pa'i tshul dag gis tshul gcig pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/
10a3(mdo sde): bdag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la chos kyi the tshom zhu bar 'tshal ba lags la/ de bzhin gshegs pas kyang bdag la
10a4(mdo sde): skabs phye ba lags te/ dbang po'i brag phug nas 'od ma'i tshal 'dir phyin pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag 'dir mchis pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan
10a5(mdo sde): gyi phyed gnang ste/ bdag la gnang ba na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rab tu 'ur 'ur zhing rnam pa drug tu yang g.yos/ rab tu g.yos lags so/ /
10a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni/ 'di snyam du de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ bdag nyid chen po'i chos dang ldan pa de lta bu dang / rgya chen po'i chos dang ldan pa de lta bu dang / slob
10a7(mdo sde): dpon ma mchis shing rang byung ba lags kyang thugs rje chen po'i tshul la bzhugs shing / lhag pa'i nga rgyal ma mchis pa dang / nga rgyal ma mchis pa la bzhugs nas bdag
10b1(mdo sde): la gdan gyi phyed gnang ba ngo mtshar lags so/ /snyam bgyid de/ bcom ldan 'das/ dper bgyi na/ mi dbul po 'tsho ba ngan pa tshegs kyis 'tsho ba zhig tshegs kyis khyim gyi
10b2(mdo sde): phun sum tshogs pa bsgrubs nas/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang ldan pa'i gan du blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen
10b3(mdo sde): bkur bgyi ba dang / dri bar bgyi ba'i slad du mchis par gyur la/ mchis pa de la des stan gyi phyed stsal na/ de nas de 'di snyam du sems lags te/ rgyal po la blta ba dang /
10b4(mdo sde): phyag bya ba'i phyir bdag song du zin kyang bdag gis blta ba dang / phyag bya ba'ang dka' bar 'gyur na/ gsol ba lta ci smos/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur bas bdag
10b5(mdo sde): phyin ma thag pa la stan gyi phyed byin du zin kyang 'di ni/ ngo mtshar ro/ /snyam bgyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du chos kyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
10b6(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni/ rang byung ba/ slob dpon ma mchis pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang bsnyen par dka' zhing rtogs par dka' ba lags
10b7(mdo sde): na| lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
11a1(mdo sde): rgyas la chos kyi the tshom zhu ba dang / blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du bdag ji lta ji ltar mchis pa na/ bcom ldan 'das/
11a2(mdo sde): bdag 'di snyam du sems lags te/ bdag gis ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa blta ba rnyed cing phyag bgyi ba rnyed la/ bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / zhu ba dang / yongs su zhu
11a3(mdo sde): bar bgyi ba rnyed de/ bcom ldan 'das kyis da ltar bdag 'dir mchis pa la gdan gyi phyed gnang ba ni/ bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/ /snyam bgyid lags so/ /bcom
11a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ mi dbul po des 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po de la blta ba nyid dang / phyag bgyi ba nyid kyang ngo mtshar lags pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das/
11a5(mdo sde): bdag ni/ 'di snyam du sems te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ byams pa chen po dang ldan zhing / thugs rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dang
11a6(mdo sde): ldan pa lags kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gang dag lags pa de dag ston pa ma gtogs par de bzhin gshegs pa 'di snyam du bdag ni/ phul dang / bdag
11a7(mdo sde): ni| mchog dang / bdag ni/ khyad par du 'phags pa'o/ /snyam du mi dgongs pa ni/ ngo mtshar lags te/ bdag ni/ 'di snyam du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
11b1(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yon tan de dag ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma lags so/ /snyam bgyid lags so/ /de skad ces gsol
11b2(mdo sde): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung / legs so/ /legs so/ /'od srung / khyod yang legs so/ /'od srung / de bzhin
11b3(mdo sde): gshegs pa ni/ dpag tu med cing / dpag tu med pa'i chos dang ldan te/ de ni/ sbyin pa'i tshad de lta bu dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad de lta bu dang / shes rab
11b4(mdo sde): kyi bar gyi tshad de lta bu dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad de lta bu dang / smon lam rnams kyi tshad de lta bu dang / smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad de lta bu dang / thabs
11b5(mdo sde): kyi tshad de lta bu dang / thabs la mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad de lta bu dang / spyod pa'i tshad de lta bu dang / spyod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad de lta bu dang / rnam par grol ba'i
11b6(mdo sde): tshad de lta bu dang / rnam par grol ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad de lta bu dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i tshad de lta bu dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i pha
11b7(mdo sde): rol tu phyin pa'i tshad de lta bus dpag par mi nus so/ /'od srung / bzhi po 'di dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi mnyam pa'i ye shes rnams yin te/ de dag dang ldan na/ de bzhin
12a1(mdo sde): gshegs pa 'khor gyi nang du seng+ge'i sgra sgrog par byed pa'o/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ tshul khrims mnyam pa nyid dang / ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid dang /
12a2(mdo sde): shes rab mnyam pa nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos mnyam pa nyid de/ 'od srung / mnyam pa'i ye shes bzhi po de dag ni/ gang dag dang ldan na de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor
12a3(mdo sde): gyi nang na bzhugs shing seng+ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrog par byed pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /sangs rgyas 'jig
12a4(mdo sde): rten bsam yas na/ /sangs rgyas ye shes mtha' yas te/ /sems kyi las ni sbyangs pas na/ /de dag seng+ge'i sgra sgrog byed/ /seng+ge'i sgra sgrog byed pa ni/ /mu stegs gzhan
12a5(mdo sde): rnams skrag par 'gyur/ /chos kyi chos nyid thos nas su/ /g.yang sar rab tu ltung bar 'gyur/ /bdag tu 'du shes gang gnas dang / /sems can 'du shes gang gnas pa/ /
12a6(mdo sde): 'od srung de dag bstan 'di la/ /mu stegs can zhes ngas bshad do/ /dngos po'i 'du shes gang gnas dang / /nga yi nga zhes rten pa rnams/ /'od srung de dag bstan 'di la/ /mu
12a7(mdo sde): stegs can zhes ngas bshad do/ /gang dag tshul khrims phung po dang / /bsam gtan rnams dang thos mang gis/ /rlom sems rnam rmongs de dag ni/ /'od srung mu stegs
12b1(mdo sde): can rnams so/ /bdag ni chog shes 'dod chung dang / /rab tu dben la gnas pa dang / /chos gos ngan pa 'chang snyam pa/ /'od srung de ni mu stegs so/ /dper na nam mkha' 'di la ni/ /
12b2(mdo sde): lag pa bskyod kyang thogs med cing / /dper na mkha' la rdul gyis kyang / /nam yang gos par mi 'gyur ba/ /de bzhin 'od srung ngas bstan pa'i/ /chos 'dir gang dag gnas de dag /
12b3(mdo sde): nyon mongs rnams kyis mi gos te/ /mkha' la rdul dang sprin bzhin no/ /ji ltar mkha' la mi yis me tog spos rnams dang / /de bzhin phreng ba byug pa rnams kyis 'dir mchod
12b4(mdo sde): kyang / /bdag mchod la la skye 'gyur 'jig par 'gyur ro zhes/ /de la blo gros kyang ni 'byung bar mi 'gyur dang / /ji ltar nam mkha' de la gos par mi 'gyur dang / /ji ltar de yi
12b5(mdo sde): rang bzhin gos par mi 'gyur dang / /ji ltar de yi rang bzhin ngo bo nyid kyis gsob/ /de bzhin dge sbyong dag la stong pa'i chos rnams so/ /ji ltar gang gis nam mkha' bsdigs
12b6(mdo sde): pa dang / /ji ltar nam du yang ni gshe bar mi 'gyur ba/ /de bzhin dge sbyong dag la chos rnams gang dag yin/ /de dag nam mkha' bzhin du gos pa med chos rnams/ /chos
12b7(mdo sde): 'dir dge sbyong gang dag legs par bslab rnams dang / /gzhan dag slob pa rnams dang slob par 'gyur ba rnams/ /'di la nam du'ang gang dag 'chags par mi 'gyur ba/ /nga
13a1(mdo sde): yis de dag dge sbyong legs bslab rnams su bstan/ /ji ltar mkha' la nam yang lag pa mi thogs dang / /rdul dang du ba rnams kyis gos par mi
13a2(mdo sde): 'gyur dang / /ji ltar lam ni nam yang byed par mi 'gyur ba/ /chos la de bzhin mos pa rnams ni dge sbyong yin/ /ji ltar sprin dang bral bar gyur ba'i nam mkha' la/ /zla ba thogs
13a3(mdo sde): pa med par mkha' la 'gro byed kyang / /bdag gis bar snang la ni snang bar bya snyam du/ /de la rnam rtog de ni 'byung bar mi 'gyur bzhin/ /rgod med bdag nyid dge slong zla ba lta
13a4(mdo sde): bu yis| |sbyin pa'i bdag po'i khyim rnams su ni 'gro bar bya/ /rgod med nga rgyal rnam grol sems dang ldan pa dang / /'jig rten chos rnams kyis ni ma gos sems ldan bya/ /
13a5(mdo sde): khyim rnams la ni nga rgyal spangs nas bsten par bya/ /der phyin nas kyang chos nyid rab tu brjod par bya/ /bde dang rnyed pa'i phyir ni 'dod pa'ang spangs nas su/ /'jig rten rnam
13a6(mdo sde): dag tshul khrims can du gnas par bya/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung longs shig /longs la rang gi stan la
13a7(mdo sde): 'dug cig / 'od srung / khyod la chos kyi the tshom ji snyed yod pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pa la dris shig dang / 'od srung / ngas dris pa lan btab pas khyod kyi sems rangs
13b1(mdo sde): par bya'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po sa'i steng de nas langs te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /de nas bcom ldan
13b2(mdo sde): 'das kyis yang rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad pas dzam+bu'i gling 'di na dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma ji snyed gnas pa
13b3(mdo sde): de dag thams cad rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan+ta ka gnas pa ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos
13b4(mdo sde): phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang /
13b5(mdo sde): nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang dag yin pa de dag kyang 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan+ta ka gnas par zhugs te/ de dag zhugs nas mtha' yas shing dpag tu
13b6(mdo sde): med par shes par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par
13b7(mdo sde): 'du mdzad pas / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / tshangs pa chen po dang / 'od
14a1(mdo sde): gsal dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / 'og min gyi lha'i bu ji snyed pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mthus rgyal po'i khab
14a2(mdo sde): 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan+ta ka gnas pa ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu
14a3(mdo sde): 'khod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang
14a4(mdo sde): rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad pas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / ma dros pa dang / snam bu'i dbang phyug dang / gau ta ma dang / dga' bo dang / nye dga' dang /
14a5(mdo sde): gzi can dang / 'jog po dang / rab mdzes dang / e la'i 'dab dang / de dag dang / gzhan yang klu bye ba phrag stong sangs rgyas kyi mthus bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags
14a6(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod cing rgya chen po'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding
14a7(mdo sde): dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma de dag thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan+ta ka
14b1(mdo sde): gnas par zhugs nas gcig la gcig nyam nga ba med pas 'khod par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
14b2(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa maud+gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ maud+gal gyi bu/ khyod longs la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan shoms shig /de bzhin gshegs pa de la bzhugs nas
14b3(mdo sde): the tshom thams cad gcod pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs yang dag par ston par 'gyur/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa sgrub pa'i spyod pa yang dag par ston par 'gyur/ sems
14b4(mdo sde): can thams cad yang dag par tshim pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs yang dag par ston par 'gyur/ sems can thams cad chos la yang dag par gzhol ba'i tshul gyi sgo rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya yang
14b5(mdo sde): dag par ston par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams gyi spyod pa sgrub pa yang dag par ston par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi chos sgrub pa yang dag par ston par
14b6(mdo sde): 'gyur| sems can yongs su smin par bya ba sgrub pa yang dag par ston par 'gyur/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub pa yang dag par ston par 'gyur ba nas shes rab kyi pha
14b7(mdo sde): rol tu phyin pa sgrub pa'i bar du yang dag par ston par 'gyur/ chos thams cad kyi tshul gyi sgo sgrub pa yang dag par ston par 'gyur/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po sgrub pa
15a1(mdo sde): yang dag par ston par 'gyur/ sems can thams cad kyi gnas pa'i spyod pa sgrub pa yang dag par ston par yang 'gyur/ 'khor bzhi yang dag par tshim
15a2(mdo sde): par byed par 'gyur/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i 'khor kyang yang dag par tshim par
15a3(mdo sde): byed par 'gyur/ 'das pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba dang / de bzhin du da ltar dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba
15a4(mdo sde): dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa dang / spyod pa dang / smon lam rnams dang / ye shes kyi phyogs tsam zhig yang dag par ston par 'gyur ro/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud+gal gyi bu
15a5(mdo sde): chen po stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas| bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan 'phang du tshangs pa'i 'jig rten srid cig bshams so/ /steng gi
15a6(mdo sde): bar snang la'ang bcom ldan 'das kyi 'chag sa rin po che sna bdun las byas pa ka tsa linada'i gos ltar reg na bde ba/ srid kyi tshad ni/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams dang ldan pa/ rgyar
15a7(mdo sde): ni| dpag tshad bdun brgya dang ldan pa zhig byas so/ /'chag sa de la'ang rtsig pa rim pa bdun dang / rta babs rim pa bdun dang / stegs bu rim pa bdun dang / dril bu g.yer ka'i
15b1(mdo sde): dra ba rim pa bdun gyis kun nas bskor ba sprul to/ /'chags de'i g.yas g.yon du'ang 'di lta ste/ gser dang / dngul dang / shel dang / bai DUr+ya rin po che sna bzhi'i shing ljon pa dag
15b2(mdo sde): mngon par sprul to/ /gser las byas pa'i shing ljon pa rnams la dngul gyi lo ma dag dang / shel gyi me tog dag dang / bai DUr+ya las byas pa'i 'bras bu dag dang / dngul las byas
15b3(mdo sde): pa'i shing ljon pa rnams la gser gyi lo ma dag dang / bai DUr+ya las byas pa'i me tog dag dang / shel las byas pa'i 'bras bu dag dang / bai DUr+ya las byas pa'i shing ljon pa rnams la
15b4(mdo sde): gser gyi lo ma dag dang / dngul gyi me tog dag dang / shel gyi 'bras bu dag dang / shel las byas pa'i shing ljon pa rnams la gser gyi lo ma dag dang / dngul gyi me tog dag dang /
15b5(mdo sde): bai DUr+ya las byas pa'i 'bras bu dag mngon par sprul to/ /shing ljon pa thams cad kyi bar dag tu'ang yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus bkang ba'i rdzing them skas bzhi dang ldan pa/ them
15b6(mdo sde): skas de dag kyang rin po che sna bzhi gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUr+ya dang / shel las byas pa/ gser gyi bye ma bdal ba/ ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar pos khebs pa/
15b7(mdo sde): steng gi bar snang la'ang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i dra ba'i bla re bres pa zhig mngon par sprul to/ /'chags de'ang dar gyi lda ldi mang pos dpyangs pa/ bdug spos dri zhim pos bdugs
16a1(mdo sde): pa| mi bdun gyi srid tsam du me tog sna tshogs kyis bcal bkram pa zhig mngon par sprul to/ /ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po de dag la'ang
16a2(mdo sde): maud+gal gyi bu dang 'dra ba'i dge slong dag mngon par sprul to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud+gal gyi bu chen pos rdzu 'phrul gyis byas pa'i gdan de lta bu de mngon par sprul te| bcom ldan 'das kyi
16a3(mdo sde): thad du phyin nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis gdan bshams lags na/ de'i dus la dbab par mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol ba
16a4(mdo sde): dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud+gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ maud+gal gyi bu/ khyod kyis gdan bshams zin tam/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis bshams
16a5(mdo sde): lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yul mtha' yas pa la dmigs pa sgrub pa nges par ston pa la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi
16a6(mdo sde): bu| khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i seng+ge'i khri shoms shig / de bzhin gshegs pa de la bzhugs nas sems can thams cad yang dag par tshim par byed pa zhes bya ba'i chos
16a7(mdo sde): kyi rnam grangs yang dag par rab tu ston par 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yul mtha' yas pa la dmigs pa sgrub pa nges par ston pas/ bcom ldan
16b1(mdo sde): 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas gdan bshams so/ /gdan de shom pa na byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed 'dus pa de dag thams cad kyis seng+ge'i gdan der rang rang gis bla gos dag bting ngo / /de
16b2(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ bdag gis ni/ 'di lta ste/ the tshom dang som nyi bsal ba'i phyir rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad pa gang gis byang
16b3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' de dag gi spyad pa sgrub pa dang / 'jug pa sgrub pa dang / smon lam sgrub pa dang / zhing bkod pa sgrub pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba sgrub pa gang dag yin
16b4(mdo sde): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa 'byung ba dang / nyan thos phun sum
16b5(mdo sde): tshogs pa 'byung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' phun sum tshogs pa 'byung ba dang / chos bstan pa phun sum tshogs pa 'byung ba dang / che phun sum tshogs pa dang / mdog phun sum
16b6(mdo sde): tshogs pa dang / gzugs phun sum tshogs pa dang / mtshan phun sum tshogs pa dang / dpe byad phun sum tshogs pa dang / yang dag pa'i sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / dam pa'i
16b7(mdo sde): c hos rab tu rnam par mi 'jig pa phun sum tshogs pa 'byung ba gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad rang rang gi chos gos dag las mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon
17a1(mdo sde): par 'du bya ba des nges par mngon par 'du bya'o/ /snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dran pa dang mkhyen bzhin du gdan de la bzhugs te/ bcom ldan
17a2(mdo sde): 'das gdan de la bzhugs nas kyang yul mtha' yas pa la dmigs pa sgrub pa nges par ston pa zhes bya ba sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /de bzhin gshegs
17a3(mdo sde): pa ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas| de nas de ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis rang rang gi bla gos ji snyed pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan du bting ngo / /de dag gis
17a4(mdo sde): rang rang gi chos gos de dag la bdag nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa nas rab tu rnam par mi 'jig pa phun sum tshogs pa'i bar du'ang mthong ngo / /
17a5(mdo sde): de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag yang dag par tshim zhing yid rangs te/ dga' ba dang / dang ba la gnas nas bcom ldan 'das la sgra skad mthun par tshigs su bcad de bstod pa/
17a6(mdo sde): cho ga spyod pa yon tan gnas gyur pa/ /chos rnams kun la dbang ldan bsnyengs mi mnga'/ /yon tan kun la gnas pas khyod mdzes te/ /rgyal ba dbang ldan ting 'dzin yang dag gnas/ /
17a7(mdo sde): g.yo dang sgyu ni khyod la yongs mi mnga'/ /nga rgyal rgod dang tshul 'chos mi mnga' ste/ /rig dang rnam grol dag gi spyod pa mkhyen/ /ting 'dzin de la gnas pas khyod mdzes so/ /dbang
17b1(mdo sde): ldan bsnyengs bral ting 'dzin gnas nas su/ /rdzu 'phrul mi mtshungs bla na med pa bstan/ /chags med ye shes bstan phyir dbang ldan pa/ /ma 'ongs dus ni khyod kyis deng bstan to/ /mi
17b2(mdo sde): g.yo go 'phang zhi ba thob snyam bgyid/ /de ring byang chub la ni mchis snyam bgyid/ /bdud dpung bcas pa rab tu bcom snyam bgyid/ /de ring rig pa rjes su thob snyam bgyid/ /rgyal bas
17b3(mdo sde): gang gis 'dus byas stong gzigs pa'i/ /bla med mig ni thob par 'gyur snyam bgyid/ /chags med ye shes khyod kyi bka' drin la/ /mig kyang chags pa mchis pa yod ma lags/ /
17b4(mdo sde): rnam par mthong yang ci yang ma mthong zhing / /chos ni gang la'ang zhe 'gras ma mchis te/ /gang la yid ni zhe 'gras ma mchis pa/ /de ni sangs rgyas spyan mchog de lags so/ /ji ltar
17b5(mdo sde): rgyal ba'i sangs rgyas spyan mchog gis/ /khams gsum shes la ma chags 'jug pa bzhin/ /dngos dang dngos med mnyam mtshungs yid dang ldan/ /yang dag brtson zhing rang gi mig
17b6(mdo sde): la gnas/ /gang tshe rgyal ba ting 'dzin der gnas te/ /de ring de dag kun gyis thob snyam bgyid/ /de dag gis ni gzungs sgo de dag dang / /chos la rnam par grol ba'i sgo mchog thob/ /
17b7(mdo sde): sgor 'jug yongs su sbyangs byas rnam dag pa/ /rgyal ba'i blo ni yong ye nyams mi 'gyur/ /sbyin pa chen po'i rnam smin de 'dra ste/ /khrims chen yon tan de dag de 'dra lags/ /shes rab
18a1(mdo sde): chen po'i yon tan de 'dra ste/ /sngon chad chos de dag ni bsten pa mdzad/ /khyod ni gdan bzhugs bsam gtan mdzad pa na/ /mi yi dbang po phyogs bcur lhang nger
18a2(mdo sde): gyur| / rgyal sras thugs kyi sras po 'dus de dag /gang nas shi 'phos las ni ci mchis pa/ /lha dang klu dang mi min mi'am ci/ /kun la de ring shes pa de 'jug go /kun tu snang bar
18a3(mdo sde): gyur pa'i ting 'dzin la/ /gang gis bskal byer shes pa de bskyed pa/ /som nyi gcod cing the tshom sel ba yi/ /mi mchog seng+ge bzhin du sgrog par 'gyur/ /bdag dang gzhan la
18a4(mdo sde): phan pa tshol ba na/ /'di ltar sngon chad sbyin pa stsal lags te/ /'di la sbyin pa tshul khrims bzod brtson gang / /sems can kun la de 'drar bskal pa mnyam/ /sems can de dag
18a5(mdo sde): thams cad ma btud par/ /'di ltar sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod brtson gang / /sems can kun la kun tu mkhas pas na/ /'di la ting 'dzin 'jug dang shes rab mchog /des na
18a6(mdo sde): khyod kyis ting 'dzin rnam par sbyangs/ /dpa' bo de ring gdan la bzhugs pa la/ /thal mo sbyar nas khyod la zhu lags na/ /som nyi gcad cing the tshom bsal du gsol/ /deng 'dir
18a7(mdo sde): chos la kun tu snang thob cing / /the tshom bral te snang ba thob gyur pas/ /sems can gang dag 'byung dang bdag cag la/ /chos kyi tshul ni yun ring gnas par 'gyur/ /gleng gzhi'i le'u
18b1(mdo sde): zhes bya ba ste dang po'o/ / //yang de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa de nyid du pad+ma dpal gyi snying po zhes bya ba gzhon nur gyur pa zhig 'dus par gyur te 'dug go /de nas pad+ma dpal gyi snying
18b2(mdo sde): po gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas
18b3(mdo sde): 'dug go / de ltar 'dug pa de'i sems la rnam par rtog pa 'di lta bu byung ste/ bdag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la chos kyi sgo rnams zhu bar 'dod pa yin/ rdo rje'i tshig rnams dang / rgyun
18b4(mdo sde): mi gcod pa sgrub pa'i tshig rnams zhu bar 'dod pa yin/ smra ba thams cad tshar gcad pa sgrub pa'i tshig rnams dang / rim par phye ba'i tshig rnams dang / chos thams cad bsdu ba'i tshig
18b5(mdo sde): rnams zhu bar 'dod pa yin na/ rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dag phyag rgya'i sgo gang dag la bslab na/ chos thams cad la sgrib pa med pa'i mig dang shes pa la mkhas pa nyid rjes su
18b6(mdo sde): thob par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das/ kye ma bdag gis bsam pa'i tshogs gang dag dang / 'jug pa sgrub pa gang dag gi go cha bgos pa/ sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs skye ba la bsam pa sgrub
18b7(mdo sde): pa'i tshogs la dgongs par 'gyur snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis pad+ma dpal gyi snying po gzhon nur gyur pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud cing smon lam dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs sgrub
19a1(mdo sde): pa thugs su chud nas de'i tshe phyogs bzhir rnam par gzigs so/ /phyogs bzhir gzigs pa na bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer chen po bzhi
19a2(mdo sde): byung ste/ de dag byung nas 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag tu dong ngo / /'od zer de dag kyang shing ljon pa'am/ rtsig pa'am/ ri'am/ sa'am/ bar snang gang du
19a3(mdo sde): bab pa de dag thams cad gser gyi kha dog gcig tu gyur to/ /phyogs dang phyogs mtshams thams cad du'ang 'od zer de dag thogs pa med par rab tu dong ste/ de ltar
19a4(mdo sde): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na 'od de dag gis reg pa'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyis rang gi lus dag gser gyi lus lta bur shes so/ /gang
19a5(mdo sde): dag 'dod chags kyi yongs su gdung bas yongs su gdungs pa dang / zhe sdang gi yongs su gdung bas yongs su gdungs pa dang / gti mug gi yongs su gdung bas yongs su
19a6(mdo sde): gdungs pa de dag thams cad kyis ni/ bdag nyid 'dod chags chung ba dang / zhe sdang chung ba dang / gti mug chung bar mngon par shes so/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
19a7(mdo sde): gyi khams 'di na sems can dmyal ba ji snyed yod pa de dag tu sems can skyes pa gang dag sdug bsngal tsha ba/ mi bzad pa/ 'chi ba'i mthar byed pa'i tshor ba nyams su myong ba de dag thams
19b1(mdo sde): cad kyis ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mthu dang / byang chub sems dpa' de'i sngon gyi smon lam gyi mthus bde ba snyam du shes par gyur to/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
19b2(mdo sde): khams na las kyi sgrib pas bsgribs pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pas bsgribs pa dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa'i sgrib pas bsgribs par gyur pa'i sems can ji snyed yod pa de
19b3(mdo sde): dag thams cad kyis kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi mthu dang / byang chub sems dpa' de'i sngon gyi smon lam gyis sgrib pa dang bral bar gyur to/ /de'i tshe sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba cher
19b4(mdo sde): gsal bar bya ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyis spu'i khung bu thams cad nas 'od zer dag byung ste/ 'od zer de dag kyang shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa dag 'das so/ /
19b5(mdo sde): de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / steng dang / 'og tu 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa dag 'das so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od zer de dag phyung nas gsung bsal ba'i sgra
19b6(mdo sde): mdzad do/ /gsung bsal ba'i sgra des kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mngon par go bar gyur to/ /de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa dag 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi
19b7(mdo sde): khams gdugs gcig pa zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i bkod pa gcig pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la
20a1(mdo sde): chos kyang ston to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i bkod pa gcig pa des byang
20a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dra ba can gyi 'od 'di ni/ nga'i 'og tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /
20a3(mdo sde): zhes bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/ /de nas de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i bkod pa gcig pa ga la ba der song ste phyin
20a4(mdo sde): nas/ bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gsung bsal ba'i sgra dang / 'od kyi snang ba chen po gda' ba de su'i lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang /
20a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i bkod pa gcig pas byang chub sems dpa' dra ba can gyi 'od la bka'
20a6(mdo sde): stsal pa| rigs kyi bu/ nub phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de
20a7(mdo sde): na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod sems
20b1(mdo sde): can thams cad yang dag par tshim par byed pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi chos kyang ston to/ /'khor der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma dpal gyi snying po zhes
20b2(mdo sde): bya ba 'dus te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba'i phyag rgya yi ge mngon par sgrub pa'i sgo zhu bar
20b3(mdo sde): 'dod do/ /dra ba can gyi 'od/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha bgos pa/ tha mi dad par spyod pa'i go cha bgos pa
20b4(mdo sde): dag 'khor der 'dus te 'khod do/ /dra ba can gyi 'od/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha de dag dang ldan pa de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag kyang stongs so/ /
20b5(mdo sde): dra ba can gyi 'od/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skyes pa gang dag yin pa de dag mthong ba dang thos pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi gces spras
20b6(mdo sde): byed par nga smra na/ dra ba can gyi 'od/ gang dag gis de dag mthong nas bkur sti byed dam/ bla mar byed dam/ ri mor byed dam/ mchod par byed dam/ 'dri bar byed pa lta ci smos/ de
20b7(mdo sde): nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i bkod pa gcig pa de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dra ba can gyi 'od kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de
21a1(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la lta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam
21a2(mdo sde): gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha bgos pa de dag blta ba'i slad du 'jig rten gyi khams der mchi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams de'ang blta bar bgyi'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / de bzhin
21a3(mdo sde): gshegs pa rin po che'i bkod pa gcig pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dra ba can gyi 'od la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ de'i dus la da bab
21a4(mdo sde): par shes na song la sangs rgyas kyi zhing der shes bzhin du'ang spyod cig / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed de na gnas pa'i byang chub sems
21a5(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag bsnyen par dka' ba'i phyir ro/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i bkod pa gcig pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dra
21a6(mdo sde): ba can gyi 'od la lag pa lta bu'i ut+pa la byin te/ dra ba can gyi 'od/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la khyod kyis lag pa lta bu'i ut+pa la 'dis mchod cig /nga'i tshig gis
21a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i bkod pa gcig pa de bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde bar reg
21b1(mdo sde): pa la gnas sam zhes snyun gsol lo/ /zhes de skad ces gsol cig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dra ba can gyi 'od de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
21b2(mdo sde): d ag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i bkod pa gcig pa de'i zhabs la mgo bas phyag btsal te lan gsum bskor ba byas nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
21b3(mdo sde): tshad med grangs med pa dag dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ga la ba der song ste/ sems kyi skad cig gcig gis 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der 'dug par gyur to/ /
21b4(mdo sde): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dra ba can gyi 'od rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan+ta ka gnas pa ga la ba der song nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der yang song ste
21b5(mdo sde): phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' dra ba can gyi 'od bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
21b6(mdo sde): mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag dra ba can gyi 'od lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ bdag dra ba can gyi 'od lags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos
21b7(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dra ba can gyi 'od la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /dra ba can gyi 'od/
22a1(mdo sde): khyod yun ring du 'tsho bar gyur cig /khyod bde ba dang nad med par gyur cig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dra ba can gyi 'od bcom
22a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go / phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dra ba can gyi 'od kyis
22a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'dad de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i bkod pa gcig pa bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/
22a4(mdo sde): bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes snyun gsol lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
22a5(mdo sde): rin po che'i bkod pa gcig pa des bcom ldan 'das la lag pa lta bu'i ut+pa la 'di'ang bskur lags na/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' dra ba can gyi 'od las lag
22a6(mdo sde): pa lta bu'i ut+pa la bzhes su gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lag pa lta bu'i ut+pa la bzhes nas byang chub sems dpa' ma pham pa la byin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' ma
22a7(mdo sde): pham pas lag pa lta bu'i ut+pa la de thogs nas byang chub sems dpa' bzang skyong la sogs pa lnga brgya la smras pa/ rgan rabs dag/ lag pa lta bu'i ut+pa la 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs
22b1(mdo sde): pas byin pa'o/ /de nas bzang skyong la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya po de dag gis lag pa lta bu'i ut+pa la de thogs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom
22b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das/ bdag cag de ltar yang dag par zhugs pa lags na/ ci bdag cag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na sems can gang dag gis ming thos par gyur pa de thams cad bla na
22b3(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das/ lag pa lta bu'i ut+pa la 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' ma pham pas bdag cag la stsal
22b4(mdo sde): lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gis ni/ lag pa lta bu'i ut+pa la 'di rang gi smon lam gyi stobs dang / spyod pa'i stobs dang / bsam pa'i stobs dang / sems can thams
22b5(mdo sde): cad yongs su mi gtong ba'i stobs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba 'debs pa'i slad du lag pa lta bu'i ut+pa la de gtor bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shar phyogs na de
22b6(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa dag dang / gang dag ma byung ba dag dang / 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag dang /
22b7(mdo sde): 'byung ba'am 'jig pa der yang bcom ldan 'das/ gtor bar bgyi'o/ /de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / de bzhin du nub phyogs dang / de bzhin du byang phyogs dang / de bzhin du 'og gi phyogs dang /
23a1(mdo sde): de bzhin du steng gi phyogs dang / de bzhin du phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rnams na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed byung ba dang / 'byung bar
23a2(mdo sde): 'gyur ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag tu'ang gtor bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang su dag gis lag pa lta bu'i ut+pa la de mthong bar gyur pa de dag thams cad ut+pa la'i dri
23a3(mdo sde): snom par gyur cig / de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur cig /de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du'ang mchi bar gyur cig /de dag
23a4(mdo sde): gis lag pa lta bu'i ut+pa la de gtor nas de nas de ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag g.yas pas reg ste/ lag pa lta bu'i ut+pa la de bcom ldan 'das kyis reg nas kyang de nas
23a5(mdo sde): de ma thag tu skad cig de nyid la ut+pa la de'i nang nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i phyed mngon par byung zhing / ut+pa la re re las kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku phyed mngon par byung
23a6(mdo sde): ste| de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i phyed po de dag gis gang dag chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur mi shes shing mos par mi byed la/ chos thams cad sgrib pa med pa dang / chos thams
23a7(mdo sde): cad mtshan nyid med par mi shes shing mos par mi byed/ khong du chud par mi byed pa de dag gi ston pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin zhing / de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos
23b1(mdo sde): dag kyang ma yin no/ /zhes de lta bu'i tshig de dag gsungs te/ gsungs nas kyang bzhud do/ /tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang bka' stsal to/ /sgyu ma 'dra chos gzung du med pa ste/ /gzung
23b2(mdo sde): min thams cad chu zla 'dra ba yin/ /stong pas stong pa'i rang bzhin mi 'dzin pa/ /chos nyid 'di ni rgyal bas de 'drar gsungs/ /mtshan nyid med chos rnam dag mtshan nyid yin/ /mtshan
23b3(mdo sde): nyid med pa'i rang bzhin de 'dra ste/ /brtags pas stong zhing bdag med chos rnams la/ /'dzin pa med cing rtsod pa med par 'gyur/ /gang dag de ltar chos nyid de 'dod pa/ /de dag ston pa rgyal ba
23b4(mdo sde): mthu bo che/ /phyogs bcur 'jig rten spyod pa thams cad la/ /de 'dra 'di ni de yi byin rlabs so/ /de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa de dag gis tshigs su bcad pa de dag gsungs nas
23b5(mdo sde): phyogs bcur bzhud do/ /bam po gnyis pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dra ba can gyi 'od kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu de
23b6(mdo sde): dag gis ji tsam du smon lam dag shin tu yongs su sbyangs pa dang / sems can gang dag gis de dag gi smon lam de dag thos pa dang / ming yang bsgrags pa de dag sdug bsngal mang pos reg
23b7(mdo sde): pa'i sdug bsngal de dag las yongs su thar par 'gyur ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ba ni/ ngo mtshar lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'on kyang
24a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das dang / rigs kyi bu de dag 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'byung ba'i cha ma lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ dper bgyi na/
24a2(mdo sde): skyes pa'am bud med la la zhig rin thang ma mchis pa'i nor bu rin po che dri ma thams cad dang bral ba/ phan pa dang bde ba thams cad nye bar sgrub par bgyid pa'i nor bu rin po che de'i yon
24a3(mdo sde): tan bsgrags pa thos nas yongs su btsal bar sems shing / nor bu rin po che de'i mtshan ma dag kyang legs par 'dzin par bgyid la/ chab khungs 'am de las gzhan mi
24a4(mdo sde): gtsang ba dang 'dres pa'i phyogs dag na nor bu rin po che shin tu yongs su byang ba de 'dam du stsal ba mthong zhing / lhag par yang nor bu rin po che de'i khor yug na smyig ma mkhan
24a5(mdo sde): gyi rigs sam/ gdol ba'i rigs sam/ g.yung po'i rigs sam/ de dag las gzhan yang tshegs kyis 'tsho ba dma' ba'i rigs dag mchis par gyur na/ de dag nor bu rin
24a6(mdo sde): po che de'i ming yang ma 'tshal na/ yon tan 'tshal bar 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ de ni/ gnas ma mchis lags so/ /de nas mi des mi gtsang bar stsal ba'i nor bu rin
24a7(mdo sde): po che de mthong nas nor bu rin po che de'i snod ni/ mdzes pa ma yin no/ /zhes de skad ces smra bar bgyid la/ de nas dma' ba'i mi de dag 'di skad ces smra bar bgyid de/ khyod kyis
24b1(mdo sde): gang gi bsngags pa smras pa'i nor bu rin po che de gang yin zhes de skad ces smras pa dang / mi des nor bu rin po che de bstan la/ de ston pa na mi byis pa'i rang bzhin can de dag ma 'tshal
24b2(mdo sde): bzhin du/ kye mi khyod kyis nor bu rin po che de'i yon tan ci'i phyir smras/ khyod kyis gang smras pa'i nor bu rin po che de'i yon tan de dag ni/ yod pa ma yin no/ /khyod ni/ rdzun du smra ba/
24b3(mdo sde): gzhan du smra ba ste/ khyod kyi tshig de dag yid mi ches so/ /zhes smras la/ de'i tshe mi des nor bu rin po che de mi gtsang ba'i gnas de nas mngon par bteg cing blangs nas mchis te/
24b4(mdo sde): de nas nor bu rin po che de phyung nas mi de mchis ma thag tu mi dbul po'i rang bzhin can de dag gcig la gcig shin tu rab tu rnam par 'khrugs par gyur nas de'i rjes la gnod pa
24b5(mdo sde): mang pos yongs su bskor ba de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu dang ldan pa rnams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed dbul pos gtams par
24b6(mdo sde): mchis lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar mi gtsang ba'i 'dam gyis snod du stsal ba'i nor bu rin po che de mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can gyi mi des ngo 'tshal ba de lta bur ni/ bcom
24b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed na bdag cag blta bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar bde ba thams cad nye bar sgrub par bgyid pa'i nor bu rin po che de legs par
25a1(mdo sde): sbyangs shing rnam par dag pa de lta bur ni/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gyis mi khyab
25a2(mdo sde): pa'i go cha bgos pa de dag blta bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar nor bu rin po che de'i khor yug na dma' bas 'tsho ba dbul po dma' ba'i mi de dag gnas pa de lta bur ni/
25a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na de dag las gzhan pa'i sems can rnams blta bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar skyes pa'am/ bud med
25a4(mdo sde): kyis nor bu rin po che de'i yon tan dag thos nas nor bu rin po che de yongs su btsal bar sems shing / mi gtsang ba'i snod na mchis pa'i nor bu rin po che de mthong nas kyang nor
25a5(mdo sde): bu rin po che de'i snod de ni/ 'tsham pa ma yin no/ /zhes smra bar bgyid pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das/ phyogs bcu dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems
25a6(mdo sde): dpa' gang dag lags pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni/ 'tsham pa ma yin no/ /zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'
25a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha bgos pa de dag gi bsngags pa brjod lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dper bgyi na/ skyes pa'am/ bud med kyis nor bu rin
25b1(mdo sde): po che de'i yon tan dag thos nas yongs su btsal bar sems shing / mi gtsang ba'i snod na mchis pa de'ang mthong nas snod de ni/ 'tsham pa ma yin no/ /zhes tshig smra bar bgyid pa de bzhin
25b2(mdo sde): du| bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gis ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam
25b3(mdo sde): gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha bgos pa de dag gi yon tan gyi bsngags pa thos nas blta ba'i slang du bdag cag 'dir mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir mchis
25b4(mdo sde): nas bdag cag gis ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'di gnod pa brgya phrag du mas gtams shing sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba chung du dang ldan pa dag gis gtams par mthong lags
25b5(mdo sde): so| |bcom ldan 'das/ dper bgyi na/ 'dam du stsal ba'i nor bu rin po che de'i 'od de mi 'dor ba de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das/ phyogs bcu dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dang /
25b6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha bgos pa de dag gi 'od de mi 'dor lags te/ 'dir ni/ sems can rnams kyis bsam pa dang mos pa chung
25b7(mdo sde): ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od 'dom gang tsam du byin gyis rlob par mdzad lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dper bgyi na/ mi de nor bu rin po che de'i yon tan dag sgrog pa na mi dbul
26a1(mdo sde): ba'i rang bzhin can de dag mngon par yid mi ches pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das/ sems can de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od shin tu rgyas
26a2(mdo sde): pa'am| smon lam chen po'am/ rnam par 'phrul pa chen po'am/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dag la'ang yid ches par mi bgyid na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag
26a3(mdo sde): gi la lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dper bgyi na/ mi des mi gtsang ba'i snod de nas nor bu rin po che de blangs nas mchis la/ de mchis ma thag tu'ang sems can de
26a4(mdo sde): dag gnod pa rnam pa du mas shas cher yongs su bskor ba de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems
26a5(mdo sde): dpa' chen po de dag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du mchis nas/ 'di lta bu'i mdo sde 'dzin pa/ byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par 'dzin du stsol ba rnams gcig la gcig rab tu
26a6(mdo sde): rnam par 'khrug par 'gyur zhing / chos kyi sgra'ang 'byung bar mi 'gyur la/ chos ma lags pa nyid kyi sgra 'byung ba kho na rabs so/ /zhes de skad ces gsol pa lags so/ /de ci'i slad du
26a7(mdo sde): zhe na| 'di ltar sems can de dag ni/ chos ma lags pa la gnas par 'gyur zhing chos ma lags pas 'tsho ba nyid yang dag par blangs nas gnas par 'gyur la/ gcig la gcig
26b1(mdo sde): 'thab mo dang / sun 'byin pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / smod pa la 'jug par bgyid par 'gyur te/ de dag gcig la gcig dge ba'i chos las nyams nas sdug bsngal thob par 'gyur zhing / de
26b2(mdo sde): dag chos gsog pa dang / dge ba gsog pa lhur len par mi 'gyur ba'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo don 'tshal ba/ don yongs su tshol bar 'tshal ba/
26b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi byang chub yang dag par sgrub par 'tshal ba dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa bas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir skye bar mi bgyi na/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pas lta smos
26b4(mdo sde): kyang ci 'tshal/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ dper bgyi na/ sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa dang / yang sos dang / thig nag dang / tsha ba dang / rab tu tsha ba dang /
26b5(mdo sde): de dag las gzhan pa sems can dmyal ba chen po dag tu sems can gang dag skyes pa de dag la skad cig thang gcig yud tsam yang bde ba mi dmigs pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das
26b6(mdo sde): b com ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i bkod pa gcig pa de'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i gdugs gcig pa na byang chub sems dpa' gang dag mchis pa de dag gis
26b7(mdo sde): ' jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na sems can mnar med par skyes pa rnams dang 'dra bar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dir skyes pa de dag la'ang bde ba ci'ang yang dag
27a1(mdo sde): par rjes su ma mthong lags so/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing bde ba gcig pu ma chog tu gyur pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams de na sems can de dag ni/ rang bzhin gyis
27a2(mdo sde): bde ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni/ sems can 'dir skyes pa rnams kyis de mngon par yid ches par dka' bar 'gyur bar smra lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'on kyang
27a3(mdo sde): chos kyi the tshom gcad pa dang / chos kyi phyag rgya'i sgo mnyan pa'i slad du gang gi don du bdag 'dir mchis pa de bcom ldan 'das las bdag cag thos par 'tshal lags so/ /de ci'i
27a4(mdo sde): slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ bde ba dang sdug bsngal de dag thams cad mi rtag pa lags pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
27a5(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas las gang la bde ba ma mchis pa dang / sdug bsngal ba ma mchis pa dang / rtag pa ma mchis pa dang / mi rtag pa ma mchis pa dang / rtog pa ma mchis pa
27a6(mdo sde): dang / rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa dang / dngos po ma mchis pa dang / dngos po ma mchis pa ma mchis pa dang / 'dus byas ma mchis pa dang / 'dus ma byas ma mchis pa dang / gdags
27a7(mdo sde): pa ma mchis pa dang / gdags pa ma mchis pa ma mchis pa dang / 'jig rten ma mchis pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa ma mchis pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa ma mchis pa dang / zag
27b1(mdo sde): pa ma mchis pa ma mchis pa dang / bden pa ma mchis pa dang / rdzun pa ma mchis pa dang / byang chub ma mchis pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma mchis pa dang / stobs rnams ma mchis pa
27b2(mdo sde): dang / snang ba ma mchis pa dang / mun pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par rig pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par rig pa ma lags pa ma mchis pa dang / 'bras bu ma mchis pa dang / 'bras bu ma lags
27b3(mdo sde): ba ma mchis pa dang / lam ma mchis pa dang / lam ma lags pa ma mchis pa dang / 'jug pa ma mchis pa dang / mthar thug pa ma mchis pa dang / 'jig rten ma mchis pa dang / 'jig rten
27b4(mdo sde): nas nges par 'byung ba ma mchis pa rnam pa de lta bu'i chos thos par 'tshal lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ bsod nams kyi tshogs las yang dag par byung ba/ kun rtog
27b5(mdo sde): pa las byung ba'i bde ba de dag dang / gzhan thams cad 'jig rten la bstan par bgyi ba'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni/ bstan du mi rung lags te/
27b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das/ de la stobs rnams ma mchis/ mi 'jigs pa rnams ma mchis/ rdzu 'phrul ma mchis/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul ma mchis/ kun brjod pa ma mchis/ kun brjod pa'i
27b7(mdo sde): cho 'phrul ma mchis/ rjes su bstan pa ma mchis/ rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul ma mchis lags so/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams ma mchis shing stobs rnams ma mchis la/ bde ba ma mchis
28a1(mdo sde): shing sdug bsngal ba ma mchis lags te/ de dag thams cad ni/ rlom sems lags shing / de dag thams cad ni/ g.yo ba lags pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom
28a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das/ de bzhin nyid rjes su thob pa dang / rjes su ma thob pa'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bgyi ba'i grangs su mchi ba ma lags te/ 'di ltar
28a3(mdo sde): de dag thams cad ni/ g.yo ba dang / rlom sems dang / g.yos pa dang / spros pa lags pa'i slad du'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pas ni/ bden pa'am/ rdzun pa 'am/ 'dus byas
28a4(mdo sde): sam| 'dus ma byas sam/ zag pa dang bcas pa'am/ zag pa ma mchis pa'am/ kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'am/ kha nam tho ba ma mchis pa'am/ 'jig rten pa'am/ 'jig
28a5(mdo sde): rten las 'das pa'am/ tshul khrims sam/ 'chal ba'i tshul khrims sam/ stobs rnams sam/ stobs ma mchis pa'am/ mi 'jigs pa'am/ mi 'jigs pa ma mchis pa'am/
28a6(mdo sde): sbyin gnas sam/ sbyin gnas ma lags pa'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'am/ sangs rgyas sam/ byang chub sems dpa'am/ nyan thos sam/ rang sangs rgyas sam/ smon lam rnams sam/
28a7(mdo sde): byin gyi rlabs rnams kyi rlom sems thams cad yang dag par bcom zhing lam yongs su mkhyen te/ de bas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ bag tsha ba mi mnga' bar seng+ge lta bu dang / glang
28b1(mdo sde): po che lta bu'i sgra sgrog par mdzad lags so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ bzhed na mi mthun pa rnams la mi mthun pa'i 'du shes can du gnas par mdzad/ mthun pa rnams la mthun pa'i 'du
28b2(mdo sde): shes can du gnas par mdzad do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ bzhed na dran pa dang ldan zhing mkhyen bzhin du de gnyis kas kyang btang snyoms par gnas par mdzad do/ /bcom ldan 'das/
28b3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa de dag ni/ sangs rgyas kyi gnas pa dag dang / rang byung gi gnas pa dag dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams dang yang thun mong ma lags pa'i
28b4(mdo sde): gnas pa dag lags na/ de dag las gzhan pa'i sems can tha chad rnams dang thun mong ma lags pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du thun mong ma lags she na/ de
28b5(mdo sde): las gzhan pa'i sems can tha chad kyis de lta bu'i gnas pa de dag dang / de snyed kyi gnas pa de dag dang / yun ji srid nas gnas pa de dag dang / sbyor ba de lta bu'i gnas pa de dag dang /
28b6(mdo sde): bde bde lta bu'i gnas pa de dag 'tshal bar rngo mi thogs shing / bcom ldan 'das/ de dag de bzhin gshegs pa dang bral ba'i sems can rnams kyi gnas de dag 'tshal bar rngo mi
28b7(mdo sde): thogs pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de dag ni/ sems can gzhan dag gi spyod yul ma lags shing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa de lta bu de dag ni/ nyan thos dang / rang
29a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod yul ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ spyod yul ma lags zhes bgyi ba ni/ spyod pa ma mchis shing / rnam par spyod pa ma
29a2(mdo sde): mchis pa ste/ des na spyod yul ma lags zhes bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de la nyan thos dag gam/ rang sangs rgyas dag gi spyod pa ma mchis pa'i slad du'o//
29a3(mdo sde): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ gnas pa de mtha' yas pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du gnas pa mtha' yas pa lags she na/ bcom ldan 'das/
29a4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dag gi mos pa ni/ mtha' yas te/ gang gis kyang 'tshal bar rngo mi thogs lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ gnas pa de ni/ yi ge ma
29a5(mdo sde): mchis pa lags te/ yi ge ma mchis pa zhes bgyi ba ni/ brjod du ma mchis pa lags la/ yi ge ni/ brjod pa kho na lags pas de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ rang byung gi
29a6(mdo sde): gnas pa ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang dag gnas pa de la rnam par lta bar mi 'gyur zhing rab tu 'tshal bar mi 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan
29a7(mdo sde): nas shi 'phos pa lags so/ /gang dag gnas pa de glo bar chud par mi 'gyur ba de dag gis ni/ gnod pa chen po dang ldan par 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin
29b1(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i gnas pa de ni/ bcom ldan 'das/ don gyi sgo dang / chos kyi sgo de lags te/ 'khor sgo drug khri brgyad stong dang ldan pa lags so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i
29b2(mdo sde): bkod pa gcig pa'i byang chub ni/ nam mkha' lta bur tshad ma mchis shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag sgo gcig pa'i tshad las rjes su thob pa lags so/ /
29b3(mdo sde): sgo'i tshig 'di bstan cing bshad pa na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdun khri bdun stong gis ni/ sgrib pa med pa'i chos kyi sgo rjes su thob ste/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin
29b4(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i gnas pa de nyid do/ /de dag thams cad kyis bdag cag gis deng byang chub thob bo/ /bdag cag gis dang byang chub thob bo/ /zhes bya ba'i tshig kyang smras so/ /srog chags bye
29b5(mdo sde): ba khrag khrig phrag drug cu ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag sems dang po bskyed pa nyid kyis bla na med pa yang dag par
29b6(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/ /srog chags bye ba khrag khrig sa ya phrag brgyad ni/ chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so/ /dge slong sum stong ni/ len
29b7(mdo sde): pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi 'dzum pa mdzad nas kyang de nas de ma thag tu de'i tshe
30a1(mdo sde): 'jig rten du 'od chen po byung bar gyur cing / sa chen po'ang g.yos par gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos chos gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar
30a2(mdo sde): nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bde logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan
30a3(mdo sde): 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa dang / 'jig rten du snang ba chen po byung ba dang / 'jig rten du sa chen po g.yos pa'i rgyu ni gang lags/ rkyen ni/ gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
30a4(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ byang chub sems dpa' dra ba can gyi 'od kyis chos kyi sgo de bstan cing bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' bdun khri bdun stong gis sgrib pa med
30a5(mdo sde): pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya'i sgo thob par gyur cing / kun dga' bo/ byang chub sems dpa' dra ba can gyi 'od kyis chos kyi sgo'i tshig bstan pa de ni/ nam mkha' yongs su zin pa'i sa
30a6(mdo sde): phyogs de nyid du sangs rgyas brgyad stong las blangs te/ blangs nas kyang de'i rjes la byang chub sems dpa' dra ba can gyi 'od sgrib pa med pa'i chos kyi sgos nges par byung ba dang / sangs
30a7(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba la mkhas par gyur pa'i phyir ro/ /yang de'i tshe shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa bdun cu rtsa brgyad 'das pa na 'jig
30b1(mdo sde): rten gyi khams rin po che brtsegs pa gcig pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po chen mtha' yas khyu mchog
30b2(mdo sde): ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la 'khor 'bum phrag du ma la chos kyang ston to/ /bcom ldan 'das de'i rgyal tsha ba byang chub sems dpa'
30b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon ces bya ba de 'khor der 'dus par gyur te 'dug nas/ de gsung bsal ba'i sgra de thos te/ de bzhin
30b4(mdo sde): gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i 'od de'ang mthong nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mtha' yas khyu mchog la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/
30b5(mdo sde): gsung bsal ba'i sgra dang / 'od gda' ba de su'i lags/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mtha'
30b6(mdo sde): yas khyu mchog gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon de la bka' stsal pa/ don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon/
30b7(mdo sde): nub phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa bdun cu rtsa brgyad 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de
31a1(mdo sde): b zhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes
31a2(mdo sde): la/ 'di lta ste/ sems pa dpe med pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams las brtsams nas byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod sems can thams cad yang dag par
31a3(mdo sde): tshim par byed pa/ sems can thams cad kyi the tshom gcod pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi chos kyang ston to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
31a4(mdo sde): b com pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mtha' yas khyu mchog la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don yod khyu mchog rnam par
31a5(mdo sde): gnon gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi
31a6(mdo sde): ba dang / sems pa dpe med pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag blta ba'i slad du 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bdag mchi bar bgyi'o/ /
31a7(mdo sde): de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mtha' yas khyu mchog gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
31b1(mdo sde): don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod de'i dus la dbab par shes na/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod song la sangs
31b2(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing der shes bzhin du gnas par yang byos shig / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed
31b3(mdo sde): der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag skyes pa de dag bsnyen par dka' ba'i phyir ro/ /nga'i tshig gis gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung
31b4(mdo sde): ngam| bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes snyun gsol la/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la lag pa lta bu'i pad+ma 'di 'ang
31b5(mdo sde): phul cig / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon stan las langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo
31b6(mdo sde): bos phyag btsal te/ bskor ba'ang byas nas byang chub sems dpa' bdun khri brgyad stong dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du 'ongs te/ de 'ongs nas
31b7(mdo sde): de ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed nam tog gi shing ngam/ 'bras bu shing ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyis de'i tshe dus ma yin pa'i me tog dag dang /
32a1(mdo sde): dus ma yin pa'i 'bras bu dag gtor to/ /me tog gi char ba'ang bab po/ /spos kyi char pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag kyang bab po/ /rol
32a2(mdo sde): mo'i sgra rnam pa sna tshogs dag kyang grag go / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon rgyal po'i khab 'od
32a3(mdo sde): ma'i tshal bya ka lan+ta ka gnas pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lag pa gnyis kas bcom ldan 'das
32a4(mdo sde): kyi zhabs la bzung ngo / /gdong gis kyang yongs su gtugs te/ tshig 'di skad ces kyang gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' don yod khyu
32a5(mdo sde): mchog rnam par gnon pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo/ /de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems
32a6(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon bkur sti byas pa dang /
32a7(mdo sde): mchod pa dang / ri mo byas par gyur cig /de nas byang chub byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon sa las langs te
32b1(mdo sde): spyan sngar 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
32b2(mdo sde): rin chen mtha' yas khyu mchog bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam/
32b3(mdo sde): zhes snyun gsol zhing / bcom ldan 'das la bcom ldan 'das kyis lag pa lta bu'i pad+ma bskur ba lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba nye bar
32b4(mdo sde): bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon las bzhes su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' don yod khyu mchog
32b5(mdo sde): rnam par gnon las lag pa lta bu'i pad+ma de bzhes te/ bzhes nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon la bka'
32b6(mdo sde): stsal pa| don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon/ ci bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mtha' yas khyu mchog gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam
32b7(mdo sde): nga ba nyung ngam/ 'gyur pa mi mnga' ma/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mtha' yas khyu mchog de gnod
33a1(mdo sde): pa chung zhing stobs dang ldan la 'gyur ba mi mnga' ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na bde bar reg pa la gnas lags so/ /
33a2(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma pham pa la lag pa lta bu'i pad+ma de byin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa'
