123a5(mdo sde): mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa lus mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang
123a6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab brag ces bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams dga' ba'i spos zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
123a7(mdo sde): pa skyo med 'gyur bar mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab yongs bsgrags nyon
123b1(mdo sde): mongs yang dag bcom zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan kun la rab tu gnas zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa snyan
123b2(mdo sde): pa'i bshes gnyen zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rgyal ba'i bshes gnyen zhes bya ba bla na
123b3(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/ /zhes bya ba nas btang ngo / /zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/ /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi
123b4(mdo sde): khams phun sum tshogs pa kun la rab tu gnas zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa snyan pa'i nga ro zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/
123b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab chos 'phags zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan med pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba
123b6(mdo sde): yod de| de na de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan bral zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rin chen me
123b7(mdo sde): zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/ /zhes bya ba nas btang ngo / /zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/ /de'i yang 'dab chags
124a1(mdo sde): na 'jig rten gyi khams snyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma mngon par 'phags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing
124a2(mdo sde): gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab me tog rgyal po zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi
124a3(mdo sde): khams me tog kun tu bkram zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa me tog rab tu gtor ba'i tog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/
124a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab spos kyi dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par bsgrags pa zhes
124a5(mdo sde): bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas spos kyi 'od zer ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems
124a6(mdo sde): dpa' rgyal tshab nges 'byung zhes bya ba btang ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs ldan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin
124a7(mdo sde): gshegs pa spyan btud ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab smon lam chen po zhes
124b1(mdo sde): bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od 'phro can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od btang zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes
124b2(mdo sde): la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sbyin sreg byas pa'i 'od ces bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams
124b3(mdo sde): 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od lhun po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa'
124b4(mdo sde): rgyal tshab ri rab lta bu zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen snang
124b5(mdo sde): zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rin chen byin zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab
124b6(mdo sde): chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rtag tu bdug spos bdugs zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan gnyis gtsug tor can zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing
124b7(mdo sde): gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' mtshan gnyis 'od ces bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/ /zhes bya ba
125a1(mdo sde): nas btang ngo / /zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/ /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams srid pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa
125a2(mdo sde): 'jig rten gsum gyi khyu mchog rnam par gnon ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab
125a3(mdo sde): srid pa gsum zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi dkyil
125a4(mdo sde): 'khor can zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mi 'jigs sbyin zhes bya ba btang ngo / /
125a5(mdo sde): de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rtag tu dmigs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i rigs kyi khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs
125a6(mdo sde): te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab lag pa can zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig
125a7(mdo sde): rten gyi khams bde ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa zad mi shes pa'i khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston
125b1(mdo sde): t e| bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas des byang chub sems dpa' 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par
125b2(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/ /zhes bya ba nas btang ngo / /zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/ /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu yongs su
125b3(mdo sde): spangs zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnga sgra zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab
125b4(mdo sde): spos rab gtong zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs
125b5(mdo sde): te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' yul la mi gnas pa zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams
125b6(mdo sde): sgra rnam par bsgrags zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rnam par bsgrags zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das
125b7(mdo sde): des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mchog gi tshogs can zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams sgron ma'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba yod de/ de na
126a1(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu rab tu gnas zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa'
126a2(mdo sde): rgyal tshab pa ra dza na zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams bkod pa gcig pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas khyu
126a3(mdo sde): mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' blo gros dpe med ces bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab
126a4(mdo sde): chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu dga' byed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan kun gyi 'byung gnas zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la
126a5(mdo sde): chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mtshan ma med pa'i mtshan nyid go cha zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi
126a6(mdo sde): khams dga' ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas rin chen ldan zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan
126a7(mdo sde): 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu yang dag brtags kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rgyu skar gyi phreng ba
126b1(mdo sde): zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'phags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems
126b2(mdo sde): dpa' rgyal tshab sgrog pa zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams gdugs kyi phreng ba bkod pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye
126b3(mdo sde): shes 'phags pa'i 'od kyi gzi brjid dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab legs
126b4(mdo sde): byin zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te
126b5(mdo sde): 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sangs rgyas chos 'byung zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten
126b6(mdo sde): gyi khams me tog can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spos rab khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des
126b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ye shes dal ba 'gyur byed ces bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams ku mu das rab tu khebs zhes bya ba yod de/
127a1(mdo sde): de na de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba tog gi 'od zer zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa'
127a2(mdo sde): rgyal tshab ri rab byin zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams yangs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi glang po che zhes bya ba
127a3(mdo sde): bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na
127a4(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams mchog ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan
127a5(mdo sde): 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab bdud rtsi'i sgra zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams spos ldan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin
127a6(mdo sde): gshegs pa pad+ma brtsegs pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab me tog ces bya ba btang
127a7(mdo sde): ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing
127b1(mdo sde): gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab spyi bos byin zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams tsam+pa ka
127b2(mdo sde): dang ldan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa tsan+dan dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das 'das des byang chub sems dpa'
127b3(mdo sde): rgyal tshab mig bzang zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen brtsegs zhes
127b4(mdo sde): bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu mthong zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na
127b5(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams mdzangs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mdzangs mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das
127b6(mdo sde): des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu rab sangs rgyas zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams bde mchog ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin
127b7(mdo sde): gshegs pa bde mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab bde ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba btang
128a1(mdo sde): ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rab gnas zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas 'byung ba'i dpal zhes
128a2(mdo sde): bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu rab gnas zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags
128a3(mdo sde): na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi tog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang
128a4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab kun tu 'od ces bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams dga' ba'i spos zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa
128a5(mdo sde): yon tan mtha' yas 'byung gnas zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab yon tan 'byung zhes
128a6(mdo sde): bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams blta na sdug ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad 'byung ba'i dpal gyi rgyal
128a7(mdo sde): po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab yon tan ldan zhes bya ba btang ngo / /'jig rten gyi
128b1(mdo sde): khams de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang
128b2(mdo sde): ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sbyin mos zhes bya ba btang ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams gser gyi dra bas
128b3(mdo sde): kun tu khebs zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa sgron ma 'chang zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems
128b4(mdo sde): dpa' rgyal tshab spar 'chums ma yin zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen dra bas kun tu khebs zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
128b5(mdo sde): pa rin chen 'phags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab grong khyer sgrog ces bya ba
128b6(mdo sde): btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs
128b7(mdo sde): te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mi khom thams cad 'gyur byed ces bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags
129a1(mdo sde): na 'jig rten gyi khams gdugs gcig pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rgyu skar gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la
129a2(mdo sde): chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rgyu skar gyi phreng ba zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams nam
129a3(mdo sde): mkha'i rigs zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po mtha' yas zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des
129a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rin chen lhun po zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de
129a5(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i rna cha gdub kor rnam par dag pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang
129a6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams mngon du bgrod pa zhes bya ba yod de/
129a7(mdo sde): de na de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i sgra zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mya
129b1(mdo sde): ngan med ces bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams spos rigs btsun zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs te
129b2(mdo sde): 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mya ngan med pa'i dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi
129b3(mdo sde): khams shin tu rnam par dag ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen lhun po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des
129b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rigs btsun zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rab snang zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen
129b5(mdo sde): me tog sna tshogs me tog kun tu rgyas zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab blo gros mtha' yas
129b6(mdo sde): zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams mthu dpal zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mchog gi tshogs can zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho
129b7(mdo sde): zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ba lang bdag ces bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rin
130a1(mdo sde): chen me tog ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rdul med rdul bral rnam par grol ba'i go cha zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang
130a2(mdo sde): ston te| bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab 'od byed ces bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams gser du snang ba zhes bya ba
130a3(mdo sde): yod de| de na de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi me tog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab
130a4(mdo sde): rnam par snang byed ces bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams gser du snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen khang pa
130a5(mdo sde): zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu rab gnas zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang
130a6(mdo sde): 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams snying po can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs 'byung zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos
130a7(mdo sde): kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dpas byin zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams grol ba zhes bya ba
130b1(mdo sde): yod de| de na de bzhin gshegs pa grol ba'i 'od zer ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab
130b2(mdo sde): byams pa zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog rab gtor ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa me tog 'byung zhes bya ba bzhugs
130b3(mdo sde): te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab me tog gi gdugs me tog kun tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang
130b4(mdo sde): 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa me tog gdugs zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/
130b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab gser gdugs zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma can zhes bya ba yod de/ de
130b6(mdo sde): na de bzhin gshegs pa don yod go cha zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab log pa'i go cha
130b7(mdo sde): bgos zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par bsgrags pa'i stobs kyi rgyal
131a1(mdo sde): po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab skyed byed ces bya ba btang ngo / /de'i
131a2(mdo sde): yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams tshangs pa'i dpal zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes
131a3(mdo sde): la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi nga ro zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung
131a4(mdo sde): bstan to/ /zhes bya ba nas btang ngo / /zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/ /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams tog gi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/
131a5(mdo sde): de na de bzhin gshegs pa khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mig rnam dag
131a6(mdo sde): ces bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams tog ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas tshogs can zhes bya ba bzhugs te
131a7(mdo sde): 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rigs mtha' yas zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig
131b1(mdo sde): rten gyi khams gser zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa kha lo sgyur ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub
131b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' rgyal tshab sde zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rab gnas zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa thogs pa med pa'i 'khor
131b3(mdo sde): lo zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab 'das pa rnam par gnon ces bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang
131b4(mdo sde): 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams srid pa med ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro kun rnam par 'joms mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos
131b5(mdo sde): kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu yang dag brtags kyi go cha zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams
131b6(mdo sde): yid gnyis can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yid gnyis yang dag 'joms par mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom
131b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mthong ma thag tu nges pa'i go cha zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams ye shes mchog ces bya
132a1(mdo sde): ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan ma med pa'i nga ro zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang
132a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rnam par bltas pa'i nga ro zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan rab gnas zhes bya ba yod de/ de na
132a3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas ldan zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab
132a4(mdo sde): gom pa mtha' yas rnam par gnon ces bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen rab gnas zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
132a5(mdo sde): pa rin chen 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rdo rje rnam par gnon
132a6(mdo sde): ces bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams sgrog pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma mngon par 'phags pa'i dpal zhes bya
132a7(mdo sde): ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rin chen me tog ces bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab
132b1(mdo sde): chags na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od mi 'byung zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom
132b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab tshangs mchog ces bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams legs 'byung zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de
132b3(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i go cha thogs med ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang
132b4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rdul bral sde zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od bzang po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od
132b5(mdo sde): mtha' yas zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu gnon ces bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang
132b6(mdo sde): 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rnam dag ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen lhun po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/
132b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab lhun po chen po zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba sgron ma zhes bya ba yod
133a1(mdo sde): de| de na de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma sgron ma zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa'
133a2(mdo sde): rgyal tshab nyi ma sgron ma mngon par 'phags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams tshon rtsi'i phung po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na
133a3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal
133a4(mdo sde): tshab dri med 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams skar mda' zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa skar
133a5(mdo sde): mda' sgron ma zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab 'phel ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba
133a6(mdo sde): btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams ye shes 'byung gnas zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa gong na med pa'i 'od zer zhes bya ba
133a7(mdo sde): bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab yon tan 'byung gnas zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab
133b1(mdo sde): chags na 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma'i gdugs zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan
133b2(mdo sde): 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rnga sgra zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams gdugs gcig pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin
133b3(mdo sde): gshegs pa spyan mtha' yas zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab tshangs pa'i nga ro zhes bya
133b4(mdo sde): ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes
133b5(mdo sde): la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab phyogs snang zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams sA la
133b6(mdo sde): zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa sa lha'i dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub
133b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' rgyal tshab thu bo zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rab gnas zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa seng+ge zhes bya ba
134a1(mdo sde): bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab bag tsha ba med pa zhes bya ba btang ngo / /
134a2(mdo sde): de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams tshogs zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen lhun po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos
134a3(mdo sde): kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab grags pa zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma zhes bya
134a4(mdo sde): ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems
134a5(mdo sde): dpa' rgyal tshab sprin ces bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams kun 'dzin ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa sman pa'i rgyal
134a6(mdo sde): po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rtsi'i rgyal po zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang
134a7(mdo sde): 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams dpal bzang po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dpal bzang po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos
134b1(mdo sde): kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu bzang po zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams shin tu rab gnas
134b2(mdo sde): zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mi g.yos pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal
134b3(mdo sde): tshab phug spos zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams spos can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spos mchog dpal zhes bya ba
134b4(mdo sde): bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab spos dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig
134b5(mdo sde): rten gyi khams spos dpal zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa phyag na spos mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das
134b6(mdo sde): des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab pad+ma'i snying po zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams tsan+dan gyi bsung zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
134b7(mdo sde): pa tsan+dan khang pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dpal sbas zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i
135a1(mdo sde): yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen dra bas khebs zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus mtha' yas zhes bya
135a2(mdo sde): pa bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gnas la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab blo gros mtha' yas zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab
135a3(mdo sde): chags na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma 'jigs byed me tog mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs
135a4(mdo sde): te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dbyangs mtha' yas nga ro zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags
135a5(mdo sde): na 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang byed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen dra ba can zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston
135a6(mdo sde): te| bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dpas byin zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba sgron ma zhes bya ba yod
135a7(mdo sde): de| de na de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu rab gnas rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa'
135b1(mdo sde): rgyal tshab brjod med nga ro zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams tsan+dan gyi bsung zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa phyag na spos mchog
135b2(mdo sde): ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab 'byor pas byin zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags
135b3(mdo sde): na 'jig rten gyi khams yid bral zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa bde ba thams cad nye bar sgrub mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/
135b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab phan 'dod ces bya ba btang ngo / /de ni yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams spos sna tshogs zhes bya ba yod de/ de na
135b5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs pa thams cad ston ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab smon lam
135b6(mdo sde): mtha' yas zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yongs bsgrags don yod ces bya ba
135b7(mdo sde): bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab go cha mtha' yas zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig
136a1(mdo sde): rten gyi khams dri ma med pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu rab gnas zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston
136a2(mdo sde): te| bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab gtsug na nor bu zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can zhes bya
136a3(mdo sde): ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas bkod pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang
136a4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab thogs pa med pa'i snying stobs go cha zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma'i gdugs gcig pa zhes
136a5(mdo sde): bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa bde ba bkod pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa'
136a6(mdo sde): rgyal tshab rin chen tog ces bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i
136a7(mdo sde): tog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab nam mkha' rnam dag spyod pa zhes
136b1(mdo sde): bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams bzang byed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa bzang po mchog dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho
136b2(mdo sde): zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab bzang po dbyangs zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi
136b3(mdo sde): khams mar me byed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa khyu mchog mtha' yas zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das
136b4(mdo sde): des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab khyu mchog ces bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog dri zhim zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
136b5(mdo sde): pa spyan rnam dag ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mig bzang zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i
136b6(mdo sde): yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams shin tu rab gnas zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa kha lo sgyur ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos
136b7(mdo sde): kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rgya mtsho zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams tshogs mtha' yas zhes
137a1(mdo sde): bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po mngon par 'phags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom
137a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab tshad med blo gros zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams dga' 'byung zhes bya ba yod de/
137a3(mdo sde): de na de bzhin gshegs pa phas ma pham pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa'
137a4(mdo sde): rgyal tshab phas ma pham pa zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rdul ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mngon rtogs zhes
137a5(mdo sde): bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mi 'jigs pa zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab
137a6(mdo sde): chags na 'jig rten gyi khams spos 'das zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po mtha' yas mu med spos zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la
137a7(mdo sde): chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab spos mchog dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams
137b1(mdo sde): grong khyer zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam dag rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom
137b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sgron ma 'chang zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams mchog ces bya ba yod
137b3(mdo sde): de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang
137b4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu rab gnas zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams dga' ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
137b5(mdo sde): pa dga' ba 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rtul bas byin ces
137b6(mdo sde): bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po rnam dag ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes
137b7(mdo sde): la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rin chen lhun po zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams mdzes
138a1(mdo sde): pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mdzes pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan
138a2(mdo sde): 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mdzes pa chen po'i dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams dri zhim zhes bya ba yod de/
138a3(mdo sde): de na de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab
138a4(mdo sde): tshangs pa'i nga ro zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams dbang po'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa thogs
138a5(mdo sde): pa med pa'i spyan zhes bya bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dbang pos byin zhes bya ba btang
138a6(mdo sde): ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas 'byung gnas zhes bya ba
138a7(mdo sde): bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha byon tan byin zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab
138b1(mdo sde): chags na 'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dpal zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos
138b2(mdo sde): kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ye shes bsags zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs zhes
138b3(mdo sde): bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa legs par bsam pa'i smon lam yongs su grub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ /bcom ldan 'das
138b4(mdo sde): des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab smon lam mtha' yas zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams grong khyer brgyan pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba
138b5(mdo sde): yod de| de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par dag pa'i dkyil 'khor rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub
138b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' rgyal tshab lhun po rnam dag ces bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams ye shes 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
138b7(mdo sde): pa ye shes spos zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ye shes 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya
139a1(mdo sde): ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams khang pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa khang pa sde zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho
139a2(mdo sde): zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ye shes rnam par sems zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na
139a3(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams ye shes spos zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes brtsegs pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/
139a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ye shes 'byung gnas zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs kyi lhun po
139a5(mdo sde): zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems
139a6(mdo sde): dpa' rgyal tshab phyogs su rnam par grags pa zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan rab gnas zhes bya ba yod de/ de na
139a7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa bde bdag ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab chos kyi
139b1(mdo sde): sgron ma zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams grags dga' zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rdul bral mchog ces bya ba bzhugs
139b2(mdo sde): te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mi mjed kyi bdag po zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig
139b3(mdo sde): rten gyi khams pad+ma mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par 'phags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes
139b4(mdo sde): la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dri ma med pa zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan
139b5(mdo sde): mtha' yas 'byung zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa sems can gyi bsam pa yang dag par ston pa'i khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la
139b6(mdo sde): chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshal chos kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams dga'
139b7(mdo sde): ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mtha' yas zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems
140a1(mdo sde): dpa' rgyal tshab dpa' ba zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams so sor bag yangs zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin
140a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa thams cad rtser 'jug rtsom pa'i khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa'
140a3(mdo sde): rgyal tshab rtag tu brtsams pa'i go cha zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams shin tu so sor yang dag gnas zhes bya ba yod de/ de na
140a4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa thogs pa med pa'i 'od zer pad+ma sangs rgyas mngon par 'phags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sa'i nga ro zhes bya ba btang ngo /
140a5(mdo sde): /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams chu klung gang+gA'i bye ma snyed 'das
140a6(mdo sde): pa na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan kun dang ldan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa bdud thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi sku yang dag par ston pa'i khyu
140a7(mdo sde): mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bltas pa'i byang
140b1(mdo sde): chub tu nges pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i snying stobs kyi go cha bgos zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' des
140b2(mdo sde): snang ba chen po de mthong ste/ gsung bsal ba'i sgra de'ang thos so/ /thos nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'od de dang / gsung
140b3(mdo sde): bsal ba'i sgra 'di su'i lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ nub phyogs kyi phyogs char 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa stong dag 'das
140b4(mdo sde): pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i
140b5(mdo sde): sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs kyi chos kyang ston te/ mthu de lta bu 'di ni/ de'i yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de la byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bltas pa'i byang chub tu
140b6(mdo sde): nges pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i snying stobs kyi go cha bgos kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi pa
140b7(mdo sde): dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i slad du 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bdag mche bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/
141a1(mdo sde): de'i dus la da bab par shes na song zhig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bltas pa'i byang chub tu nges pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i snying stobs kyi go cha
141a2(mdo sde): bgos kyis pad+ma brgyad blangs nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su gtor to/ /de nas pad+ma de dag 'jig rten
141a3(mdo sde): gyi khams thams cad 'das te/ 'jig rten gyi bar dag las 'das nas rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan+ta ka gnas pa ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga
141a4(mdo sde): la ba der so sor yang dag par 'khod do/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i 'khor bzhi po'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyis de dag mthong nas
141a5(mdo sde): kyang ngo mtshar du 'dzin par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la pad+ma de dag gis lan gsum bskor ba byas nas spyan sngar 'khod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
141a6(mdo sde): kyis phyag g.yas pas pad+ma de dag la reg par mdzad nas reg pa tsam gyis pad+ma de dag las kyang byang chub sems dpa'i lus dag mngon par byung ngo / /byung nas
141a7(mdo sde): kyang bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod nas mi snang bar gyur to/ /bam po brgyad pa/ mtha' yas mkhyen mnga'
141b1(mdo sde): gang zag khyu mchog gtso/ /rang byung mtha' yas chos rnams thugs su chud/ /khyod kyi rdzu 'phrul mtha' yas rgya chen gda'/ /'jig rten khams rnams kun tu snang bar mdzad//
141b2(mdo sde): de dag sangs rgyas kyi ni mtshan thos nas/ /zhu ba'i khyad par kun tu zhu ba dang / /sangs rgyas blta dang phyag kyang bgyi slad du/ /mkhas pa de dag rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis mchis/ /
141b3(mdo sde): byang chub go bgos dpa' bo gang mchis dag /mi mjed 'jig rten khams su rab gnas pa/ /de dag skye ba gcig gis thogs pa ste/ /de dag ming dang gzugs dang grags
141b4(mdo sde): pas 'phags/ /de dag go cha'i dngos pos mi 'jigs shing / /sems can smin pa'i slad du yang dag zhugs/ /byang chub mchog la ji ltar reg gyur pa/ /'jig rten rnam
141b5(mdo sde): 'dren mchog la de dag zhu/ /ci slad mngon du chos tshol bgyid ce na/ /bdud rnams gzhom dang byang chub 'thob slad du/ /de nas zhu ba zhu ba'i sprul pa rnams/ /gang yin
141b6(mdo sde): de la shAkya thub pas gsungs/ /'dren pas yang dag tshig gis de bstan nas/ /mi mchog de yi tshig rnams thos gyur te/ /dga' zhing mgu la rjes su yi rang nas/ /bde gshegs
141b7(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal de dag 'khod par gyur/ /sprul pa de dag der ni mi snang nas/ /gang dag de bzhin gshegs la zhu zhu ba/ /de dag gang nas mchi zhing ming ci zhes/ /de tshe 'khor
142a1(mdo sde): kyang spu rnams zing zhes byed/ /'khor rnams bzhi po de dag gus pa yis/ /rgyal ba la ni zhu bar mi spro ste/ /de tshe 'jig rten mgon po'i sprul pa sprul/ /de
142a2(mdo sde): tshe dge slong kun dga' bzang po byung / /mgon po zhu ba 'di zhu de dag gang / /zhus nas kyang ni mi gda' ma mthong gyur/ /de dag su lags de dag su yi lags/ /mgon po
142a3(mdo sde): bshad cing the tshom bsal du gsol/ /smon lam dpa' bo ldan pa'i go cha ltos/ /de yis byin gyis brlabs nas 'dir lhags te/ /shar phyogs kyi ni 'jig rten khams
142a4(mdo sde): kyi tshul| |grangs med dag nas de dag lhags pa yin/ /dpa' bo 'jig rten phan phyir gang lhags pa/ /rnam par bltas nas dong bar gyur pa ste/ /bsam pa dag pa byang
142a5(mdo sde): chub phyir spyod pa/ /de yi smon lam de ni de 'dra'o/ /de dag dge bas nges par sangs rgyas mthong / /de dag 'dir ni de la sgyid mi lug /tshul khrims kyis kyang dman
142a6(mdo sde): par mi 'gyur te/ /thos pa mang zhing pha rol phyin pas 'phags/ /de dag thabs shes pa la shin tu bslab/ /mngal gyi gnas su 'gro bar mi 'gyur te/ /'khor ba'i
142a7(mdo sde): tshe na tshe rabs tshe rabs su/ /de dag chos kyi sems rgyud brjed mi 'gyur/ /rtag tu sangs rgyas rnams dang mngon du phrad/ /rtag tu 'phags pa rnams dang 'grogs par
142b1(mdo sde): 'gyur| |dpa' bo de yis sems can 'dir mthong rnams/ /rtag tu de la rab tu 'byung ba 'thob/ /mthong ma thag tu dge bas de 'dra ste/ /gang dag gzhan ma brjod pa de dag mang /
142b2(mdo sde): dpa' bo de yi yon tan gang yod pa/ /mang du bsgrags kyang mthar thug 'gyur ba med/ /dpa' bo shin tu gnas pa de yi ming / /de tshe bud med gang gis thos gyur pa/ /de ni
142b3(mdo sde): phyin chad bud med dngos mi 'gyur/ /sems can dam pa'i mchog tu de 'gyur ro/ /skyes pa bud med gang gis ming thos shing / /thos nas de la'ang dga' ba skyed byed la/ /
142b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas zhing der smon lam 'debs byed pa/ /lus zhig nas ni der yang skye bar 'gyur/ /zhing yang dag par skye bar 'gyur ba yin/ /skyes pa bud med 'on te gzhan yang
142b5(mdo sde): rung / /gang gis ming thos nam zhig dad byed pa/ /thams cad byang chub ched las nyams mi 'gyur/ /gang dag gcer bu'i sems can ma gtogs par/ /thos nas su zhig
142b6(mdo sde): dga' ba skye mi 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas kyis kyang de ni yongs ma gsungs/ /'on kyang de dag dge dang ldan par 'gyur/ /gang dag bsam pas ming yang thos pa ni/ /ji ltar rtsi
142b7(mdo sde): yis skyon rnams sel byed bzhin/ /sems can de dag gis ni der mthong ba/ /byang chub don du nges 'gyur the tshom med/ /gang zhig pa la sha yi 'dab thogs shing / /de
143a1(mdo sde): dang der ni rtsi dag byed gyur na/ /de tshe kun nas sman gyi stobs kyis su/ /sus kyang der ni me la tshig mi 'gyur/ /gang tshe sprul gdug gzi brjid drag po
143a2(mdo sde): yis| |dug gang de dag mi gdug byed 'gyur te/ /sa yi steng nas kun tu ston byed na/ /de 'dra'i sman brkos pas ni ci zhig bya/ /sprul gdug dri ni gang dag snom byed pa/ /
143a3(mdo sde): sprul de thams cad 'chi ba'i dus byed 'gyur/ /de ltar rtsi sman 'dra ba'i mi de ni/ /ming gis sangs rgyas mdzad pa byed par 'gyur/ /de tshe phyogs bcu dag tu bsgrags pa
143a4(mdo sde): na| |dpa' bo de yi ming ni sus thos pa/ /de yi ming gis las ni 'di byed de/ /bud med gang zag la ni reg mi 'gyur/ /gang gis mthong dang bsti stang byed cing smos/ /de ni
143a5(mdo sde): rgyal bas dge slong gang sprul pa/ /kun dga' bzang po zhes ni bya ba des/ /rgyal bas de skad bsgrags pa de 'dra ba/ /byang chub zhugs pa su mchis de la zhus/ /kun dga'
143a6(mdo sde): bzang po go cha dpa' bo'i ming / /'jig rten khams 'dir yod ces ngas thos na/ /zhum pa med pa'i yid kyis brjod par bya/ /de ltar bde bar gshegs pas zab bstan
143a7(mdo sde): pa| |rgyal ba'i byang chub yid ches dka' ba yi/ /sems can dge ba chung dang ldan pa lhags/ /da ltar nga yi tshe ni cung zad gnas/ /kun dga' 'di na sems can mchog
143b1(mdo sde): yod de| |de ring kho nar 'khor du lhags par gyur/ /'jig rten mgon po gang dag 'dir lhags pa'i/ /go cha bsngags pa phyogs bcur bzlog mi nus/ /kun dga' bzang
143b2(mdo sde): skyong rin chen 'byung gnas dang / /dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang ni ded dpon bzang / /yon tan sbas pa mkhas dang de bzhin du/ /dpa' bo bzang stobs gang yin de la
143b3(mdo sde): ltos| |chu zhes bya ba dang ni chu lha dang / /bzang skyong de bzhin dge slong ci 'dra rnams/ /ji ltar skyob 'gyur dge slong de dag ltos/ /de dag rnams kyi go cha de bsam yas/ /don
143b4(mdo sde): yod ces ni yongs su bsgrags gyur pa/ /de dag gis ni don yod go cha bgos/ /de dag mthong ba'ang don yod 'gyur yin na/ /de dag bsnyen bkur byed pa smos ci dgos/ /
143b5(mdo sde): kun dga' gang su dag gis de dag mthong / /gang dag su yis ming yang thos gyur pa/ /de dag nam yang byang chub dogs pa med/ /de dag nam du'ang log par ltung mi 'gyur/
143b6(mdo sde): de dag thams cad brtson pas tshogs pa yin/ /de dag thams cad shes pas tshogs par gyur/ /rtag tu tshul khrims phung pos de rtag gnas/ /thams cad theg pa mchog
143b7(mdo sde): la de ltar 'dud/ /kun dga' sangs rgyas zhing 'dir phyogs bcu yi/ /'jig rten da ltar gang dag su gnas pa/ /dpa' bo de yi go cha 'dod gyur pa/ /de la rgyal ba kun gyis
144a1(mdo sde): bsngags pa brjod/ /gang gis bsngags brjod rgyal ba de dag kyang / /byang chub sems dpas de tshe der shes te/ /shAkya khyu mchog 'jig rten mgon po
144a2(mdo sde): dang / /byang chub zhugs pa'i dpa' bo dag blta 'o/ /de thos nas kyang gsol ba btab gyur pa/ /mgon po mi mjed 'jig rten khams su mchi/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi sku la
144a3(mdo sde): bskor byas nas/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad lhags/ /dge slong de dag gi yang ming thos nas/ /de tshe byang chub mchog tu 'dun pa bskyed/ /gang dag ming
144a4(mdo sde): dang 'dun pas byang chub zhugs/ /de dag rgyal bas byang chub der lung bstan/ /bskal ba grangs med dag tu las byas shing / /mi dge bsgrubs pa gang dag su yod pa/ /
144a5(mdo sde): de phyir snyigs ma'i dus na de dag ni/ /nga dang lhan cig sangs rgyas zhing du lhags/ /nga yis byang chub mchog 'di thob gyur kyang / /de tshe sems can blta bar spro ba med/ /
144a6(mdo sde): gang dag phyi dus dge slong rnams 'byung ba/ /rtsub dang gtum dang shin tu rtsub pa yin/ /de tshe kun tu 'jigs pa thos nas su/ /yang dang yang du brtson 'grus stobs
144a7(mdo sde): bskyed cing / /mu ge'i dus su zan rjen sbyin pa byin/ /de dag rnams kyi sbyin pa rtsub pa yin/ /de dag 'di la gus pa che byas nas/ /phyi dus 'jigs pa chen po de yi
144b1(mdo sde): tshe| |srog kyang btang nas don ni bya snyam ste/ /nga yi chos mchog spel zhing 'dzin par byed/ /dus de na ni mi dge'i las rnams kyi/ /smon lam gnas kyang 'jig rten dag na yod/ /
144b2(mdo sde): 'di na las de dag ni byas pa na/ /de yi tshe na brnyas pa'i tshul du 'gyur/ /de dag der ni 'di 'dra'i chos thos nas/ /de tshe der ni chos min 'du shes 'gyur/ /chos 'di rgyal bas
144b3(mdo sde): gsungs pa ma yin zhes/ /'jig rten phyin ci log la kun dga' ltos/ /de tshe dge slong slob pas 'du byed la/ /rtag pa cung zad med ces skyo thob pas/ /de tshe mgo la me
144b4(mdo sde): 'bar bzhin du rtogs/ /'chi med thob par bya phyir ma lus brtsal/ /bstan 'di rab tu rnam par 'jig thos nas/ /der ni lha yang sdug bsngal dag tu gyur/ /de tshe 'jigs
144b5(mdo sde): pa mthong na mi rung zhes/ /de lta'i dus su shi yang bla snyam sems/ /bag tsha med pa'i sgrog pa sgrog pa yi/ /drang srong che de de ring bdag cag mthong / /'dren pa mchog gi zhal
144b6(mdo sde): du lha byed cing / /kye ma rgyal bas bshad ces yi rang ngo / /dge slong bsam gtan byed pa dag kyang mthong / /dbang thob rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis mkhas gyur pa/ /'di na ting
144b7(mdo sde): 'dzin shes rab pha rol phyin/ /de dag phyi ma'i dus su ji ltar mthong / /sdig pa'i dge slong stobs dang ldan 'gyur zhing / /de'i tshe tshul ldan shin tu tshar bcad 'gyur/ /gnas
145a1(mdo sde): khang gnas pa tshegs kyis 'thob 'gyur zhing / /de tshe lha yid shin tu mi dga' 'gyur/ /kye ma kye ma bstan pa rab tu 'jig /gang gi don du de tshe dka' spyod
145a2(mdo sde): pa| |de dag dge slong sdig pas tshar bcad 'gyur/ /bstan pa 'jig par 'gyur ba 'di la ltos/ /'dir ni phan tshun kun tu dga' bar 'gyur/ /nges pa rnams la de dag
145a3(mdo sde): bsngags min brjod/ /sangs rgyas la ni 'khrug long byed pa dag /de dag khyim na gnas par 'dzin par 'gyur/ /dge bsnyen ma dang 'dre bar byed 'gyur zhing / /de na de
145a4(mdo sde): dag lag pa gcig tu byed/ /rgyal ba'i bstan la ma gus gyur nas su/ /byang chub mchog kyang spong bar byed par 'gyur/ /dkon mchog gsum la mchog tu 'tshe
145a5(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ /de dag rtag tu nges pa rnams kyis spongs/ /khyu mchog rwa chag ma gyur ma rungs pa/ /de bzhin tshul khrims ldan pas rnam par spongs/ /de tshe tshul khrims
145a6(mdo sde): ldan pa dpyas 'gyur zhing / /de tshe dge slong sdig pas brnyes tshul 'gyur/ /'jigs chen phyin ci log gi dus su ni/ /skyo ba thob byos bag kyang yod par gyis/ /bde
145a7(mdo sde): bar gshegs pa'i bstan la brtson 'grus skyed/ /de tshe 'jigs pa chen po 'byung bar 'gyur/ /sdig pa'i dge slong rnams dang phrad ma byed/ /de yi tshe na sdug bsngal
145b1(mdo sde): gnas par 'gyur/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bltas pa'i byang chub tu nges pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i snying stobs kyi go cha bgos 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu stobs
145b2(mdo sde): dang ldan pa zhig gis lag pa bskum pa rkyong bar byed pa'am/ brkyang ba skum par byed pa'i skad cig des de nas mi snang bar gyur nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir
145b3(mdo sde): 'ongs te/ de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te bcom ldan 'das la
145b4(mdo sde): 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas
145b5(mdo sde): sam zhes de bzhin gshegs pa bdud thams cad la sku kun tu ston pa'i khyu mchog snyun gsol lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ ci
145b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de snyun mi mnga'am/ stobs dang ldan nam/ 'gyur ba mi mnga'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta lags so/ /'jig rten gyi khams de'i yang
145b7(mdo sde): 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams mtshan ldan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan med nga ro zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang
146a1(mdo sde): ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab tshangs dbyangs nga ro zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams
146a2(mdo sde): 'dzin med ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan ma med pa'i nga ro zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang
146a3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mtshan nyid gcig pas mchod ces bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams mtshan nyid med pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba yod
146a4(mdo sde): de| de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab
146a5(mdo sde): pad+ma rab tu gtor ba'i char pa zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa
146a6(mdo sde): rin chen 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sna tshogs brtsegs
146a7(mdo sde): zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams 'jam pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rdul med blo gros zhes bya ba bzhugs te
146b1(mdo sde): 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mu khyud 'dzin ces bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi
146b2(mdo sde): khams me tog ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes me tog 'byung zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des
146b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshabs 'dzin rab gnas zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams nam mkha' rnam par dag pa ces bya ba yod de/
146b4(mdo sde): de na de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems
146b5(mdo sde): dpa' rgyal tshab rin chen gdugs zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams mtshan ma med pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa
146b6(mdo sde): rab tu zhi ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ut+pa la zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang
146b7(mdo sde): 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rdul med khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos
147a1(mdo sde): kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sems pa med ces bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten
147a2(mdo sde): gyi khams rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba thams cad so sor bag yangs zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston
147a3(mdo sde): te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab zab mo 'gyur byed ces bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan 'byung gnas
147a4(mdo sde): zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan
147a5(mdo sde): 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab 'gro ba 'dzin ces bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams bde ldan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na
147a6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal
147a7(mdo sde): tshab rnam par rgyal pa'i sde zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams gnod med ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'jigs
147b1(mdo sde): par gshegs pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dpa' bo zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang
147b2(mdo sde): 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams ut+pa la dmar pos khebs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyis rgyags mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes
147b3(mdo sde): la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab spos mchog lhun po zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams kha lo
147b4(mdo sde): sgyur ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas gzigs zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems
147b5(mdo sde): dpa' rgyal tshab rtul ba mtha' yas zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams tshogs chen zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'jigs
147b6(mdo sde): pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rnam par gnon ces bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang
147b7(mdo sde): 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams 'jigs shing 'jigs su rung bas mi 'jigs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'jigs pa brnyes pa zhes bya ba
148a1(mdo sde): bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab phyogs su rab grags zhes bya ba btang
148a2(mdo sde): ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba sgron ma zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos
148a3(mdo sde): kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mngon du 'gro zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rab snang zhes
148a4(mdo sde): bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa me sgron zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal
148a5(mdo sde): tshab me 'dzin ces bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu 'bar zhes bya ba bzhugs te
148a6(mdo sde): 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rnam par bsgrags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang
148a7(mdo sde): 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'dren ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu gyen du gshegs zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la
148b1(mdo sde): chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shes rab mchog ces bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams spos can zhes
148b2(mdo sde): bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mchog gi nor bu zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal
148b3(mdo sde): tshab rab kyi blo gros zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje 'byung zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rnam par gnon
148b4(mdo sde): ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab yon tan 'byung gnas zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang
148b5(mdo sde): 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams nga ro can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dbang phyug rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos
148b6(mdo sde): kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sred med kyi bu zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams dga' 'byung zhes
148b7(mdo sde): bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi stobs gyis rnam par bsgrags zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des
149a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab smon lam rnam par bsgrags zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams bde 'byung zhes bya
149a2(mdo sde): ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa bde mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal
149a3(mdo sde): tshab skar rgyal zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams skya rengs zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgyal po'i 'od ces
149a4(mdo sde): bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ded dpon zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags
149a5(mdo sde): na 'jig rten gyi khams tog bzang po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dpal bzang po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/
149a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rnam par rgyal ba'i sde zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams tshangs pa'i dpal
149a7(mdo sde): zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs dbyangs nga ro zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub
149b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' rgyal tshab rin chen dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin
149b2(mdo sde): chen me tog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rin chen dbang phyug ces bya ba btang
149b3(mdo sde): ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma'i dpal zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes
149b4(mdo sde): la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab pad+ma dpal gyi snying po zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams
149b5(mdo sde): 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des
149b6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ye shes brtson 'grus zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin
149b7(mdo sde): gshegs pa bde ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab bde byed ces bya ba btang
150a1(mdo sde): ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams shi 'phos med ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma mngon 'phags dpal zhes bya
150a2(mdo sde): ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab me tog bzang zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags
150a3(mdo sde): na 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu g.yo ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rtag tu dpung mgo mtho ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston
150a4(mdo sde): te| bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rtag tu spro ba zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rtag tu kun tu 'khrugs
150a5(mdo sde): zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rtsi'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems
150a6(mdo sde): dpa' rgyal tshab snying rje chen po'i go cha zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams brtan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
150a7(mdo sde): pa dmigs pa mtha' yas pas gnas pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab
150b1(mdo sde): shin tu rab gnas zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas skabs kyi mtshan nyid ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa khyu
150b2(mdo sde): mchog mtha' yas zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab tshogs chen zhes bya ba btang ngo //
150b3(mdo sde): de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams bai DUr+ya'i 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer mtha' yas zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la
150b4(mdo sde): chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sems tshad med pa'i go cha zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi
150b5(mdo sde): khams gser 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spyan mtha' yas zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des
150b6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mig che zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams ma smad pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa
150b7(mdo sde): dmigs pa kun gyi khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dga' bo zhes bya
151a1(mdo sde): ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams gdugs kyis khebs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa tshogs mchog
151a2(mdo sde): mtha' yas khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab spyan ras gzigs
151a3(mdo sde): nges pa'i go cha zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rgyu skar gyi phreng ba can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rgyu skar gyi
151a4(mdo sde): rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab pad+ma'i dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i
151a5(mdo sde): yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen dra bas khebs zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rgyu skar rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing
151a6(mdo sde): gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab pad+ma'i dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi
151a7(mdo sde): khams me tog ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spos mchog dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das
151b1(mdo sde): des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab lag na pad+ma zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams gser can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
151b2(mdo sde): pa nam mkha'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mig rnam par dag ces bya ba btang
151b3(mdo sde): ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dag ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par 'phags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho
151b4(mdo sde): zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mig ces bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan
151b5(mdo sde): med ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa gsung mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems
151b6(mdo sde): dpa' rgyal tshab 'od byed ces bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rgyu skar zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po mngon du
151b7(mdo sde): 'phags pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu rab gnas zhes bya ba btang ngo / /
152a1(mdo sde): de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rgyal mtshan sna tshogs zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa thogs pa med pa'i spyan
152a2(mdo sde): zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sna tshogs sde zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab
152a3(mdo sde): chags na 'jig rten gyi khams sbos kyi ngad la dang zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/
152a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams spos can zhes bya ba
152a5(mdo sde): yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa skar mda' 'dzin ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal
152a6(mdo sde): tshab yid gnyis rnam par 'joms zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams tsan+dan spos zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan
152a7(mdo sde): nyid gnyis pa'i tog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab grags pa'i sde zhes bya ba btang
152b1(mdo sde): ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams dga' ba bzang po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs
152b2(mdo sde): te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dgra rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig
152b3(mdo sde): rten gyi khams dga' 'byung zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des
152b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab don gyi blo gros zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par bsgrags zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
152b5(mdo sde): pa rnam par bsgrags pa'i stobs kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dpa' bo
152b6(mdo sde): zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgyal po'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs
152b7(mdo sde): te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab don gyi blo gros zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig
153a1(mdo sde): rten gyi khams shin tu rnam par bsgoms zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen me zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang
153a2(mdo sde): ston te| bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dpas byin zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams yid gnyis mnan
153a3(mdo sde): ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yid gnyis thams cad yang dag par 'joms 'byung zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom
153a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mi 'jigs pa zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan can zhes bya ba yod de/
153a5(mdo sde): de na de bzhin gshegs pa rim pa'i sras zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sgron
153a6(mdo sde): ma 'dzin ces bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams bzang ldan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa tog gi rgyal po zhes bya ba
153a7(mdo sde): bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab bshes gnyen zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab
153b1(mdo sde): chags na 'jig rten gyi khams spos mchog ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i dpal 'byung zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/
153b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ye shes rab mchog ces bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams tog bzang po zhes bya ba yod
153b3(mdo sde): de| de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer rab btang zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab thams
153b4(mdo sde): cad bshes gnyen zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams sprin chen zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa zhes bya ba
153b5(mdo sde): bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab skar rgyal zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na
153b6(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma snang ba'i 'od zer ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/
153b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab chos 'phags zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams nyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/
154a1(mdo sde): de na de bzhin gshegs pa spyod pa khyad par can zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems
154a2(mdo sde): dpa' rgyal tshab mngon du 'phags zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams dbang po'i gnas zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mtha'
154a3(mdo sde): yas rnam par gnon ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab bshes gnyen grags ldan
154a4(mdo sde): zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho'i lhun po mngon du 'phags zhes bya
154a5(mdo sde): ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dkon mchog 'byung gnas zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i
154a6(mdo sde): yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams dga' ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang
154a7(mdo sde): ston te| bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dbang po zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rtag tu brgyan ces bya
154b1(mdo sde): bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba don yod ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal
154b2(mdo sde): tshab dpa' ba'i dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par bsgrags zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa thogs med
154b3(mdo sde): dbyangs kyi nga ro zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu rab gnas zhes bya ba btang ngo //
154b4(mdo sde): de'i 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rtag tu rab brjod ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan dpag tu med pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing
