396b7(mdo sde): sems can rnams kyis chos rab tu shes so/ /thabs mkhas pas chos rnams rab tu shes so/ /'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams rab tu shes so/ /'jig rten dang
397a1(mdo sde): 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes rnams rab tu shes so/ /gsol pa/ ye shes nyid rtogs nas mya ngan las 'das pa gang rab tu 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das
397a2(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde/ chos rab tu shes nas chos rnams rab tu shes so/ /sman gyi sde/ de bzhin du dam pa'i chos bsdu ba rab tu shes nas rnyed pa dang po skye'o/ /chos ji
397a3(mdo sde): ltar thos pa bzhin du bzung nas chos dang ldan pa nyid rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /sman gyi sde/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mi tshong bar gyur pa la la zhig mi khur stong gi gser khyer te de khe spogs
397a4(mdo sde): kyi phyir song ba dang / de'i pha ma 'di skad smra ste/ bu/ nyon cig /gser srang stong khyer la gzhan dang rang gi gser legs par khyer cig /tshong pa des gser khyer te song nas zla ba gcig
397a5(mdo sde): tsam lon pa dang gser de dag thams cad chud gsan te med par byas kyi 'og tu de nas mi des bsam pa dang / shin tu mi dga' nas snying la mya ngan gyi zug rngus zug ste/ de gnod zhing
397a6(mdo sde): ngo tsha nas rang gi khyim du ma song ba dang / de'i pha mas thos nas yi chad de/ snying la mya ngan gyi zug rngus zug nas gos dag kyang dral te bu ngan pa de bdag cag gi khyim du bu'i gzugs su
397a7(mdo sde): skyes nas khyim sa kun kyang bshig ste/ bdag cag la mkho ba med cing sdug bsngal bar byas so/ /bran gyi las byed du bcug go /zhes de skad smre sngags 'don te/ de'i pha ma yi chad
397b1(mdo sde): nas 'chi ba'i dus byas pa dang / de nas bu des pha ma bdag la yi chad de 'chi ba'i dus byas so/ /zhes thos nas bu de'ang yi chad de 'chi ba'i dus byas pa de bzhin du/ sman gyi sde/ de bzhin
397b2(mdo sde): gshegs pas don 'di bshad pa la'ang gang dag nga'i bstan pa la mi dad pa de dag ni/ re thag chad nas 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe snying la mya ngan gyi zug rngus zug ste 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro/ /ji
397b3(mdo sde): ltar pha ma de dag yi chad de gser gyi phyir mya ngan byed cing / snying la mya ngan gyi zug rngus zug nas gzhan dang rang gi gser gyi phyir mya ngan gyi zug rngu dang ldan pa de bzhin du/ sman gyi sde/ gang dag
397b4(mdo sde): nga'i bstan pa la ma dad pa de dag ni/ phyis 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe gdung zhing smre sngags 'don la sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong zhing / sngon las byas pa'i bsod nams dag chud zos nas phyin chad
397b5(mdo sde): zhing bzang po dang ldan pa'i bsod nams dag mi byed de/ de dag gi snying mya ngan gyi zug rngu dang ldan pas de'i tshe de'i dus na sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye ngas dang / gshin rje'i
397b6(mdo sde): 'jig rten dud skye zhing / mi bzad pa drag po mthong nas 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe 'di snyam du sems te/ gang sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dwags dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten mthong
397b7(mdo sde): bar mi 'gyur zhing sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba de myong bar mi 'gyur bar bdag la su zhig skyabs su 'gyur snyam pa dang / de'i pha mas 'di skad ces smras so/ /bu gcig nad kyi 'jigs chen ni/ /
398a1(mdo sde): 'byung bar mi nus ji ltar bya/ /na ba 'chi bas 'jigs mod kyi/ /bu khyod 'chi ba yod ma yin/ /nad kyis 'jigs dang skrag pa las/ /khyod ni thar par 'gyur
398a2(mdo sde): ba yin| |bdag ni rnam par shes pa 'gag / bdag gi lus la rab tu gnod/ /yan lag thams cad sdug bsngal te/ /bdag gis 'chi ba mthong bar gyur/ /bdag gis mig ni mi mthong
398a3(mdo sde): zhing | |bdag gi rna ba'ang mi thos so/ /sna yang thob par mi 'gyur te/ /lus kyang zo mdog bde ma yin/ /yan lag nying lag sdug bsngal te/ /shing dang 'dra bas sems pa med/ /bdag
398a4(mdo sde): gi 'chi ba 'od med ces/ /yum gyis bdag gi spro bsring zad/ /mas smras pa/ bu khyod de skad smra mi rigs/ /nga la mchog tu 'jigs ma byed/ /khyod kyi lus la rims btab pas//
398a5(mdo sde): rnam pa sna tshogs mthong bar 'gyur/ /bus smras pa/ lus la rims kyang ma mthong ste/ /na ba med cing sdug bsngal med/ /'chi ba shin tu mi bzad mthong / /bdag gi lus sdug
398a6(mdo sde): bcom par gyur/ /bdag gi lus kun sdug bsngal gyis/ /rab tu gzir bar mthong gyur na/ /su la skyabs su 'gro bar bya/ /bdag gi skyob par su zhig 'gyur/ /pha mas smras pa bu
398a7(mdo sde): khyod la| |lha yang rab tu bkyon gyur gyi/ /lha rnams la ni mchod byas na/ /de yi 'og tu 'tsho bar gyur/ /bus smras pa/ gang gis bdag ni 'tsho 'gyur ba/ /khyod kyis de ltar mdzad
398b1(mdo sde): du gsol/ /rings shing rab tu myur bzhud la/ /lha bon po la dri bar gsol/ /de nas de'i pha ma lha'i rten gyi drung du song nas lha la bdug pa phul ba dang / de nas lha bon pos lha la
398b2(mdo sde): bdug pa phul nas / tshig 'di skad ces smras so/ /khyod la lha bkyon gyi/ lha rjed cig /mchod sbyin gyis shig /de la phyugs sod cig /mi yang sod cig dang / de nas khyed kyi bu nad las
398b3(mdo sde): yongs su thar par 'gyur ro/ /de nas pha ma de dag gis bsam pa/ bdag cag ni/ dbul na ji ltar bya/ gal te lha ma mnyes na ni/ bu de'ang 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur /ci ste mnyes
398b4(mdo sde): bar bya na/ bdag cag ni| dbul bas mi dang phyugs gang nas blang snyam nas de dag rings shing myur bar khyim du dong ste/ khyim gyi rdzas cung zad ci bdog pa de thams cad phyugs nyo
398b5(mdo sde): ba'i phyir 'tshong du dong ngo / /de nas mi gzhan zhig gi gan du phyin nas/ kye skyes bu/ gser zhig bskyir byin/ skyin pa ni/ zhag bcu nas slar 'bul nus na ni/ legs/ ci ste 'bul ma
398b6(mdo sde): nus na'ang nged khyed kyi bran du khas blangs te las bya'o/ /zhes de skad smras nas de gnyis kyis gser de khyer te mi nyor dong ngo / /de gnyis kyis mi nyos nas mi des kyang bdag gsad par
398b7(mdo sde): ni| ma shes so/ /de nas pha ma rmongs par gyur pa de gnyis slar rang gi khyim du ma dong gi /lha rten gyi drung du song ste/ lha bon po la da myur du mchod sbyin mdzod cig ces smras so/ /de nas
399a1(mdo sde): pha ma de gnyis bdag nyid kyis phyugs kyang bsad/ mi de'ang bsad do/ /de nas lha bon po des mchod sbyin bya bar bsam ste me bus pa dang / de nas lha de babs
399a2(mdo sde): te khyod kyi bu ni/ ngas khyer ro/ /zhes smras so/ /de nas pha ma de gnyis dga' zhing mgu bas khyab nas bu 'di sos na bdag cag bran du gyur kyang bla zhes smras te/ pha mas lha la
399a3(mdo sde): mchod sbyin byas nas slar log ste rang gi khyim du phyin nas bu 'chi ba'i dus byas pa mthong ngo / /de nas pha ma de gnyis sdug bsngal zhing yi mug pa chen pos snying la mya ngan gyi zug
399a4(mdo sde): rdu zug ste yi chad par gyur nas de nyid du 'chi ba'i dus byas pa de bzhin du/ sman gyi sde/ mi dge ba'i grogs po dang bsten par mi bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ sems
399a5(mdo sde): can de dag gang du skye ba zhu'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde/ kha rog /nga la ma 'dri zhig /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ zhu'o/ /bde bar gshegs
399a6(mdo sde): pa| zhu'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde/ de la ma ni/ sems can dmyal ba chen po du 'bod du skyes so/ /pha ni/ sems can dmyal ba chen po bsdus
399a7(mdo sde): gzhom du skyes so/ /bu ni/ sems can dmyal ba chen po tsha bar skyes so/ /lha bon pho ni/ sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par skyes so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
399b1(mdo sde): mi ma nongs pa de gang du skyes/ de'i tshe slad ma gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde/ 'di la mi ma nyes pa de ni/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi nang
399b2(mdo sde): du skyes so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ rgyu gang dang / rkyen gang gis mi de sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skyes/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
399b3(mdo sde): sman gyi sde/ nyon cig /mi de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa la sems dad pas sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes lan gcig smras te/ sman gyi sde/ dge ba'i rtsa ba
399b4(mdo sde): des bskal pa drug cu'i bar du sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi bde ba myong bar 'gyur/ bskal pa brgyad cu'i bar du skye bar tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/ skye ba dang skye bar mya ngan
399b5(mdo sde): gyi zug rdu thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /skyes ma thag tu sdug bsngal thams cad zlog par byed do/ /sems can de dag thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar ni/ mi
399b6(mdo sde): nus so| |gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar rdo thogs pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi
399b7(mdo sde): sde| brtson 'grus brtsam par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ brtson 'grus brtsam pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde/ nyon cig /
400a1(mdo sde): brtson 'grus zhes bya ba ni/ 'bras bu rnams ston pa'o/ /'di lta ste/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba ni/ brtson 'grus kyi gnas so/ /lan gcig phyir
400a2(mdo sde): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba ni/ brtson 'grus kyi gnas so/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba ni/ brtson 'grus kyi gnas so/ /dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu dang / dgra
400a3(mdo sde): bcom pa'i 'bras bu 'gag pa zhes bya ba ni/ brtson 'grus kyi gnas so/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu'i shes pa zhes bya ba ni/ brtson 'grus
400a4(mdo sde): kyi gnas so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i 'bras bu dang / byang chub kyi gnas zhes bya ba ni/ brtson 'grus kyi gnas te/ sman gyi sde/ 'di dag ni/ brtson 'grus kyi gnas zhes bya'o//
400a5(mdo sde): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ rgyun du zhugs pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ji ltar bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/
400a6(mdo sde): mi la la zhig gis shing zhig bskyed na/ de nyid kyi nyin mo shing de'i rtsa ba zug nas de nyid kyi nyin mo rtsa ba de'i dpag tshad tsam gyi 'og tu song ngo / /mi gzhan zhig gis kyang de bzhin
400a7(mdo sde): du shing bskyed pa dang / de nyid kyi nyin mo rlung gis bskyod de shing de rtsa ba ma zug nas/ de nas mi des shing de phyung ba dang / mi gcig shos kyis kyang ci'i phyir nga'i sa brkos zhes
400b1(mdo sde): 'thab 'breg rtsod par gyur nas/ de'i tshe rgyal pos mi gnyis 'thab 'breg rtsod par gyur to/ /zhes thos nas rgyal po des pho nya btang ste/ song la mi de gnyis khrid de shog cig /lha/ de ltar
400b2(mdo sde): 'tshal lo/ /zhes mi de rings pa'i gzugs su brgyugs nas mi de gnyis la 'di skad ces khyed la rgyal po 'bod do/ /zhes smras pa dang / de nas mi gcig ni/ 'jigs shing skrag go /mi
400b3(mdo sde): gcig ni/ 'jigs shing skrag pa med par rgyal po ga la ba der khrid do/ /khrid nas rgyal po'i mdun du 'khod do/ /de nas rgyal pos mi de gnyis la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye/ khyed ci zhig
400b4(mdo sde): gi phyir 'thab cing rtsod par gyur/ de nas mi de gnyis langs te rgyal po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rgyal po chen po/ /gsan du gsol/ bdag cag la ni/ sa phyogs cung zad kyang ma mchis
400b5(mdo sde): kyi| g.yar po zhig la shing bskyed pa las rlung gis bskyod nas rtsa ba'ang ma zug / lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu'ang ma byung ste/ rgyal po chen po/ /de'i rtsa ba dpag tshad tsam gyi 'og tu'ang
400b6(mdo sde): ma mchis pa dang / khyod kyis nyes so/ /zhes mi 'dis bdag la thab mo brgal du bas kyi/ bdag gis ma nongs na/ lha/ de la bdag gis cung zad kyang ma nongs par mkhyen par mdzad du
400b7(mdo sde): gsol| de nas rgyal po des blon po bye ba phrag sum cu bkug ste bsags nas 'di skad ces bsgo'o/ /khyed cag smros shig /blon po rnams kyis gsol ba/ ji skad smra bar bgyi/ gang gi
401a1(mdo sde): nyin mo shing bskyed pa de nyid kyi nyin mo rtsa ba zug nas lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu 'byung ba de khyed kyis gang na'ang mthong ngam/ thos sam/ khyed kyis
401a2(mdo sde): zhag bdun nam/ zla phyed kyis 'di bye brag phyed par gyis shig /de nas blon po de dag stan las langs te rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /rgyal po chen po/ bdag cag gis
401a3(mdo sde): 'di bye brag phyed par bgyir mi rung ngo / /'di bye brag phyed par rngo mi thogs so/ /rgyal po chen po/ 'di ni/ ngo mtshar te/ re zhig mi 'di nyid la smras bar bgyi'o/ /kye skyes bu/ gang smras
401a4(mdo sde): pa'i don bden nam smros shig / smras pa/ rgyal po chen po/ don de mad do/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ gang gi nyin mo shing bskyed pa/ /de yi nyin mo rtsa zug cing / /'dab ma me tog 'bras
401a5(mdo sde): byung zhes/ /de nyid nyin mo smras ba ni/ /khyod kyis tshig 'di 'thad par dka'/ /'di 'dra mthong ba'am thos pa med/ /de nas mi des thal sbyar te/ /rgyal po de la 'di skad smras/ /gshegs
401a6(mdo sde): la nyid kyis shing bskyed de/ /rtsa ba zug la gzigs su gsol/ /de nas rgyal po de blon po bye ba phrag sum cu dang lhan cig phyi rol tu byung nas mi de gnyis kyang btson rar bcug
401a7(mdo sde): go / de nas rgyal po de nyid kyis shing bskyed pa dang / shing de rtsa ba'ang ma zug /lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu'ang ma byung nas de nas rgyal po de khros te 'di skad ces khyed myur
401b1(mdo sde): du deng la shing gsheg ba'i sta re rnams longs shig / ces smras nas blangs pa dang / de nas gang mi des bskyed pa'i shing de la khros nas shing de'i lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras
401b2(mdo sde): bu byung ba rnams bcad de shing gcig po de bcad pa dang shing bcu gnyis byung ngo / /shing bcu gnyis po bcad pa dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rtsa ba dang bcas/ lo ma dang bcas/
401b3(mdo sde): myu gu dang bcas pa nyi shu rtsa bzhi byung ngo / /de nas shing nyi shu rtsa bzhi po de dag las bya gser gyi ze ba can/ gser gyi mchu can/ rin po che sna bdun gyi 'dab ma can nyi shu rtsa bzhi
401b4(mdo sde): byung ngo / /de nas rgyal po de khro bas zil gyis non nas rang gi lag gis sta re blangs te shing de la gtsabs pa dang / shing gtsabs pa de las bdud rtsi'i chu byung ngo / /de nas rgyal po
401b5(mdo sde): de yid mi bde nas song la mi de gnyis brtson ra nas phyung zhig ces bsgo ba dang / lha/ de ltar 'tshal lo/ /zhes de'i mod la rab tu brgyugs te/ mi de gnyis brtson ra nas phyung nas
401b6(mdo sde): shing ga la ba der khrid pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ shing gcig bcang ba nyis 'gyur tu 'phel te nyi shu rtsa bzhir gyur pa de khyed kyis bskyed dam/ ngas bskyed pa'i shing ni/ rtsa ba
401b7(mdo sde): dang | lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu'ang ma skyes so/ /de nas mi des gsol pa/ rgyal po chen po bdag gi bsod nams ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i bsod nams khyod la mi
402a1(mdo sde): mnga'o| |de nas blon po bye ba phrag sum cus pus mo'i lha nga gnyis sa la btsugs nas mi de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rgyal po snga ma 'di ni/ mi rung gi /khyod kyis
402a2(mdo sde): rgyal po bya dgos so/ /de nas mi des blon po de dag la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /rgyal po longs spyod bdag mi dgos/ /nor dang 'bru yang dgos pa med/ /sangs rgyas
402a3(mdo sde): rnams la bdag dad pas/ /rkang gnyis dag gi mchog tu shog /zhi ba mya ngan 'das pa'i dbyings/ /gang na de bzhin gshegs par 'gro /mya ngan 'das khyim 'gro 'gyur ba/ /
402a4(mdo sde): chos 'di khyed la bshad par bya/ /skyil mo krung ni bcas nas su/ /de nas yi dam rab bcas so/ /bdag gis sngon byas las rnams kyis/ /rgyal po'i btson rar phyin par
402a5(mdo sde): gyur| |smon lam 'di ni btab pas na/ /bdag gi las ni zad par gyur/ /de nas bya bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa bzhis rdo rje'i mchus sil snyan rnams dkrol to/ /de nas de'i tshe de'i dus
402a6(mdo sde): na khang pa brtsegs pa sum khri nyis stong byung ste/ khang pha brtsegs pa re re'i tshad kyang dpag tshad nyi shu rtsa lnga lnga bar gyur to/ /khang pa brtsegs pa re re las kyang bya gser gyi ze
402a7(mdo sde): bcan| gser gyi mchu can/ gser gyi gdong can bye ba phrag nyi shu lnga lnga byung ste de dag gis mi'i skad du smras pa/ rgyal po khyod kyis legs ma byas/ /khyod kyis shing de
402b1(mdo sde): bcad pas na/ /bye ba brgya yi shing rnams las/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhir gnas par gyur/ /sems can gang gis shing bskyed 'di/ /ci 'dra shes pa ma yin pa/ /sdig pa'i las kyis phyin chad kyang //
402b2(mdo sde): mi sdug 'bras bu myong bar 'gyur/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ bdag gis don 'di mi shes kyi/ /dka' thub chen po lung ston cig /bya rnams kyis smras pa/ 'di ni 'jig rten snang byed de/ /rnam
402b3(mdo sde): par 'dren par 'gyur ba yin/ /'khor ba'i srid ba'i brtson ra las/ /sems can thams cad thar byed pa'o/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ gang gis shing ni ma skyes pa/ /skyes bu gnyis pa de gang
402b4(mdo sde): yin| |des ni sdig pa'i las gang byas/ /gnyis skyes rnams ni smra bar byos/ /bya rnams kyis smras pa/ gang gi shing ni ma skyes pa/ /de ni lha sbyin glen pa ste/ /dge ba cung zad ma byas na/ /de yi
402b5(mdo sde): shing ni ji ltar skyes/ /de nas de'i tshe de'i dus na blon po bye ba phrag sum cu bo rnams kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas thams cad sa bcu la rab tu gnas te mngon par shes pa so sor
402b6(mdo sde): thob bar gyur to/ /rgyal po de'ang sa bcu la gnas nas dge ba'i chos mngon par rtogs pa rjes su thob bo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi
402b7(mdo sde): sdes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rgyu gang dang rkyen gang gis blon po bye ba phrag sum tu rtsa gsum bo rnams sa bu la gnas te mngon bar shes pa so sor thob par gyur/
403a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ sman gyi sde/ nyon cig dang lung bstan par bya'o/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /de nas de'i tshe
403a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog du ma/ kha dog sna tshogs/ kha dog brgya stong phrag du ma 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / le
403a3(mdo sde): brgan dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu brgyad khri bzhi stong byung nas de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa snang bar byas te slar log nas bcom ldan 'das
403a4(mdo sde): la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa
403a5(mdo sde): gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la pa de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
403a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni/ rgyu ma mchis/ rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/ 'jum pa
403a7(mdo sde): mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde/ phyogs bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas skye bo'i tshogs nga'i gan du
403b1(mdo sde): 'ong ba mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ma mthong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde/ de'i phyir skye bo'i tshogs la rnam par rtogs te ltos shig /
403b2(mdo sde): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes rnam par bltas pa dang / shar phyogs nas shing dpag tshad bdun stong pa zhig byung nas/ de'i phyogs gcig na skye bo'i tshogs
403b3(mdo sde): bye ba stong phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga 'dus te/ mi dag mi smra/ mi zer/ mi brjod/ mi za/ mi ldang / mi 'chag ste/ cang mi smra bar 'khod pa dang / lho phyogs nas shing dpag tshad bdun stong pa
403b4(mdo sde): zhig byung nas/ de la skye bo'i tshogs bye ba stong phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga 'dus te/ de dag kyang mi zer mi smra/ kun tu mi smra/ yongs su mi brjod/ mi ldang / mi 'chag ste/ cang mi smra bar 'khod pa
403b5(mdo sde): dang | nub phyogs nas shing dpag tshad bdun stong pa zhig byung nas de la skye bo'i tshogs stong phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga 'dus te/ de dag kyang mi zer/ mi smra/ kun tu mi smra/ yongs su mi brjod/
403b6(mdo sde): mi ldang / mi 'chag ste/ cang mi smra bar 'khod pa dang / byang phyogs nas shing dpag tshad bdun stong pa zhig byung nas/ de la skye bo'i tshogs bye ba stong phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga 'dus te/ de dag
403b7(mdo sde): kyang mi zer/ mi smra/ kun tu mi smra| yongs su mi brjod/ mi ldang / mi 'chag ste/ cang mi smra bar 'khod pa dang / 'og gi phyogs nas shing dpag tshad bdun stong pa zhig byung nas de
404a1(mdo sde): la skye bo'i tshogs bye ba stong phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga 'dus te/ de dag kyang mi zer/ mi smra/ kun tu mi smra/ yongs su mi brjod/ mi ldang / mi 'chag ste/ cang mi smra
404a2(mdo sde): bar 'khod pa dang / steng gi phyogs nas shing dpag tshad bdun stong pa zhig byung nas/ de la skye bo'i tshogs bye ba stong phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga 'dus te/ de dag kyang mi zer/ mi smra/ kun tu
404a3(mdo sde): mi smra/ yongs su mi brjod/ mi ldang / mi 'chag ste/ cang mi smra bar 'khod pa mthong ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes
404a4(mdo sde): 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
404a5(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi
404a6(mdo sde): sde la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sman gyi sde/ ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas ngas khyod kyi sems rangs bar bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal
404a7(mdo sde): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du phyogs bzhi'i 'jig rten nas
404b1(mdo sde): skye bo'i tshogs mang po lhags shing gnas pa nas 'og dang steng phyogs kyi bar nas skye bo'i tshogs bye ba stong phrag lnga bcu lhags shing gnas par gyur pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang
404b2(mdo sde): lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde/ khyod song la 'di dag 'jig rten gyi khams gang nas lhags pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la khyod nyid kyis zhus
404b3(mdo sde): shig |gsol pa/ su'i rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs bskyed pas mchi bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde/ rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs bskyed pas song zhig /de nas
404b4(mdo sde): b yang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te de nyid du mi snang bar gyur nas 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug
404b5(mdo sde): 'das te/ 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla ba can gyi zhing zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'
404b6(mdo sde): bye ba stong phrag brgyad cus yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams der phyin to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi
404b7(mdo sde): sde bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba can gyi zhing de'i spyan sngar 'dug gnas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
405a1(mdo sde): ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rgyu gang gis mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar skye bo'i tshogs
405a2(mdo sde): phyogs bcu nas 'dus shing lhags pa dag de na mchis pa'i tshe ni/ mthong la/ 'di na mchis pa'i tshe mi mthong bar gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde/ de
405a3(mdo sde): nyid na rgyu zhing gnas so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ yang ji lta bu lags/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba can gyi
405a4(mdo sde): zhing ga la ba der song ste phyin nas de bzhin gshegs pa de'i spyan sngar 'dug ste/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba
405a5(mdo sde): stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug 'das te mchis pa na/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis de dag tu sems can ji snyed mthong ba de snyed ni/ gang na'ang ma mthong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
405a6(mdo sde): stsal pa| sems can de dag ni/ sems pa med pa'i shing las byung ngo / /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang sems pa ma mchis pa'i shing las mi byung ba sus mthong / sus thos/
405a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde/ gang sems pa med pa'i shing las mi 'byung ba khyod kyis ma mthong / ma thos sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis
405b1(mdo sde): ma mthong / ma thos so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde/ khyod mthong bar 'dod na/ de da ngas bstan par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'tshal lo/ /bde bar
405b2(mdo sde): gshegs pa/ 'tshal lo/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba can gyi zhing nas phyag brkyangs pa dang / phyag de las skye bo'i tshogs bye ba stong phrag brgya byung ste/ skye bo'i tshogs re res
405b3(mdo sde): kyang lag pa brgya brgya brkyangs nas spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa sna tshogs de bzhin gshegs pa la gtor ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde/ khyod kyis skye
405b4(mdo sde): bo'i tshogs 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa la spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa gtor ba mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mthong lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ mthong
405b5(mdo sde): lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skye bo'i tshogs byung ba 'di dag sems pa med pa'o/ /mi 'di dag ni/ sems pa med pa'o/ /de nas bye ba stong phrag brgya po de dag re
405b6(mdo sde): re zhing yang gang lag pa brgya brgya yod pa de dag thams cad lhung ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes de mthong nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
405b7(mdo sde): gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ci zhig lags/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'di ci zhig lags/ gang mi rnams kyi lag pa brgya po'ang yud tsam gyis lhung ste/ bcom ldan 'das/
406a1(mdo sde): gal te lag pa brgya ba'ang grol bar mi 'gyur na/ lag pa gnyis pa'i mi lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde/ de
406a2(mdo sde): bzhin du sems can rnams ni/ sems pa med par skye'o/ /sems pa med par 'gag go /sman gyi sde/ de'i lus kyang sems pa med par gyur par shes par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom
406a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das/ gang sems can de dag la gzhon pa gang lags/ rgan pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde/ sems can gzhon pa'ang yod/ rgan
406a4(mdo sde): pa'ang yod do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gzhon pa gang lags/ rgan pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang dag da ltar lhung ba de dag ni/ rgan
406a5(mdo sde): pa'o| |gang dag shing rnams las skyes pa de dag ni/ gzhon pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ sems can gzhon nu rnams mthong bar 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa zla
406a6(mdo sde): ba can gyi zhing gis phyag g.yas pa'i mthil brkyangs pa dang / de nas phyogs bcu nas skye bo'i tshogs bye ba stong phrag brgya brgya 'ong ngo / /'og dang steng gi phyogs nas skye bo'i
406a7(mdo sde): tshogs bye ba phrag lnga bcu 'ong ste/ skye bo'i tshogs de dag lhags nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mi smra/ kun tu mi smra/
406b1(mdo sde): zhing cang mi zer bar 'khod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du sems
406b2(mdo sde): can de dag de bzhin gshegs pa la mi smra/ kun tu mi smra zhing cang mi mchi bar mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde/ khyod mi shes sam/ sa phyogs ni/ sems/
406b3(mdo sde): pa med de/ mi smra/ kun tu mi smra zhing chos kyi phung po'ang mi shes so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sman gyi sde/ 'di la sems can gzhon nu kha cig ni/ mthong yang skye ba mi shes/ 'gag pa dang /
406b4(mdo sde): rga ba dang / nad dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug pa dang bral ba dang / mi sdug pa dang phrad pa dang / mdza' ba dang bye ba dang / 'chi ba dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba
406b5(mdo sde): dang / sdug bsngal mi bzad pa de dag thams cad mi shes te/ mthong yang yid 'byung bar mi 'gyur na/ shes par lta ga la 'gyur te/ sman gyi sde/ de dag yang dang yang bslab par
406b6(mdo sde): bya'o| |de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang chos ma 'tshal ba'i sems can
406b7(mdo sde): gzhon nu de dag gang nas mchis/ gang nas 'chi 'pho zhing gang du skye bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde/ nyon cig /mi'i lus yongs su 'dzin pa de
407a1(mdo sde): dag ni| dngul mkhan gyis kyang ma byas/ zangs mkhan gyis kyang ma byas/ shing mkhan gyis kyang ma byas/ rdza mkhan gyis kyang ma byas te/ rgyal po'i
407a2(mdo sde): 'jigs pas kyang ma byas kyi/ gzhan du na skyes pa dang bud med 'dus pa dang / sdig pa'i las dang ldan pa las byung ngo / /sems can de dag kyang yang dang yang bzo'i las rnams
407a3(mdo sde): slob pas de dag gi sdug bsngal mi bzad pa mtha' yas pa dang / tshor ba mi bzad pa 'byung ste/ der de dag sngon sdig pa mi dge ba'i las byas pa'i rnam par smin pa myong ngo / /sman gyi
407a4(mdo sde): sde| 'di nyid du gang sems can gzhon nu lhags pa mi ldang ba 'di dag ni/ 'di 'dra ba'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong bar 'gyur te/ sman gyi sde/ de'i phyir mi smra/ kun tu mi smra'o/ /
407a5(mdo sde): sman gyi sde/ de ltar na/ sems can gzhon nu de dag ni/ dge ba'ang mi shes/ skye ba'ang mi shes/ 'gag pa'ang mi shes te/ de dag mi lus kyang 'thob par mi 'gyur ba 'di dag kyang
407a6(mdo sde): sman gyi sde/ sems can gzhon nu rnams zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ sems can gzhon nu rnams ji ltar skye/ ji ltar 'gag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
407a7(mdo sde): stsal pa| sman gyi sde/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mi la la zhig gis me la shing gis reg par byas pa dang / shing de la mthar gyis me 'bar ba de bzhin du/ sman gyi sde/ thog ma mi'i
407b1(mdo sde): lus su skye'o/ /skyes nas gdong tshor ba myong ngo / /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das| su zhig 'dir mngon par skye| skyes nas su zhig yongs su mya ngan las 'das/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
407b2(mdo sde): stsal pa| sman gyi sde/ sangs rgyas nyid skyes so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nyid yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgyal pos mi la la zhig bcings te khang pa mun pa mun nag
407b3(mdo sde): gi nang du btson rar bcug pa dang / mi de khang pa mun nag der zhugs nas khang pa mun nag la khang pa mun nag tu mthong ngo / /de nas mi gzhan sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas reg pa zhig gis mthong
407b4(mdo sde): nas mi de ni/ ma rungs par gyur to/ /sngon sdug bsngal ma myong bas 'tsho ba srog chad par 'gyur ro/ /snyam bsam nas des der ma khyer te 'ongs nas khyim de'i nang du me cung zad cig bor ba
407b5(mdo sde): dang | mi btson rar bcug pa des me de mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang de dbugs phyin par gyur te spro ba skyes so/ /me de'ang rgyu gang gis 'bar ba'i med 'bar ba des khyim de kun tu 'bar bar gyur
407b6(mdo sde): nas mi de'ang de nyid du tshig pa dang / de tshig go /zhes rgyal bos thos nas mi dga' ste/ de 'di snyam du phyin chad ni/ bdag gi yul du sems can gang yang brtson rar mi gzhug go /snyam du
407b7(mdo sde): sems so/ /de nas rgyal po des rang gi yul na gnas pa'i sems can rnams la/ kye sems can khyed cag ma 'jigs shig/ ma skrag cig /khyed cag 'jigs par ma gyur cig /phyin chad
408a1(mdo sde): nga'i yul du chad pas gcod pa'am/ brtson rar gzhug par mi bya'o/ /sems can gang yang srog dang dbral bar mi bya/ kye sems can khyed rnams ma 'jigs shig
408a2(mdo sde): ces de ltar dbugs phyung ba de bzhin du/ sman gyi sde/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ nyon mongs pa thams cad bsregs pa/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi ba'o/ /ji ltar khyim tshig nas mi nyid
408a3(mdo sde): kyi lus kyang tshig ste/ sems can rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir zhugs nas sems can bcings pa'ang bcings pa las yongs su thar par byed pa de bzhin du/ de
408a4(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'ang 'dod chags dang / zhes sdang dang / gti mug gi dri ma spangs te/ sems can thams cad la sgron ma bzhin du 'jig rten du byung nas sems can rnams sems
408a5(mdo sde): can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dwags dang / lha ma yin gyi lus rnams las yongs su thar par mdzad cing sems can gzhon nu dang / rgan po rnams kyang yongs su thar
408a6(mdo sde): par mdzad do/ /de nas steng gi bar snang las tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung ngo / /rgyal ba'i zhing ni ngo mtshar zhing / /zhing bzang mngon par 'dus byas pa/ /de la sa bon btab pa ni/ /
408a7(mdo sde): rnam par chud zad mi 'gyur ro/ /rgyal ba'i zhing ni dag pa'i zhing / /sangs rgyas bstan pa bsngags pa ste/ /sems can thams cad gzung ba'i phyir/ /ston pas kyang ni thabs mdzad do/ /
408b1(mdo sde): mya ngan 'das pa'i dbyings gnas kyang / /sa yi steng na kun tu snang / /rtag tu 'jig rten zhi byas nas/ /sangs rgyas sbyin pa'i gnas rnams spyod/ /sems can gzhon nu thar par byed/ /
408b2(mdo sde): rgan po rnams kyang thar par byed/ /sems can thams cad khams gsum las/ /mthar gyis yongs su thar par byas/ /sems can dmyal ba'i sgo bcad de/ /dud 'gro yi dwags thar par
408b3(mdo sde): byas| |'jig rten 'di yang zhi byas nas/ /'jig rten pha rol bde bar byed/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad nas/ bka' stsal pa/ legs pa rnams ni mthong na legs/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyang mthong
408b4(mdo sde): na legs/ /dam chos yon tan zhing yang legs/ /dge 'dun 'dus pa mthong na legs/ /zung bstan pa yang legs pa ste/ /sdig pa rnam par 'jig pa legs/ /de nas byang chub sems
408b5(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de legs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa
408b6(mdo sde): mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis sems can gzhon nu 'di dag mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan
408b7(mdo sde): 'das| mthong lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ mthong lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde/ 'di dag thams cad ni/ deng nyid du sa bcu la rab tu gnas
409a1(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde dpag tshad brgyad khri srid kyi steng gi nam mkha' la gnas pa dang / lha bye ba stong
409a2(mdo sde): phrag brgyad cu bcom ldan 'das la me tog gi char rab tu 'bebs so/ /sems can gzhon nu de dag kyang thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
409a3(mdo sde): dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes par snang la gnas bzhin du tshig 'di skad ces smras te/ des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams sgras gang bar gyur pa dang / sems can
409a4(mdo sde): dmyal ba chen po sum cu rtsa gnyis su skyes pa'i sems can rnams sgra de nyan to/ /lha'i ris sum cu rtsa gnyis kyang sgra de la nyan to/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
409a5(mdo sde): kyang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos so/ /rgya mtsho chen po'i nang gi klu brgyad khri bzhi stong yang 'khrugs so/ /srin po bye ba stong phrag sum cu'ang dzam+bu'i gling 'dir lhags so/ /yi dwags dang /
409a6(mdo sde): gnod sbyin dang / srin po bye ba stong phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga'ang lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor nas lhags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dus pa chen po kun tu gnas so/ /de nas bcom
409a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis sems can gzhon nu de dag la chos bstan pa dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba stong phrag brgya rang
409b1(mdo sde): rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyis lhags so/ /bam po bzhi pa ste/ tha ma| de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba
409b2(mdo sde): btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' 'dus shing mchis pa mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa/ mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das/ lha
409b3(mdo sde): dang klu 'dus shing mchis pa'ang mang ngo / /srin po bye ba phrag du ma zhig kyang lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor nas lhags te 'dus nas mchis par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub
409b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ mar shog /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis steng
409b5(mdo sde): nas babs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bde logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyi phung po chos kyi phung po zhes
409b6(mdo sde): bgyi ba| bcom ldan 'das/ ji tsam gyis na/ chos kyi phung po zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ chos kyi phung po zhes bya ba ni/ gang tshangs par spyod pa
409b7(mdo sde): yongs su tshol zhing gang tshangs par spyod pa yongs su btsal nas kyang sdig pa thams cad spong ba'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ sems can gzhon nu mi tshangs par spyod pa spangs nas gdon mi za
410a1(mdo sde): bar gzungs rab tu 'thob par 'gyur zhing chos thams cad dang yang ldan par 'gyur ba de dag mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ thabs gang gis
410a2(mdo sde): sems can mang po zhig 'dus shing chos kyi phung po nyan/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde la bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde/ gang
410a3(mdo sde): dag skye ba nyid sdug bsngal du mi nyan/ rga shi nyid sdug bsngal du mi nyan/ nad nyid sdug bsngal dang / mya ngan sdug bsngal dang / smre sngags 'don pa sdug bsngal dang / sdug pa dang
410a4(mdo sde): bral ba sdug bsngal dang / mi sdug pa dang phrad pa sdug bsngal du mi nyan pa'i sems can yang phal cher yod de/ 'chi ba ni/ sdug bsngal thams cad kyi phyir lus dang srog 'phrog pa yin te/
410a5(mdo sde): sman gyi sde/ 'di ni/ sdug bsngal thams cad ces bya'o/ /de nas sems can gzhon nu de dag gis bstan pa 'di thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba
410a6(mdo sde): btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag kyang 'gum par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyed dang sems can
410a7(mdo sde): thams cad kyang 'chi'o/ /de dag gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar 'chi ba'i dus kyis non par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag /'chi
410b1(mdo sde): ba'i dus na rnam par shes pa tha ma la rnam par shes pa 'gag par byed pa zhes bya ba'i rlung dang / rnam par shes pa 'khrul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i rlung dang / rnam par shes pa 'khrug par
410b2(mdo sde): byed pa zhes bya ba'i rlung dang / rigs kyi bu/ rlung gsum po 'di dag gis 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe rnam par shes pa tha ma la glong bar 'gyur/ 'khrul bar 'gyur/ 'khrug pa skyed par 'gyur
410b3(mdo sde): ro| |de dag gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe rnam par shes pa 'gag pa na lus 'joms par bgyid pa'i rlung gsum po gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
410b4(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ grogs po dag /mtshon zhes bya ba dang / skul ba zhes bya ba dang / zed pa zhes bya bas lus 'joms par byed do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ lus zhes bgyi
410b5(mdo sde): pa ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ grogs po dag /kun tu 'bar ba zhes kyang bya/ tshig pa zhes kyang bya/ ngar snabs zhes kyang bya/ sgregs pa zhes kyang bya/ dur
410b6(mdo sde): khrod pa zhes kyang bya/ ngan pa'i blo zhes kyang bya/ khur lci ba zhes kyang bya/ skye bas yongs su gzir ba zhes kyang bya/ skye bas kun tu dkrugs pa zhes kyang bya/ srog yongs su gdung ba zhes
410b7(mdo sde): kyang bya| 'chi ba dang / sdug pa dang bral bar byed pa zhes kyang bya ste/ grogs po dag /'di rnams ni/ lus zhes bya'o/ /de dag gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar 'gum/ ji
411a1(mdo sde): ltar 'tsho/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ grogs po dag /rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba ni/ 'chi ba'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa/ bsod nams zhes bya ba
411a2(mdo sde): ni| 'tsho ba'o/ /grogs po dag /lus zhes bya ba ni/ 'chi ba ste/ rgyus pa bye bas ni/ dkris/ spu'i khung brgyad khri bzhi stong dang ni/ ldan/ yan lag khri nyis stong gis ni/ sbrel/ rus
411a3(mdo sde): pa sum brgya drug cus ni/ brtan/ lus kyi nang na srin bu'i rigs brgyad cu rtsa bzhi ni/ gnas te/ srog chags de dag thams cad la'ang 'chi ba'ang yod/ 'chi ba 'gag pa'ang yod
411a4(mdo sde): do| |nam mi de 'chi ba de na srog chags de dag thams cad re thag chad par 'gyur te/ de na srog chags thams cad gcig la gcig za bas rlung 'khrug cing g.yo bar 'gyur te/ de na
411a5(mdo sde): de dag sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong ngo / /la la ni/ bu'i phyir mya ngan byed/ la la ni/ bu mo'i phyir mya ngan byed/ la la ni/ gnyen gyi phyir mya ngan byed de/ de dag thams cad mya ngan gyi
411a6(mdo sde): zug rdus zug go / gcig la gcig za bar brtsams nas de dag gcig gis gcig zos te srog chags gnyis shig lus pa na de gnyis kyang zhag bdun gyi bar du 'thabs te
411a7(mdo sde): zhag bdun 'das pa dang / srog chags gcig ni/ bcom mo/ /gcig ni/ thar to/ /tshe dang ldan pa/ chos zhes bya ba gang zhe na/ 'di snyam du sems te/ ji ltar srog chags rnams
411b1(mdo sde): gcig la gcig mi mthun par byas nas 'chi bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du byis pa so so'i skye bo'i sems can rnams kyang gcig la gcig mi mthun pa byed de/ skye bas mi 'jigs/ rga
411b2(mdo sde): bas mi 'jigs/ nad kyis mi 'jigs/ 'chi bas mi 'jigs so/ /ji ltar srog chags gnyis 'thab pa bzhin du byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyang phan tshun 'thab bo/ /de nas 'chi ba'i
411b3(mdo sde): dus na skyes bu dge ba rnams kyis smras pa/ skyes bu/ khyod ci zhig la yid rton/ ci khyod kyis nyes pa cung zad kyang ma mthong ngam/ skye ba'i nyes pa ma mthong ngam/ rga ba dang na ba'i nyes pa
411b4(mdo sde): ma mthong ngam/ 'chi ba'i nyes pa ma mthong ngam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa/ bdag gis skye ba'i nyes pa'ang mthong ngo / /rga ba dang na ba'i nyes pa'ang mthong ngo / /thams cad kyi tha ma ra 'chi
411b5(mdo sde): ba'i nyes pa'ang mthong ngo / /smras pa/ ci'i phyir gang dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis bya ba ma byas/ ci'i phyir 'jig rten gnyis kar bde ba 'phel ba'i chos kyi phung po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams
411b6(mdo sde): ma byas| grogs po dag / gnyis su'ang dri'o/ /khyod ci'i phyir skye ba dang / 'chi ba las yongs su thar pa'i dge ba'i tshogs ma byas/ khyod kyis ci'i phyir tshul bzhin yid la byed pa so
411b7(mdo sde): sor brtag pa ma byas/ ji ltar khyed kyis sa la gaN+DI brdung ba'i sgra ma thos/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhing la dge ba'i sa bon bskrun cing spos sam/ phreng ba'am/ mar me sbyin pa byin
412a1(mdo sde): pa ma mthong / de bzhin gshegs pa la bza' ba dang / bca' ba 'bul ba dang / 'khor bzhi tshim par byas pa'ang ma mthong / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge
412a2(mdo sde): bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma bstan pa la mngon par dad pa de dag ni/ 'khor bzhi'o/ /de ltar de la phan pa'i phyir smras te bsnyad pa dang / lha/ cung zad kyang ma bgyis so/ /mi khyod kyis
412a3(mdo sde): ni| dzam+bu'i gling du 'ongs nas mi dge ba byas so/ /de'i tshe mi shi ba de la chos kyi rgyal pos rjes su bstan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung mthong zhing / /
412a4(mdo sde): gaN+DI brdung ba thos gyur la/ /mya ngan 'das pa zhir 'gro ba'i/ /chos bstan thos kyang ma byas so/ /de nas mi des slar smras pa/ /bdag ni byis pa'i blor gyur te/ /sdig pa'i grogs kyi dbang
412a5(mdo sde): song nas/ /'dod pas 'khrul ba'i sems kyis su/ /bdag gis sdig pa'i las byas so/ /'dod pa dag kyang bsten pa dang / /bdag gis srog chags rnams kyang bsad/ /dge 'dun rnams
412a6(mdo sde): kyang chud gsan pas/ /mi bzad de yi 'bras bu 'ong / /gnod par sems pa'i yid kyis su/ /bdag gis mchod rten bshig pa byas/ /tshig ngan rnams kyang rab tu smras/ /bdag gi ma yang
412a7(mdo sde): gdung bar byas/ /bdag gis lus kyis gang byas pa/ /nyes pa dag kyang rab tu shes/ /sems dmyal chen po du 'bod du/ /shin tu mi bzad skye ba mthong / /bsdus gzhom du'ang tshor ba
412b1(mdo sde): myong / /de bzhin rab tu tsha ba dang / /mnar med chen po mi bzad par/ /tshor ba rjes su myong bar 'gyur/ /pad+ma lta bur cher gas pa'i/ /sems can dmyal bar sdug bsngal du/ /thig nag
412b2(mdo sde): btab pa 'jigs chen du/ /lan brgya bar du skye bar 'gyur/ /sems dmyal sems can bsad nas su/ /phyis kyang 'jigs pa de mthong ste/ /dpag tshad brgyar ni yang dang yang / /'jigs
412b3(mdo sde): pa chen por ltung bar 'gyur/ /de dag sgo rnyed mi 'gyur te/ /phyis kyang mun par rab tu ltung / /spu gri zhes bya sems dmyal du/ /spu gri stong yang 'byung bar 'gyur/ /bye ba stong phrag brgya rnams
412b4(mdo sde): kyis| |spu gri mdun du 'byung 'gyur te/ /bdag gis nyes pa'i las byas pas/ /de dag gis ni de lus gtubs/ /rlung 'khrugs chen po mi bzad pas/ /lus de thams cad 'jig par byed//
412b5(mdo sde): rtag tu 'di 'dra'i sems dmyal du/ /bdag gis sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur/ /lus ni rab tu sdug bsngal bar/ /sems can kun gyis bdag mthong ngo / /khyim so bya phyir gzhan dag gi /
412b6(mdo sde): nor yang rab tu bdag gis blangs/ /bdag gis bu pho bu mo dang / /de bzhin phu nu sring mo dang / /bdag gi pha ma'ang de bzhin te/ /mdza' bo gnyen bshes mang po dang / /bran dang las byed
412b7(mdo sde): rnams dang ni/ /de bzhin pa dang phyugs dang g.yog /dgos pa ngan la bdag 'khrul te/ /gser dang dngul gyi snod rnams dang / /de bzhin rab phra gos rnams dang / /khyim byed bcug pas
413a1(mdo sde): 'khrul pa ste/ /khyim yang shin tu bkra byas nas/ /skyes pa bud med lang long dang / /pi wang sil snyan 'khrol ba la/ /bdag yid ma dul dga' bar 'gyur/ /
413a2(mdo sde): spos chu dag gis lus bkrus kyang / /nga dung byas pa gzo ba med/ /lus khyod sems pa med pa ste/ /nga ni khyod kyi ched la 'khrul/ /phyin chad sems can 'ga' tsam yang / /bdag la skyob
413a3(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba med/ /rlung 'khrug chen po mi bzad par/ /lus ni yongs su gdung ba na/ /ro dang ldan pa zhim zos te/ /lces kyang sna tshogs de bzhin no/ /phreng ba sna tshogs bzang mdzes
413a4(mdo sde): pa| |rab tu mang po mgo la bcings/ /mig ni gzugs kyis 'khrul byas te/ /mig gi skyabs ni yod ma yin/ /bdag gis mthong nas gang byas pa/ /sdig pa rnams ni mig gi rgyu/ /
413a5(mdo sde): lag pa rdo rjes bcad pa ni/ /bdag gi rna ba'i rgyu yin no/ /lag pa gnyis la gdu bu btags/ /sor mo rnams la sor gdub bcug /mgul du mu tig se mo do/ /rkang pa gnyis kyang
413a6(mdo sde): rab tu brgyan/ /de la dra ba byas pa dang / /de la gser yang gnas par byas/ /lus la rin chen sna tshogs dang / /gser gyi gdu bu'ang de bzhin no/ /longs spyod chen pos rab rtses
413a7(mdo sde): nas| |yid kyang shin tu brtas par gyur/ /rab tu 'jam la bdag reg nas/ /shin tu sred pas de bstan to/ /gding ba sna tshogs mal cha yis/ /bdag gis lus ni rtser bcug go /
413b1(mdo sde): spos chu bzang pos khrus byas te/ /spos rnams kyis kyang rab tu bskus/ /lha rdzas ga bur tsan+dan gyi/ /bdug pa rnams kyis rab tu bdugs/ /kha dog bzang po byas nas kyang / /gla rtsi ldan pas
413b2(mdo sde): rab tu bsgos/ /lo lon 'bru mar dri dag dang / /sna ma tsam+pa ka la sogs/ /bskus nas phra mo ka shi ka /dkar po'i gos kyang rab tu bgos/ /glang po'i rgyab nas babs nas su/ /rta yi rgyab
413b3(mdo sde): tu mngon par zhon/ /bdag ni rgyal po yin snyam sems/ /skye bo bdag gi mdun na rgyug /glu gar shin tu bslab pa yi/ /slas rnams kyang ni rab tu shes/ /ri dwags rnams ni ma nyes par/ /
413b4(mdo sde): bdag gis mdas kyang ri dwags bsad/ /'jig rten phyi ma ma shes pas/ /bdag gis 'di 'dra'i sdig byas shing / /bdag gis gzhan gyi sha zos pas/ /de phyir bdag gi sdug
413b5(mdo sde): bsngal 'di/ /mi zad 'ongs pa 'gyur ba yi/ /'chi ba bdag gis ma shes te/ /bdag ni byis pa'i blor gyur pas/ /bdag gi lus kyang gso ba byas/ /deng ni bdag la 'chi 'ong na/ /skyabs
413b6(mdo sde): byed pa ni su yang med/ /gnyen rnams khyed cag thams cad kyang / /nga yi gdong du bltar ci yod/ /ci zhig phyir ni gos 'dral zhing / /ci phyir ngu zhing smre sngags 'don/ /ci phyir skra rnams
413b7(mdo sde): rab 'jig cing / /ci phyir khrag kyang 'byin par byed/ /ci phyir mgo la rdul 'thor zhing / /brang yang rab tu rdung bar byed/ /bdag gson tshe na sdig pa rnams/ /spang bar bya rigs khyed
414a1(mdo sde): ci mdud/ /bdag gi lus ni spyang ki dang / /khyi dang bya rog rnams dang ni/ /bya rnams kyis kyang bza' bar 'gyur/ /lus 'di dgos pa med par gsos/ 'chi ba'i
414a2(mdo sde): sbrul dang ldan gyur nas/ /mi ni rtag tu skye bar 'gyur/ /'jigs pa 'di las grol 'gyur ba/ /de lta bu yi sman rnams bsnyen/ /bdag la sman pas gang byin pa'i/ /sman de dgos pa ma
414a3(mdo sde): yin na| |nyon mongs sprul las thar byed pa/ /da ltar chos kyi sman rnams ni/ /'chi khar bdag la sbyin par byos/ /sha ni nga la ma sbyin cig /lus 'di gso ba byas kyang ni/ /gdon mi za
414a4(mdo sde): bar 'jig par 'gyur/ /gang phyir sdug bsngal spyin gyur pa/ /sdig gi phung po ci phyir blangs/ /lus 'di shin tu gsos byas kyang / /byas pa ma rung byed par 'gyur/ /bu dang bu mo ci zhig
414a5(mdo sde): phyir| |nga la mig gis blta bar byed/ /na ba 'di las da skyobs shig /don med par ni ci phyir ngu / /bu dang bu mo khyed cag dag /da ni ma rung ma byed cig /khyed cag gso bar bya ba'i phyir/ /
414a6(mdo sde): ngas ni gzhan gyi nor yang 'phrog /da ni 'chi dus bab pa na/ /re thag chad kyi ci zhig byed/ /skye dang ngan 'gros rab tu 'jigs/ /'chi bas kyang ni yongs su gzir/ /tshor ba 'du shes 'du
414a7(mdo sde): byed dang / /reg pa shin tu tshor ba'o/ /sred pas byis pa rnams kyang 'khyams/ /mi bzad 'bras bu rnams kyang thob/ /ngan pa'i rigs su skye ba ni/ /der yang mya ngan bcings par 'gyur/ /
414b1(mdo sde): bdag la bsod nams chung shes nas/ /skye bo gzhan dag mya ngan byed/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims yongs su nyams/ /chos la yang ni rgyab kyis phyogs/ /yang skye ba ni mi shes pas/ /nyon mongs sprul
414b2(mdo sde): gyis nyon mongs pa/ /ma rig pas ni byis pa rnams/ /gang na thar pa med par 'khyams/ /thar pa'i don ni mi shes nas/ /'khrul pas sdig pa rnams kyang byed/ /nyon mongs rnams kyis byis pa
414b3(mdo sde): 'khyams/ /yid ni rtag tu rnam par 'khrugs/ /bcing ba sna tshogs ldan lus la/ /mes ni kun tu 'bar zhing tshig /gang na bde ba med pa der/ /lus ni rnam par 'khrul pas 'khyams/ /gang
414b4(mdo sde): las shin tu bde 'byung ba/ /bde ba de ni mi shes te/ /sangs rgyas zhing ni bde ba sbyin/ /chos kyi 'khor lo sman gyi mchog /tshul khrims bden pa'i tshul khrims so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i
414b5(mdo sde): tshangs dbyangs yin/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde la bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde/ sems can dag 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe de ltar
414b6(mdo sde): smre sngags 'don kyang legs par byas pa'i las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa ma gtogs par de dag gi skyob par 'gyur ba su'ang med do/ /zhes bka' de skad stsal nas tshigs su bcad pa
414b7(mdo sde): 'di dag kyang gsungs so/ /sdig pa'i las ni byas pas na/ /sems can dmyal ba rnams su ltung / /sreg pa'i gos ni gyon par 'gyur/ /skom du lcags khu 'thung bar 'gyur/ /lus rnams
415a1(mdo sde): la ni me mdag 'bab/ /tshig nas rab tu mi bzad du/ /sems can dmyal ba 'jigs chen du/ /de yi lus ni rab tu 'tshig /bde ba dag ni mi shes shing / /chos
415a2(mdo sde): kyang rnam par mi shes te/ /chos ma yin pas byis pa 'khyams/ /bde ba cung zad rnyed mi 'gyur/ /dad dang tshul khrims phun sum tshogs/ /shes rab ldan zhing dka' thub che/ /dge ba'i
415a3(mdo sde): bshes gnyen bsten pa ni/ /de bzhin gshegs par myur du 'gyur/ /'jig rten sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i phyir/ /brtson 'grus kyi ni mchog rtsoms la/ /sems can thams cad yongs
415a4(mdo sde): bzung ba/ /dge ba'i las kyi chos ston cig /byams pa'i sems dang de bzhin du/ /tshangs spyod mchog la snyoms par zhugs/ /sman sde de skad thos nas kyang / /mchog tu sgrub par 'gyur
415a5(mdo sde): bar bya| |rnam grol mthong dang sangs rgyas dang / /sgra bsgrags rnam par 'dren pa dang / /'jig rten gyi ni pha dang ma/ /de ni byang chub sems zhes bya/ /'jig rten du ni chos 'di gang ston pa//
415a6(mdo sde): dge ba'i bshes gnyen mchog tu rab rnyed dka'/ /sangs rgyas bstan la gang dag gus nyan pa/ /de dag bla med sangs rgyas bde gshegs 'gyur/ /zhi ba sangs rgyas sras rnams la/ /
415a7(mdo sde): gang dag gus dang bcas gyur pa/ /de dag kyang ni sems can kun/ /thar byed 'jig rten mgon du 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
415b1(mdo sde): sman gyi sdes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du dogs 'di g.yo rab tu g.yo/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems
415b2(mdo sde): dpa' chen po sman gyi sde la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sman gyi sde/ ci mthong ltos/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes bltas pa dang / phyogs bzhin sa gas pa
415b3(mdo sde): mthong ngo / /sa gas pas sa gas pa'i phrag nas mi bye ba phrag nyi shu byung ba dang / 'og gi phyogs nas mi bye ba phrag nyi shu byung ba dang / steng gi phyogs nas mi bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga byung ba

415b6(mdo sde): dag ni| khyed la bde ba'i phyir skyes so/ /gsol pa/ sems can 'di dag kyang 'gum par 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ grogs po dag /de bzhin te/ sems can
415b7(mdo sde): thams cad kyang 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas sems can gzhon nu snga ma gang dag thog ma nyid du skyes pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas
416a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag ni/ yang skye ba dang / 'gum pa la blta bar mi spro'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
416a2(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ 'o na brtson 'grus kyi stobs rnyed par spro'am/ de dag gis gsol pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum du blta bar bgyi'o/ /de nas chos gang mnyan pa zhus te
416a3(mdo sde): yid du 'ong ba mnyan par bgyi'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun 'dus pa la blta bar bgyi'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba rnams la blta bar
416a4(mdo sde): bgyi ste| bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta bu la spro'i/ skye ba dang / 'gum pa la ni/ blta bar mi spro'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde rdzu 'phrul gyi
416a5(mdo sde): s tobs kyis byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya po de dag dang lhan cig tu stan las langs nas de dag thams cad rdzu 'phrul gyis steng gi bar snang la 'gro zhing skyil mo krung bcas nas
416a6(mdo sde): bsam gtan byed de/ de dag thams cad kyi lus las seng+ge rnams byung ngo / /stag rnams byung ngo / /sprul rnams byung ngo / /glang po rnams byung ngo / /rdzu 'phrul chen po rnam par 'phrul
416a7(mdo sde): pa ston te/ /ri la'ang skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do/ /steng du dpag tshad nyi khri srid du yang 'gro'o/ /zla ba dang nyi ma bye ba stong phrag bcu'ang 'bab par byed do/ /de nas bcom ldan
416b1(mdo sde): 'das la sems can gzhon nu de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'od zer chen po gda' ba dang / rdzu 'phrul chen po rnam par 'phrul pa 'jig rten du byung ba'i rgyu
416b2(mdo sde): gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ khyed zla ba dang / nyi ma byung ba 'di la ltos/ de dag gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mthong
416b3(mdo sde): lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ mthong lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rang gi lus las 'od zer snang ba dang / rdzu 'phrul dang /
416b4(mdo sde): cho 'phrul bstan pa ste/ bstan nas kyang skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / skye bo'i tshogs chen po dang / lha rnams dang / mi rnams kyi

416b6(mdo sde): pa| bcom ldan 'das/ 'od zer snang ba 'byung bar bgyi ba'i slad du chos bstan du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
416b7(mdo sde): po sman gyi sde la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sman gyi sde/ khyod kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu g.yos pa mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
417a1(mdo sde): mthong lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ mthong lags so/ /des 'di snyam bsam ste/ gang bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la don de zhu'o/ /snyam bsams pa
417a2(mdo sde): dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde/ ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / ngas dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs bar bya'o/ /bstan par
417a3(mdo sde): bya'o| |rnam par dbye bar bya'o/ /sman gyi sde/ gang 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus rnams kyi de thams cad bstan par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
417a4(mdo sde): the tshom bsal ba'i slad du bstan du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i bu stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhis bskor ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye
417a5(mdo sde): ba stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhis bskor ba dang / klu'i rgyal po bye ba stong phrag bcu gnyis kyis bskor ba dang / 'byung po bye ba stong phrag bco brgyad kyis bskor ba dang / yi dwags
417a6(mdo sde): dang sha za bye ba stong phrag nyi shu rtsa lngas bskor ba mthong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde/ sems can 'di dag ni/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khor 'dir nga'i
417a7(mdo sde): gan du 'dus shing 'khod gor ma chag ste/ sman gyi sde/ 'di dag ni/ deng kho nar 'khor ba bsnyil bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad la phan par 'dod pas deng nyid sa bcu
417b1(mdo sde): rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /sa bcu la rab tu gnas nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings rjes su 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /rga dang 'chi las thar bya'i phyir/ /las byas bde ba thob byed cing / /
417b2(mdo sde): nyon mongs zhags pa pham byas nas/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa 'thob par 'gyur/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ sems can gyi gnas mang po las sna tshogs kyis byung ba 'di ci'i
417b3(mdo sde): slad du/ bcom ldan 'das la bskor cing gnas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde/ nyon cig /sems can rmongs pa mi shes pa/ /thar par 'gyur ba ga la yod/ /
417b4(mdo sde): sems can gzhon nu mang po dag /de ring gzugs rnams 'thob par 'gyur/ /sa bcu dag ni 'thob pa'i phyir/ /chos kun rab tu shes par 'gyur/ /sa bcu dag kyang 'thob par 'gyur/ /
417b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bya ba byed par 'gyur/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur/ /chos char rab tu 'bebs par 'gyur/ /de ltar sems can 'dus bas na/ /nga yi bstan la dga' ba'o/ /lha
417b6(mdo sde): dang klu dang yi dwags dang / /lha min shin tu mi bzad pas/ /sa bcu la ni rab gnas te/ /chos kyi sgra yang sgrog par 'gyur/ /chos kyi rnga yang brdung bar 'gyur/ /chos kyi dung yang rab tu
417b7(mdo sde): 'bud| |sems can gzhon nu 'di dag kyang / /brtson 'grus mthu dang ldan par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pas thob pa bzhin/ /de dag deng ni chos 'thob 'gyur/ /de nas sems
418a1(mdo sde): can gzhon nu lnga stong tsam stan las langs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
418a2(mdo sde): to| |gang phyir mtha' ni ma 'tshal ba/ /'khor ba na ni 'chi ba ste/ /lus ni khur lti bcom ldan 'das/ /'jigs pa chen po mi bzad pa/ /lam ni rnam par ma 'tshal te/ /lam nyid
418a3(mdo sde): kyang ni mi gda' bas/ /mgon po bdag cag ldongs gyur na/ /bdag cag rnams ni bsdu bar gsol/ /dpa' la bdag cag gsol ba 'tshal/ /'dren pas chos ni bshad du gsol/ /
418a4(mdo sde): bdag cag shes rab chung ngur skyes/ /bde ba mngon par ma 'tshal to/ /bdag cag la ni chos bshad gsol/ /sdug bsngal mi bzad grol bar mdzod/ /gang dang gang du skyes par
418a5(mdo sde): yang / /bdag cag sangs rgyas mthong gyur cig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde sems can gzhon nu rnams ga la ba der song ste phyin nas 'di
418a6(mdo sde): skad ces smras so/ /khyed cag rnams ni zas zo zhig /mang du byung ba'i ro yang 'thung / /'jigs pa med par gyur nas su/ /phyis 'dod 'jigs med chos nyon cig /smras pa/ btsun
418a7(mdo sde): pa gnas brtan khyod su zhig / bdag cag rnams kyis khyod mi shes/ /khyod ni rab tu mdzes par mthong / /gzugs ni zhi zhing grags pa che/ /yi dwags 'jig rten 'jigs chen dang / /
418b1(mdo sde): sems dmyal dud 'gro rnams las thar/ /ji ltar 'gro ba mdzes pa bzhin/ /khyod kyi sdig pa thams cad zhi/ /khyod kyi lag na snod yod pa/ /rin chen sna bdun ldan pa dang / /lus la
418b2(mdo sde): rin chen srad bu dang / /gzi brjid phung pos brgyan pa mthong / /zhi ba khyod kyis tshig smras pa/ /bdag cag lan 'debs mi nus so/ /bdag cag la ni zas rnams dang / /zhim po'i skom
418b3(mdo sde): yang mi dgos te/ /zas las bshad pa 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin skom yang gcin du 'gyur/ /khu ba rnams las khrag tu 'gyur/ /de bzhin khrag las shar 'gyur bas/ /zas
418b4(mdo sde): dang skom rab sbyar ba yang / /bdag cag rnams la dgos ma yin/ /dar dang snam bu sbyar ba dang / /phra mo'i gos kyang dgos pa med/ /gser gyi gdu bu mi dgos te/ /mu tig phreng
418b5(mdo sde): ba dgos ma yin/ /sor gdub dag kyang mi dgos te/ /de kun mi rtag chos can no/ /bdag cag ngan par 'gro rnams su/ /'gro bar mi 'gyur srog tshol lo/ /lha rnams kyi ni bde ba
418b6(mdo sde): dang / /chos kyi sbyin pa don du gnyer/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams dgos te/ /'khor los bsgyur rgyal ma yin no/ /rab tu bzang ba'i gling por nas/ /'khor los bsgyur ba
418b7(mdo sde): 'chi bar 'gyur/ /bu yang phya bzhin mi 'brang ste/ /chung ma bu mo rnams kyang min/ /rin chen sna bdun phyin lus/ /phyi bzhin 'brang ba ma yin no/ /skye bo mang po bsdus pa yang / /phyi
419a1(mdo sde): bzhin 'gro ba ma yin te/ /mdun du rgyug pa'ang ma yin no/ /de ltar phyin chad mi 'gyur ro/ /tshe gcig gis ni rgyal po las/ /mi rtag pas ni 'khyams
419a2(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ /sdig pa'i las rnams mang byas pas/ /de dag sems dmyal du 'bod ltung / /rin chen sna bdun rdzu 'phrul ches/ /phyogs bzhi kun tu bskor ba las/ /gang tshe du
419a3(mdo sde): 'bod smin pa'i tshe/ /rdzu 'brul de ni gang du song / /sa gang dag na yod min pa/ /shi nas rdzu 'phrul byed mi nus/ /gnas brtan bdag cag rnams la gson/ /gang na de bzhin
419a4(mdo sde): gshegs par bzhud/ /pha dang ma ni ji lta bar/ /de ni mthong bar rab tu 'dod/ /bdag cag la ni ma yang med/ /pha med phu nu rnams kyang med/ /'jig rten gtso bo de bzhin
419a5(mdo sde): gshegs/ /de nyid pha dang ma yin no/ /de nyid nyi ma zla ba ste/ /bde ba'i lam ni rab ston pa'o/ /gang phyir phyin chad mi skye bar/ /de ni 'khor ba thar mdzad pa'o/ /nyon mongs bcu po
419a6(mdo sde): 'jigs chen dang / /chu bo sgrol ba'i gru de 'o/ /de yis sems can rab bsgral te/ /phyin chad slar ni mi ldog go/ /byang chub mchog ni rab ston pa/ /dam pa'i chos kyang des bshad do/ /
419a7(mdo sde): bdag cag rnams la zas mi dgos/ /rgyal srid 'bras bu mi 'dod de/ /sems can dmyal bas 'jigs pa ni/ /lha yi 'jig rten 'gro mi bya/ /mi yi tshe ni bde ba ste/ /de na thams
419b1(mdo sde): cad mkhyen par snang / /rang gi las ni nyes byas pas/ /tshe thung rnams ni 'khyams pa yin/ /de dag 'chi ba mi shes kyi/ /'dod pa'i longs spyod rgyal srid shes/ /skye dang 'gag pas bslus
419b2(mdo sde): pa rnams/ /shes pa med cing 'jigs pa med/ /mi rtag bas ni sems 'khrul rnams/ /phra ba'i chos rnams ma shes te/ /phra ba'i dgos pa mi byed la/ /zhi ba'i dbyings kyang mi shes so/ /'chi
419b3(mdo sde): 'pho la ni skyo med pa/ /yang dang yang du skye bar 'gyur/ /yun ring sdug bsngal rab gzir cing / /rtag tu dbyug pas brdegs byas nas/ /gzhan dag gi yang 'phrog byed de/ /de bzhin bcing
419b4(mdo sde): zhing bsad pas byas/ /sngon gyi sdig pas bskul bas na/ /de dag bcing ba lngas bcings so/ /re thag kyang ni chad par 'gyur/ /mya ngan zug rdus zug par 'gyur/ /rnam par shes pa 'gag
419b5(mdo sde): ba na| |snying rje bar ni sme sngags 'don/ /bdag gi skyob par su 'gyur la/ /gser dang dngul dang shel dag dang / /longs spyod thams cad bdag gis dbul/ /bdag ni bran du'ang 'gyur bar
419b6(mdo sde): bya| |bran gyi chul du gang gyur ba/ /las rnams thams cad rab tu bya/ /rgyal srid longs spyod bdag mi dgos/ /nor dang 'bru yang ma yin no/ /rang gi lus ni bdag mi dgos/ /sdig pa byed
419b7(mdo sde): pa mi 'grol te/ /de ltar gnas brtan bdag cag la/ /bza' ba dgos ba ma yin no/ /gang dag kha zas zhim zos pa/ /rgyal po rnams kyang 'chi bar 'gyur/ /btung ba mchog ni 'thungs pa yi/ /
420a1(mdo sde): lha'i bu rnams kyang 'chi bar 'gyur/ /cho ma cho dgu ro ldan pa/ /zas dang skom ni rab bshams te/ /rgyal po'i mdun du blangs nas su/ /kha zas la ni lces reg
420a2(mdo sde): nas| |rgyal po rnams ni ro la chags/ /sdig pa mi chung rnams kyang byed/ /gang la snying po med pa yi/ /mi rtag ro la chags par byed/ /bdag cag rnams la skom mi dgos/ /
420a3(mdo sde): bza' ba dag kyang dgos ma yin/ /bdag cag sdug bsngal gang grol ba/ /chos nyid de 'dra dgos ma yin/ /sred pa'i bcings las rab grol zhing / /sred pa'i nyon mongs rnam thar
420a4(mdo sde): te| |bcings pa kun las rab grol ba'i/ /sangs rgyas de la skyabs su dong / /drang srong chen po 'jig mgon la/ /bdag cag rnams ni skyabs su 'dod/ /sems can rnams kyis
420a5(mdo sde): mthong dka' la/ /phyag 'tshal phyir ni bdag cag 'dong / /khyod kyi mtshan ni ma 'tshal gyi/ /snyan pa'i mtshan ni bstan du gsol/ /sman gyi sdes smras pa/ khyed dang skye bo thams cad
420a6(mdo sde): dang / /de bzhin ming ni thos par 'dod/ /sems can gzhon nu bye ba phrag /stong gis de bzhin gshegs pa bskor/ /de dag gis smras pa/ khyod ni sangs rgyas nyan thos te/ /ming
420a7(mdo sde): ni zab par grags pa yin/ /skye bo kun kyang de bzhin du/ /khyod kyi ming ni thos par 'dod/ /smras pa/ nga yi ming ni sman gyi sde/ /nga ni sems can rnams kyi sman/ /sman rnams kun gyi
420b1(mdo sde): dam pa ni/ /khyed cag rnams la bshad par bya/ /nad kun gyis btab skye bo yi/ /nad rnams thams cad zhi bar byed/ /'dod chags nad ni nad po che/ /'jig rten 'jig byed mi bzad pa/ /
420b2(mdo sde): gang gis blo med 'khyams pa yi/ /gti mug nad ni che zhing drag /sems dmyal de bzhin dud 'gro dang / /yi dwags rnams su sems can 'gro /byis pa 'di dag zhe sdang zin/ /de dag ji
420b3(mdo sde): ltar zhi bar 'gyur/ /de dag gis smras pa/ dge ba'i chos ni 'di thos pas/ /bdag cag sdug bsngal kun las grol/ /byis pa blo ni mi shes pa/ /sdug bsngal kun las grol nas kyang / /
420b4(mdo sde): sdig pa'i las ni rnam spangs te/ /bdag cag chos kyi sbyin pa nyan/ /sdig pa thams cad rnam spangs nas/ /'jigs pa mi bzad rnams kyang spangs/ /nad rnams thams cad zhi byed pa/ /
420b5(mdo sde): sman pa'i rgyal po sman pa ste/ /sdug bsngal ba rnams gso byed pa/ /yang dag sangs rgyas myur du blta/ /de bzhin gshegs la phyag bya phyir/ /gnas brtan khyod ni myur du bzhud/ /
420b6(mdo sde): phyag byas bdag cag rnams kyi chog /'jig rten rnam par 'dren la gsungs/ /nad 'di rab tu zhi bar mdzod/ /lus ni thams cad rab 'bar te/ /tshig cing zhi ba med pa yi/ /mi bzad
420b7(mdo sde): me ni zhi bar mdzod/ /lus kyi khur ni khur po che/ /shin tu mi bzad rno ba'i khur/ /sdug bsngal gzir ba bdag cag la/ /brtul zhugs dam pa thugs rje mdzod/ /skye bo rtag tu zhes
421a1(mdo sde): sdang dang / /gti mug non pa'i khur khyer te/ /khur las thar ba mi shes pa/ /de dag yang dang yang khur khyar/ /thar pa'i lam ni mi shes shing / /thar pa'i lam ni
421a2(mdo sde): ma mthong rnams/ /'chi ba rnam par shes mod kyi/ /'on kyang 'jigs pa mi skyed do/ /bdag cag la ni nam du yang / /'chi ba med snyam bde bar gnas/ /kun tu 'khrul pas ma shi
421a3(mdo sde): ba| |mthong yang rnam par mi shes so/ /de dag pha yang mi dran te/ /nad kyis kyang ni rtag gzir cing / /nyon mongs las kyis rab dkrugs na/ /ji ltar kha zas za bar 'gyur/ /sdug
421a4(mdo sde): bsngal nyam thag mi shes te/ /bdag cag ngal ba don med do/ /khyod kyi sdug bsngal 'di 'dra ba/ /ma rig gzhi las skyes pa 'o/ /'du shes 'du byed tshor ba rnams/ /'jigs chen lci
421a5(mdo sde): ba'i khur yin no/ /gang chos rnam par mi shes pa/ /byis pa sred pas rab tu 'khyams/ /lus kyi khur gyis bskor ba ni/ /'jig rten du ni don med skyes/ /gos gtsang zhin tu bzang
421a6(mdo sde): ba dang / /khrus dang byug pa dgos pa 'o/ /lus la gang yin 'ong ba yin/ /kha zas zhim po dgos pa ste/ /yid 'ong ba yi sil snyan lnga/ /de bzhin rna bas tshor bar byed/ /rin chen bdun
421a7(mdo sde): las byung ba yi/ /gzugs la mig gis chags par byed/ /zhim pa'i ro rnams thams cad ni/ /lces kyang tshor bar byed pa ste/ /'jam zhing phra ba'i reg pa yang / /lus kyis rtag tu
421b1(mdo sde): tshor bar byed/ /lus kyis su ni sha gnyis po/ /dga' bar yang ni bsgrubs pa las/ /sems pa med pa'i lus 'di skyes/ /de la dga' ba su zhig rnyed/ /de na bdag rkang dga' byed
421b2(mdo sde): pa| |lham ni rab tu bzang gyon yang / /'chi bar 'gyur tshe gos rnams dang / /byug pa skyabs su mi 'gyur te/ /lus kyang skyabs su 'gyur min na/ /gos dang byug pa smos ci dgos/ /mi
421b3(mdo sde): zhes bya ba lus yin te/ /dbugs dang stobs chen rnyed par 'gyur/ /so sor rtog pa'i rna ba'i stobs/ /de ni lus la yon tan che/ /sngon chang rta dang glang po yis/ /kun tu bskor nas rtse
421b4(mdo sde): zhing 'khyams/ /thar pa'i chos ni ma ster bas/ /bdag ci sdig pa'i las la chags/ /'jig rten pha rol ma shes nas/ /rtse bas sdig pa byed du bcug /bdag ni yang dang yang skyes te/ /shi
421b5(mdo sde): ba bdag la yang 'ongs so/ /yang dang yang du mya ngan mthong / /smre sngags 'don pas rab tu bcings/ /ma rnams kyang ni shi ba mthong / /pha rnams shi dang gnyen dag dang / /sring mo dang ni
421b6(mdo sde): bu dag dang / /chung ma rnams kyang shi ba mthong / /mngon par 'du byed kun stong na/ /sems dang bcas pa su zhig chags/ /'dod pas zin pa'i sems kyis su/ /bdag gis yid brtan rung
421b7(mdo sde): bar shes/ /zhi ba'i chos ni mi dmigs te/ /'chi ba la ni mngon dga' med/ /de phyir 'dod pas bsgribs sems kyis/ /bdag gis sbyin pa ma byin no/ /de bas 'dod dang mnyam sdig med//
422a1(mdo sde): de ni da dung mi ldog go /kun tu nor bas bdag cag skyes/ /'gro ba mtha' dag kun tu nor/ /kun tu nor ba'i sgra yang nyan/ /dam chos ma yin yongs su
422a2(mdo sde): 'dzin| |thar pa dang ni bsam gtan btsal/ /lus ni kun tu bkur mi bya/ /'jig rten don du 'gro ba'i gtso/ /sangs rgyas ston pa rnams su shog /sangs rgyas 'jig rten pha
422a3(mdo sde): dang ma| |sangs rgyas lam ni rab ston pa/ /dzam+bu'i gling ni kun tu yang / /rin chen char pa rab tu 'bebs/ /chos kyi bsdu ba ci 'dra ba/ /sems can blun pos mi shes te/ /byang
422a4(mdo sde): chub tu ni sems bsngos na/ /chos kyi bsdu ba thob par 'gyur/ /'du byed thams cad stong pa ste/ /de bzhin longs spyod nor yang stong / /bdag kyang stong par mthong bas na/ /mthong
422a5(mdo sde): nas re ba med par gyur/ /gnas brtan sman gyi sde khyod kyis/ /bdag cag rnams kyi tshig gson cig /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi phyir/ /khyod ni pho nyar bzhud 'tshal lo/
422a6(mdo sde): 'khor ba'i nyes pa rnams dran nas/ /byang chub sems dpa' skyo ba med/ /brtson 'grus ldan zhing dka' thub che/ /yon tan kun tu sdud par byed/ /ston de dag la bzhugs par bzhud//
422a7(mdo sde): ston pa bde bar rab sad nas/ /rgyal ba cung zad mi skyo bar/ /bdag cag slad du zhu ba mdzod/ /khyod kyis bdud ni gzhom pa dang / /stobs dang bcas pa pham par byas/ /sems can
422b1(mdo sde): thams cad yongs 'dzin pa'i/ /chos kyang myur du 'bar bar byas/ /gang gis sangs rgyas 'gyur ba yi/ /chos ni bdag cag ma thos kyi/ /bdag cag rnams la phan pa'i phyir/ /gnas brtan
422b2(mdo sde): myur du bzhud du gsol/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan mnga' ba'i/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ma mthong ba/ /de srid bdag cag mi rgal zhes/ /thams cad gus dang bcas par gnas/ /sman gyi
422b3(mdo sde): sdes smras pa/ khyed cag de ltar ci zhig mthong / /re zhig gyen du blta bar byos/ /de dag gyen du bltas pa dang / /khang pa brtsegs pa sum stong dang / /lnga brgya tham par tshang ba zhig /
422b4(mdo sde): kun tu yang ni gnas par gyur/ /rin chen bdun gyis shin tu spras/ /rin chen dra bas legs par brgyan/ /dbus na me tog rab tu rgyas/ /lha rdzas spos kyang rab tu bab/ /de na gnas
422b5(mdo sde): brtan dris pa ni/ /khang brtsegs rin chen dra ba dang / /pad+ma ze bar kun gnas par/ /'di na snang ba 'di ci zhig /sman gyi sdes smras pa/ gnas 'di dag ni khyed kyi ste/ /sangs rgyas blta
422b6(mdo sde): ba'i phyir dengs shing / 'jig rten 'das gtso gang yin pa/ /'jig rten snang byed de la thud/ /de dag gis smras pa/ de yi lam yang ma 'tshal te/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'ang ma mthong
422b7(mdo sde): na| |gang na lam yang ma 'tshal bas/ /phyag 'tshal du ni gang du mchi/ /sman gyi sdes smras pa/ nam mkha' mtha' yas ji bzhin du/ /reg par rung ba ma yin pas/ /bdud rtsi rab sbyin
423a1(mdo sde): ston pa la/ /phyag 'tshal phyir ni 'gro mi nus/ /ji ltar ri rab gnas pa ltar/ /ston pa de yang gnas na bzhugs/ /ri rab gzhal du rung ba yin/ /rgya mtsho
423a2(mdo sde): chen po gting tshod zin/ /stong gsum rdul phran dpag tu rung / /sangs rgyas 'byung ba shes ma yin/ /byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu nas/ /'jig rten snang bar mdzad la
423a3(mdo sde): 'dud| |smras pa/ 'jig rten mgon po bdag cag gzigs/ /bdag cag bsam pa rdzogs par mdzod/ /bdag cag sems kyis ston pa la/ /phyag bgyis de nas 'bras bu thob//
423a4(mdo sde): sman gyi sdes smras pa/ ston pa dril mi chags te/ /phreng ba ma yin byug pa min/ /gang gis 'dus byas grol 'gyur ba/ /sems can rnams kyi rgyu 'dzin to/ /gang gis yid ni
423a5(mdo sde): btul byas shing / /sangs rgyas la yang skyabs song ba/ /de la bdud ni mi bzad mchog /'thab mo rgol bar mi byed do/ /'chi ba'i dbang du mi 'gro yi/ /gzungs ni myur du rnyed
423a6(mdo sde): par 'gyur/ /de sems rab tu dang byas nas/ /de nas ston pa mthong bar 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ka la ping+ka'i sgra skad yid du 'ong ba 'dzum
423a7(mdo sde): pa mdzad do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde stan las langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom
423b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer brgyad khri bzhi stong byung ste/ 'od zer de dag gis thams cad dang
423b2(mdo sde): ldan pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di khyab par gyur/ sems can dmyal ba chen po sum cu rtsa gnyis po thams cad kyang khyab par gyur/ lha'i gnas
423b3(mdo sde): sum cu rtsa gnyis kyang snang bar gyur/ 'od zer de dag kyang kha dog sna tshogs sha stag la 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / le brgan dang / shel
423b4(mdo sde): dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu ste/ 'od zer de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas byung nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams la bde
423b5(mdo sde): bar sbyar ba thams cad bgyis nas slar log ste/ bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun bskor ba bgyis nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub par gyur pa'i 'dzum pa mdzad
423b6(mdo sde): pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/
423b7(mdo sde): gal te bdag la skabs dbye bar gnang na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o//
424a1(mdo sde): de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sman gyi
424a2(mdo sde): sde| khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / ngas dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ sems can gzhon nu
424a3(mdo sde): bye ba stong phrag sum cu byung ba de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos phra ba bstan pa rtogs nas sems can rgan po rnams la sems can rgan po khyed rnams ni/ chos mi
424a4(mdo sde): shes pa'o/ /rtag tu chos ma yin pa dang / mi dge ba la chags pa'o/ /zhes phra mo rnams mi snyan pa mchi zhing yongs su brjod la gnod pa bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de
424a5(mdo sde): ci'i slad du tshig snyan pa yid du 'ong ba 'di dag smras/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde/ de dag ci'i phyir tshig 'di skad smra ba mi shes sam/ de dag
424a6(mdo sde): ni| de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jam zhing shin tu snyan pa smras ste/ chos kyang thos pas sman gyi sde/ de'i phyir de dag chos thams cad kyi don khong du chud par 'gyur/ yon
424a7(mdo sde): tan thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur/ de dag thams cad gzungs rtogs par 'gyur/ deng phyin chad sa bcu la gnas par 'gyur/ deng chos kyi rnga chen po'i sgra 'byin par
424b1(mdo sde): 'gyur| deng chos chen po'i rnam pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /sman gyi sde/ khang pa brtsegs pa 'di dag mthong ngam/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das/ mthong lags so/ /bde
424b2(mdo sde): bar gshegs pa/ mthong lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde/ deng nyid sems can gzhon nu 'di dag khang pa brtsegs pa 'di dag gi nang du
424b3(mdo sde): zhugs nas chos mngon par rtogs pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /deng nyid dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro/ /deng chos kyi rnga chen po rdung bar 'gyur te /
424b4(mdo sde): lha'i ris du ma zhig deng chos mngon par rtogs pa thob par byed par 'gyur ro/ /sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can log par ltung ba la gnas pa mang po dag kyang de bzhin gshegs
424b5(mdo sde): pa'i ye shes bstan pa thos nas 'khor ba bsnyil te rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i tshe sems can rgan po bye ba stong phrag dgu bcu thams cad kyis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ de
424b6(mdo sde): dag thams cad kyang chos dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /sman gyi sde/ de dag thams cad ni/ sdug bsngal thams cad yongs su spangs par 'gyur ro/ /sman gyi sde/ de dag thams cad ni/ de
424b7(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba sgrub par 'gyur ro/ /sman gyi sde/ de dag thams cad ni/ chos chen po'i sgra dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /sman gyi sde/ phyogs bzhir ltos shig /byang chub sems
425a1(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes phyogs bzhi kun tu bltas pa dang / shar phyogs nas byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA'i klung bye ba phrag lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed 'ong /
425a2(mdo sde): lho phyogs nas byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA'i klung bye ba phrag drug cu'i bye ma snyed 'ong / nub phyogs nas byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA'i klung bye ba phrag bdun cu'i bye ma snyed 'ong / byang phyogs
425a3(mdo sde): nas byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA'i klung bye ba phrag brgyad cu'i bye ma snyed 'ong / 'og gi phyogs nas byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA'i klung bye ba phrag dgu bcu'i bye ma snyed 'ong / steng gi phyogs
425a4(mdo sde): nas byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA'i klung bye ba phrag brgya'i bye ma snyed 'ong ste/ de dag lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod pa
425a5(mdo sde): dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ nam mkha' bar snang la gzugs nag po dang / gzugs
425a6(mdo sde): dmar po gda' ba ci zhig lags/ bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde/ gang bar snang la gzugs nag po dang / gzugs dmar po mthong ba 'di ci yin mi shes sam/ de bzhin gshegs pas
425a7(mdo sde): ni| mkhyen te/ sman gyi sde/ 'di ni/ bdud yin no/ /sman gyi sde/ mthong bar 'dod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'tshal lo/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan
425b1(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde/ byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA'i klung bye ba phrag brgya'i bye ma dang mnyam pa 'di lta bu lhags so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems
425b2(mdo sde): dpa' 'di dag lhags pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde/ sems can gzhon nu rnams kyi rkyen gyis te/ de sems can thams cad bsam gtan gyi
425b3(mdo sde): chos dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /sman gyi sde/ khyod kyis sems can gzugs sna tshogs 'dir lhags pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis byin gyi rlabs sna tshogs 'di lhags pa dag mthong
425b4(mdo sde): ngam| gsol pa/ bdag gis ni/ byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA'i klung bye ba phrag brgya'i bye ma snyed dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA'i klung bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi bye ma snyed
425b5(mdo sde): cig rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus gnas te/ gzugs sna tshogs/ kha dog sna tshogs/ dbyibs sna tshogs pa dag gnas la/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'phags pa'i chos kyi gnas la
425b6(mdo sde): gnas te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'khor dang bcas nas chos kyi gnas la gnas pa mthong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas byang chub sems dpa'
425b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po kun tu dpa' ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde dang / byang chub sems dpa' gsar rnying de dag kun dang / thams cad dang
426a1(mdo sde): ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon
426a2(mdo sde): par bstod do/ /'phags pa zung gi mdo'i chos kyi rnam grangs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhus chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+d+he ye shes
426a3(mdo sde): sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa/ rgya gar skad du/ Ar+yA tsin+t+ya pra b+hA sa ni ra de sho nA ma d+harma par+yA ya/ bod skad du/ 'phags
426a4(mdo sde): pa khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas bstan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis
426a5(mdo sde): thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge
426a6(mdo sde): 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya tsam dang / thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por gnas nas bzhugs te/ rgyal po
426a7(mdo sde): dang / blon po chen po dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag dang / grong rdal gyi mi dang / nang mi rnams kyis bsti stang du byas/ btsun par byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ bcom
426b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / byogs pa dang / myang ba bzang po mang po brnyes so/ /'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
426b2(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/
426b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rigs phun sum tshogs pa/ gdung phun sum tshogs pa/ cho rigs phun sum tshogs pa/ tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa/ ting nge 'dzin phun
426b4(mdo sde): sum tshogs pa/ shes rab phun sum tshogs pa/ rnam par grol ba phun sum tshogs pa/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa phun sum tshogs pa'o/ /zhes/ bcom ldan 'das
