426b5(mdo sde): kyi grags pa'i sgra dang / snyan pa 'jig rten du rgya cher mngon du byung bar gyur to/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha
426b6(mdo sde): dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyang ston te/ tshangs par spyod pa/ thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ /tshig 'bru bzang
426b7(mdo sde): po| |ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byung ba yang dag par rab tu ston to/ /spyan lnga dang yang ldan te/ sha'i spyan dang / lha'i spyan dang / chos kyi spyan dang /
427a1(mdo sde): shes rab kyi spyan dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyan dang ldan no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhan mu stegs can dpyod pa pa dang / kun tu rgyu dang / gcer bu ba
427a2(mdo sde): gnyen gyi bu rnams ni/ tshar bcad do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa 'di lha dang mi rnams kyis yang dag par bzung zhing 'bar ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro'i dus kyi tshe
427a3(mdo sde): chos gos dang sham thabs mnabs te lhung bzed bsnams nas dge slong gi tshogs dge slong gi dge 'dun dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis
427a4(mdo sde): yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ mdun du gzigs pa dang / g.yas g.yon du gzigs pa mdzes pa dang / bskum pa dang brkyang pa mdzes pa dang / chos gos snam sbyar dang /
427a5(mdo sde): bsil zan dang / na bza'i tshogs dang / lhung bzed bsnams pa mdzes pa dang / sku mdog gser gyi kha dog lta bu dang / 'od 'dom gang bas mtshan mo mun pa mun nag gi
427a6(mdo sde): nang na me'i phung po lta bu dang / tshes bco lnga'i zla ba nya ba lta ba dang / nyi ma shar ba lta bur phyogs su snang zhing skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan te/ grong khyer chen
427a7(mdo sde): po mnyan yod du bsod snyoms kyi phyin gshegs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sgo'i them pa la zhabs bzhag ma thag tu/ de nas mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por grong khyer du gshegs
427b1(mdo sde): pa na| cho 'phrul ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba chos rnam pa 'di dag byung ste/ skyes bu dam pa 'dren pa de gshegs pa'i tshe/ der cho 'phrul rmad du byung ba chen po gang dag byung ba de dag brjod par
427b2(mdo sde): bya'i| shin tu dang ba'i sems kyis nyon cig / long pa rnams kyis ni/ mthong ngo / /'on pa rnams kyis ni/ thos so/ /gcer bu rnams kyis ni/ gos rnyed do/ /smyon pa rnams kyis dran pa
427b3(mdo sde): thob po| |grong khyer gyi skye bo thams cad ni/ thal mo sbyar te/ bde bar gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnga bo che dang / rdza rnga dang / 'khar rnga dang / sgra snyan dag ni/ ma brdungs par sgra 'byung
427b4(mdo sde): ngo / /ngang pa dang / ngur pa dang / khrung khrung dang / rma bya dang / ne tso dang / khu byug dag kyang yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byin to/ /gang dag gter stor ba de dag gis ni/ gter rnams rnyed par
427b5(mdo sde): gyur to| |gser dang dngul las byas pa'i snod rnams kyang ma dkrol bar sgra byung ngo / /sa'ang rnam pa drug tu g.yos shing 'gul te/ sems can rnams skyabs med par yang ma gyur cing /
427b6(mdo sde): yid dang ba rab tu thob bo/ /smra ba'i mchog dam pa sangs rgyas kyis gang dang gang du zhabs kyis gom pa bor ba de dang der pad+ma dri ma med cing / legs par gnas pa rnams byung ngo / /dud
427b7(mdo sde): 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i sems can gang dag gis mthong ba de dag thams cad kyang bde ba rnyed nas mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /bud med gang dag sbrum pa de dag kyang mi bde ba
428a1(mdo sde): med pa nyid du gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug ba dag btsas so/ /sems can rnams la'ang 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams kyis
428a2(mdo sde): gnod par gyur pa med do/ /rab tu sdang ba'i sems med par phan tshun smra ste/ dper na/ pha'am ma zhig bu gcig pa la smra ba bzhin no/ /srang gi g.yas g.yon rnams kyang
428a3(mdo sde): legs par brgyan par gyur to/ /nam mkha' la gnas pa'i lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis kyang me tog sil ma dag mngon par gtor to/ /sems can sdug bsngal bar gyur
428a4(mdo sde): pa gang yang med do/ /sems can gang dag na bar gyur pa de dag kyang nad med par gyur te/ bde ba thob bo/ /bde bar gshegs pa gshegs pa na sems can so so nas de
428a5(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa ni/ bdag kho na la gzigs so/ /snyam du sems so/ /so so nas bdag nyid bsod snyoms 'bul zhing / mi'i 'dren pa la brten nas bdag kho na bsod
428a6(mdo sde): snyoms kyi 'bras bu la sbyor ro/ /snyam du sems te/ de gshegs pa tsam yang gzhal bar sla ba ma yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das grong khyer chen po mnyan yod du mthar
428a7(mdo sde): chags su bsod snyoms bzhes shing gshegs nas/ bcom ldan 'das grong bar gyi dbus shig tu gshegs pa dang / de'i tshe khang stong zhig tu khye'u gzugs bzang ba /
428b1(mdo sde): mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa zhig por bar gyur te/ lag pa g.yas pa'i mdzub mo khar bcug nas 'jig cing 'dug pa la khyi'am/ ce spyang gang dag khang stong der lhags pa
428b2(mdo sde): de dag kyang khye'u de la lce'i dbang pos bldags shing 'dong ste/ 'di ltar sngon byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas khye'u de la 'tshe ba mi byed do/ /khang stong der skye bo phal po che dag kyang 'jug
428b3(mdo sde): cing 'byung ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo phal po che 'jug cing 'byung ba gzigs nas mkhyen bzhin du tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ gang du
428b4(mdo sde): skye bo phal po che 'di dag 'jug cing 'byung ba'i khang stong de na ci yod ltos/ de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan te/ khang stong
428b5(mdo sde): ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang / khye'u gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa zhig lag pa g.yas pa'i mdzub mo khar bcug ste/ 'jib cing 'dug la mig gnyis mi 'dzum
428b6(mdo sde): par skye bo'i tshogs thams cad la lta ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la skabs de gsol pa/
428b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das/ khang stong de na khye'u bor ba gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ rin po che'i gzugs ltar mchis pa/ mig mi 'dzum par skye bo'i tshogs thams cad
429a1(mdo sde): la lta ba zhig mchis so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kye ma khye'u 'di ni/ sngon gyi sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa ste/ nga'i legs par bshad pa'i don shes
429a2(mdo sde): par nus shing / skal ba can no/ /snyam nas khye'u de la thugs brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che dge ba la gzud pa'i phyir khang stong ga la ba der gshegs so/ /de nas bcom ldan
429a3(mdo sde): 'das der gshegs nas phyogs gcig tu bzhugs te phyogs gcig tu bzhugs nas khye'u de la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ sprul dang gnod sbyin rgyu ba yis/ /dur khrod
429a4(mdo sde): 'jigs pa che 'di na/ /byis pa ji ltar mi 'jigs shing / /khyod da gcig pu 'di na 'dug /de nas khye'u des sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / rang gi sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas bcom ldan 'das
429a5(mdo sde): la slar tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ bdag ma mchis pa'i chos rnams la/ /thub pa'i dbang phyug su zhig 'jigs/ /thams cad mkhyen pa smra ba'i mchog /ji ltar 'dir mchis las
429a6(mdo sde): gang lags/ /bdag gcig bdag gis gang ma mchis/ /bdag kyang gang gi'ang ma lags te/ /bdag ni su'i lags de ma mthong / /bdag gi su lags de ma mthong / /bcom ldan 'das
429a7(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/ sngon chad sdig pa byas pa'i las/ /de yi rnam smin 'di 'dra ste/ /khang ba stong pa 'dir por nas/ /sdug bsngal tshor ba myong ba yin/ /khye'us gsol pa/ gau tam
429b1(mdo sde): khang stong snyam pa yi/ /'du shes da dung mnga' ba blta/ /byang chub snying por khyod bzhugs nas/ /'du shes yongs su ma mkhyen tam/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ngas ni
429b2(mdo sde): 'du shes yongs shes te/ /nga la 'du shes yod ma yin/ /khyod nyid la ni snying brtse bas/ /khang pa stong pa 'dir 'ongs so/ /khye'us gsol pa/ sems can dag ni bar 'ga' yang / /
429b3(mdo sde): gang tshe shin tu mi dmigs pa/ /de tshe thugs rje gang du byung / /khyod ni su la thugs brtse mdzad/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bdag med zhi ba stong pa nyid/ /sems can 'di
429b4(mdo sde): dag mi shes te/ /de dag nyid la snying brtse phyir/ /bsod nams spyad pa spyod pa yin/ /khye'us gsol pa/ stong pa zhi ba thugs chud nas/ /zhi ba stong pa nyid mkhyen kyang / /de bzhin gshegs
429b5(mdo sde): pa da dung du/ /phyin ci log kyang ma spangs sam/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zhi ba stong pa nyid rtogs nas/ /sems can yongs su smin bya'i phyir/ /'dren pa chos ston mdzad
429b6(mdo sde): pa 'di| |sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs rje yin/ /khye'us gsol pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa da dung du/ /khyod kyis phyin ci log ma spangs/ /sems can 'du shes ma mchis na/ /thugs rje
429b7(mdo sde): gang du skye bar 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems ni rab bzung nas/ /yod min sems can rnams la yang / /mi mchog rnams ni go gyon pa/ /rang
430a1(mdo sde): byung rnams kyis byin brlabs so/ /khye'us gsol pa/ dngos po gang na mi dmigs pas/ /go cha thams cad rdzun pa lags/ /dngos po ma mchis chos rnams
430a2(mdo sde): la| |go cha dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos rnams dngos po yod min yang / /srog chags rnams la chos ston 'di/ /'jig rten mgon po
430a3(mdo sde): skyob rnams kyi/ /thugs rjes rnam par rol pa yin/ /khye'us gsol pa/ chos ni yi ge ma mchis na/ /bshad pa gud na ga la mchis/ /'jig rten rnams la slu mdzad dam/ /chos ma
430a4(mdo sde): lags pa chos bshad dam/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nga ni 'jig rten slu ma yin/ /chos ma yin pa nga mi smra/ /phyin ci log gyur sems can gyi/ /nyon mongs sel
430a5(mdo sde): bar nga byed do/ /khye'us gsol pa/ nyon mongs rtsa ba ma mchis te/ /nang ngam phyi rol rnams na yang / /de dag rnams kyi gnas ma mchis/ /nyon mongs ji ltar rnam par sbyang / /bcom
430a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyin ci log las byung ba rnams/ /yongs su brtags las skyes pa ste/ /rtog pa thams cad spang ba'i phyir/ /srog chags rnams la chos ston
430a7(mdo sde): to| |khye'us gsol pa/ rnam brtag mang po ci 'tshal te/ /sems ni rang bzhin 'od gsal zhing / /de la nyon mongs mi 'byung ste/ /nam yang nyon mongs de mi 'gyur/ /bcom ldan
430b1(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ /sems ni rtag tu 'od gsal kyang / /glo bur nye ba'i nyon mongs kyis/ /so so'i skye bo nyon mongs 'gyur/ /khye'us gsol pa/
430b2(mdo sde): nyon mongs dmigs su ma mchis te/ /de dag phyogs na mi gnas na/ /glo bur du ni ji ltar 'gyur/ /de zhus bdag la bshad du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dper
430b3(mdo sde): na sprin rnams par snang la/ /snang yang de dag de bzhin min/ /nyon mongs 'byung ba'ang de 'dra ste/ /snang yang de dag de bzhin min/ /khye'us gsol pa/ ma nor de bzhin gang lags pa/ /
430b4(mdo sde): chos gnas nyid de chos nyid do/ /ma nor de bzhin nyid chos la/ /nor ba'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byis pa 'du shes ldan rnams kyi/ /
430b5(mdo sde): log par rnam par gang brtags pa/ /blo de rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ /de bzhin gshegs rnams 'byung ba yin/ /khye'us gsol pa/ skye ma mchis pas rab phye ba/ /rdzogs pa'i
430b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas gang zhig byung / /skye ba ma mchis chos rnams la/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba 'thad ma lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skye ba med par skye ba ni/ /sangs rgyas
430b7(mdo sde): 'byung ba rab tu bstan/ /kun rdzob tha snyad btags pa ste/ /dam pa'i don du yod ma yin/ /khye'us gsol pa/ da dung khyod la don dam dang / /kun rdzob 'du shes gnyis mnga' ste/ /theg
431a1(mdo sde): pa gcig lam 'gal 'gyur ba/ /gau tam khyod kyis bka' stsal to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nga ni lam dang 'gal mi byed/ /'gal
431a2(mdo sde): ba med par nga gnas te/ /mi mthun sems can sdums kyang byed/ /khye'u khyod de ltar shes par gyis/ /khye'us gsol pa/ sems can de ni mi dmigs na/ /gau ta ma khyod ci
431a3(mdo sde): sdums mdzad/ /chos rnams sngon gyi mtha' la gzigs/ /gang gis kun nas nyon mongs skye/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi mtha' dang / /
431a4(mdo sde): de bzhin da ltar byung ba dang / /byang chub dam pa rtogs gyur nas/ /srog chags rnams la chos ston to/ /khye'us gsol pa/ rdzogs sangs rgyas zhes sgrog mdzad cing / /nyid kyi
431a5(mdo sde): mkhyen pa sgrog mdzad de/ /'di ltar bdag tu sgro 'dogs pas/ /khyod ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal che/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nga ni bdag la mi bstod de/ /de bzhin gzhan
431a6(mdo sde): la brnyas mi byed/ /de bzhin nyid ni rab tu ston/ /des na de bzhin gshegs zhes bya/ /khye'us gsol pa/ brjod du ma mchis de bzhin nyid/ /de na de nyid ma mchis na/ /sgra skad ma
431a7(mdo sde): mchis sgra bshad pa/ /mkhyen bzhin log par bka' ma stsal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos de thams cad log pa ste/ /de bzhin nyid las byung ba yin/ /de bzhin
431b1(mdo sde): nyid ni rtogs pas na/ /nga la skyon med yon tan med/ /khye'us gsol pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu yis na/ /bdag gi spobs pa 'di skyes te/ /'di 'dra'i lan dag gang gsol pa/ /rdzogs
431b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas la bzod par gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag g.yas pa gser gyi kha dog can chos gos kyi nang nas phyung ste/ khye'u de logs su brkyang ba dang / de nas khye'u des
431b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gi sor mo la bzung ste langs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u de khang stong nas bsnams te/ srang du bzhag pa dang / de na skye bo phal po che dag 'di ltar khye'u
431b4(mdo sde): 'di 'di kho na ltar nyon mongs par gyur kyang bdag nyid chen po'i chos 'di lta bu'i lan 'debs pa ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ngo mtshar to/ /snyam nas/ ngo mtshar du gyur te/
431b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la rab tu phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /khye'u/ khyod kyi las kyi sgrib pa zad kyi/ sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dran
431b6(mdo sde): par gyis la skye bo'i tshogs chen po la'ang shes par bgyis te/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen po ston cig /de nas khye'u de sa las mi bdun srid tsam du 'phags nas lus las 'od phyung ste/
431b7(mdo sde): 'od des mnyan yod thams cad dang / dzam+bu'i gling thams cad snang ba chen po rgyas par gyur to/ /'od des brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / de ma yin pa lha brgya
432a1(mdo sde): stong mang po gzhan dag la'ang yang dag par bskul bar gyur nas/ skad cig thang gcig yud tsam de la bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste lhags nas/
432a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lha'i me tog dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gtor nas/ bcom ldan 'das/ kye ma byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni/ snang ba
432a3(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'od kyis snang bar bgyis nas/ sems can dpag tu ma mchis pa dag gi don bgyis so/ /zhes ched du brjod pa de skad
432a4(mdo sde): ched du brjod de/ de ltar khye'u de'i ming snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya bar btags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang khye'u 'di snang ba bsam
432a5(mdo sde): gyis mi khyab pa bya bar gyur cig / ces khye'u de'i ming la rjes su yi rang mdzad do/ /de nas khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa bar snang de las babs te/ sa la 'dug pa dang / de sangs
432a6(mdo sde): rgyas kyi mthu dang / rang gi sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas 'di lta ste/ dper na/ grogs po lo brgyad lon pa'i lus gzugs yongs su grub par gyur pa de 'dra bar 'dug go /de nas lha'i
432a7(mdo sde): dbang po brgya byin gyis khye'u de la lha'i ras bcos bu zung zhig byin te/ kye khye'u/ nga la snying brtse ba'i phyir ras bcos bu'i zung 'di gyon la gcer bur ma 'dug cig /de nas khye'u
432b1(mdo sde): snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kau shi ka /byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/ gos kyi rgyan bgos pas mdzes pa ma yin gyi/ byang chub
432b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams ni/ chos kyi rgyan thogs na mdzes so/ /kau shi ka /de lta mod kyi/ 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan gang dag yin pa de dag
432b3(mdo sde): nyon cig / byang chub kyi sems ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/ byang chub kyi snying po brgyan par 'gyur ro/ /ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa'i rgyan ni/ byang chub sems
432b4(mdo sde): dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/ sems can thams cad mngon du 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /dam bcas pa brtan pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/ shes rab yongs su
432b5(mdo sde): rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /bsam pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/ sgyu dang g.yo sel bar 'gyur ro/ /sbyor ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/
432b6(mdo sde): dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /lhag pa'i bsam pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/ thams cad las khyad par 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /
432b7(mdo sde): nga rgyal med pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/ ye shes yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /chos don du gnyer ba dang / chos 'dod pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
433a1(mdo sde): rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/ shes rab yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud med pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/
433a2(mdo sde): chags pa med pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /nor thams cad yongs su gtong ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang
433a3(mdo sde): po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /tshul khrims yongs su dag pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/ smon lam yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /bzod pa dang
433a4(mdo sde): des pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/ tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyi nga ro dang / sgra skad lta bu'i tshig tu 'gyur ro/ /dam bcas pa brtan zhing sems mi zhum pa ni/
433a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/ bya ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par
433a6(mdo sde): 'jug pa thob pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/ mngon par shes pa chen po'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /tshig rab tu dbye ba shes pa'i shes
433a7(mdo sde): rab ni| byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/ bag la nyal dang / lta bar smra ba dang / kun nas ldang ba thams cad rnam par sel bar 'gyur ro/ /snying rje chen po ni/
433b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/ 'khor ba na yongs su mi skyo bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa med pa'i sems ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
433b2(mdo sde): kyi gos kyi rgyan te/ bdag dang gzhan gyi don la skyo ba med par 'gyur ro/ /zang zing med par chos ston pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/ shes rab kyis
433b3(mdo sde): bdag dang gzhan sgrol bar 'gyur ro/ /chos sgrub pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spong bar 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka /rnam grangs
433b4(mdo sde): 'dis 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' gang chos kyi rgyan 'di lta bu dag dang ldan pa de nam yang gcer pu ma yin par rig par bya'o/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis khye'u de la
433b5(mdo sde): shin tu dga' ba dang / dad pa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis ras bcos bu'i zung 'di len
433b6(mdo sde): du stsal bar gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /khye'u/ ras bcos bu'i zung 'di longs la gyon cig /
433b7(mdo sde): de nas khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo
434a1(mdo sde): sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar ras bcos bu'i zung blangs nas bgos so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das grong khyer chen po mnyan yod du bsod
434a2(mdo sde): snyoms la gshegs so/ /de na skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / tshong dpon dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag dang / rgyal po dang / blon po chen po dag ngo
434a3(mdo sde): mtshar du gyur te/ khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa la blta ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la'ang blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / mchod pa'i phyir 'dus par gyur to/ /de nas bcom
434a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das mthar gyis bsod snyoms bzhes te/ khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ma'i khyim gal ba der gshegs so/ /gshegs nas kyang cang mi gsung bar phyogs gcig
434a5(mdo sde): tu bzhugs so/ /de nas khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ma ngo tsha nas/ /bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir sgor ma byung ngo / /de nas khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa rang gi
434a6(mdo sde): khyim du song nas/ ma la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ bdag gi sngon gyi nongs pa yis/ /khyod kyi mngal du bdag mchis te/ /yum gyis nongs pa ma lags kyi/ /'o ltar gnod bar
434a7(mdo sde): ma mdzad cig / thugs brtse ldan te bskyed pas na/ /bdag gi sbyin gnas khyod lags so/ /zhal tsha ma mdzad ma 'dzem par/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du bzhud/ /de ltar khyod
434b1(mdo sde): mngal bdag mchis pa/ /khyod kyis brnyes pa legs par brnyes/ /lus kyi dge ba'i las rnams kyang / /rnam par 'dren la zhu ba mdzod/ /de nas khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas
434b2(mdo sde): lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kau shi ka /lha'i me tog man+dA ra ba dag dang / lha'i spos dag dang / lha'i gos dag bdag la stsol cig /de dag bdag gis skyed pa'i ma
434b3(mdo sde): 'di la stsol to/ /'dis de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bgyis nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /de nas lha'i dbang po
434b4(mdo sde): brgya byin gyis/ khye'u de la lha'i me tog man+dA ra ba dag dang / lha'i spos dag dang / lha'i gos dag byin no/ /de nas khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas ma la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/
434b5(mdo sde): yum gcig lha yi me tog man+dA ra/ /blta sdug bsngal shing yid du 'ong ba dag /spos dang na bza' 'di dag blang mdzod la/ /mi mchog sangs rgyas de la dbul ba mdzod/ /'jig rten dag na
434b6(mdo sde): pha ma zas skom dang / /nor dang gos kyis mchod pa mchod ma lags so/ /gzhan du gang dag chos la sbyor bgyid pa/ /des na de dag mchod pa bgyis par 'gyur/ /rkang gnyis dam pa de la
434b7(mdo sde): mchod mdzod la/ /byang chub mchog tu smon lam brtan par mdzod/ /bdag ni dus dus khyod kyi drung mchis te/ /yun ring dus nas skul ba bgyid pa lags/ /gnod zhing zhum pa'i sems su
435a1(mdo sde): ma mdzad par/ /rangs pa'i sems dang dga' ba thob mdzod la/ /rang byung rgyal ba bzhugs pa der bzhud de/ /skyes bu mchog gi zhabs la phyag mdzod la/ /mgon po
435a2(mdo sde): de la me tog spos rnams dang / /de bzhin na bza' rnams kyang gtor nas su/ /rgyal ba de las dge ba'i rtsa bskyed de/ /byang chub mchog tu sems kyang bskyed pa mdzod/ /byang chub mchog
435a3(mdo sde): tu sems ni brtan gyur nas/ /gang dag dang bas rgyal la gus bgyis pa/ /de dag rnam smin 'jig mgon bka' stsal ces/ /rang byung rgyal ba de la zhu ba mdzod/ /de nas bud med de
435a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/ zhu ba ji skad bstan pa bzhin du
435a5(mdo sde): gus pa dang bcas par yongs su zhus so/ /zhu ba zhus pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bsgrubs pa 'dis/ /ngan 'gro'am mi khom 'gro mi 'gyur//
435a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bya mang mnyes byas nas/ /mi yi dam pa sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis grong khyer chen po mnyan yod du bsod snyoms bzhes nas/ khye'u snang ba
435a7(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab ba dang / skye bo phal po che gzhan dag dang yang thabs cig tu grong khyer nas byung ste/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba ga la ba
435b1(mdo sde): der gshegs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zas kyi bya ba mdzad de/ nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas chos mnyan du gzhug pa'i phyir bzhugs so/ /de nas yul ko sa la'i
435b2(mdo sde): rgyal po gsal rgyal dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang lhan cig tu rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
435b3(mdo sde): zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
435b4(mdo sde): to| |bcom ldan 'das/ gang ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos rnam pa de lta bu dag dang ldan pa'i khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa de ga la mchis/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
435b5(mdo sde): khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan nas mthong ste/ rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis khye'u de'i lus gzugs yongs su grub pa lha las 'das pa'i mdog dang / mi 'jigs pa dang /
435b6(mdo sde): tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab kyis brgyan pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ sngon las byas shing bsags pa ji lta bu zhig gis 'di ltar 'di'i lus yongs
435b7(mdo sde): su dag par gyur snyam mo/ /de nas khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / rang gi sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa
436a1(mdo sde): sems kyis shes nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ gang dag rtag tu byams sems dag sems ldan/ /gang dag mi brlang mnyen zhing dran ldan la/ /legs par
436a2(mdo sde): bsdams shing drang la tshangs spyod pa/ /de dag lus ni rnam par dag par 'gyur/ /gang dag sdig pa spong zhing mi spyod la/ /rtag tu dge ba mi chung rnam spel zhing / /gnod par sems dang khro
436a3(mdo sde): ba rnam spong ba/ /de dag lus ni rnam par dag par 'gyur/ /gang dag sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs mchog la/ /gus dang bcas par rtag tu mchod byed cing / /gzhan la rdeg 'tshog sdigs
436a4(mdo sde): mo mi byed pa/ /de dag lus rnam par dag par 'gyur/ /gang dag gzhan la phrag dog ser sna dang / /de bzhin nga rgyal dag kyang mi byed la/ /gzhan gyi nyes pa byung ba mi brjod pa/ /de
436a5(mdo sde): dag lus ni rnam par dag par 'gyur/ /gzhan la co 'dri ba dang smad pa dang / /bshung ba dag ni nam yang mi byed cing / /gzhan la 'khrul ba'i glags lta mi byed pa/ /de dag lus ni rnam
436a6(mdo sde): par dag par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di chos chen po dang
436a7(mdo sde): ldan pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das/ las kyi sgrib pa gang zhig gis/ khye'u 'di bud med khyim thab ma mchis pa'i mngal du skyes la/ der yang khang stong du bor bar gyur/ bcom ldan
436b1(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ 'di nas bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig 'das pa/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
436b2(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/
436b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo / /rgyal po chen po/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs de'i
436b4(mdo sde): gsung rab la byang chub sems dpa' gnyis shig byung ste/ lha bzang zhes bya ba dang / sa zhes bya ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' lha bzang zhes bya bar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/ phyir mi
436b5(mdo sde): ldog par gyur cing / don nyung ba/ bya ba nyung ba/ dben pa la dga' ba/ bsam gtan dang / mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse bar gyur to/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sa zhes bya bar
436b6(mdo sde): gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/ chos rgya chen po dang ldan par gyur te/ lha bzang gi g.yog byed do/ /de ha cang grong dang / grong rdal dang / yul 'khor dang / pho brang 'khor dag tu 'jug ste/
436b7(mdo sde): zhugs nas kyang bya ba mang zhing byed pa mang bar gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' lha bzang des de la khyod ci'i phyir rnal 'byor dang spong ba la brtson par mi byed par ha cang bya ba mang zhing
437a1(mdo sde): ha cang byed pa mang zhes bsgo zhing bstan to/ /des de la yang dang yang bskul bas khros 'khrugs te yid ma rangs nas/ gnod sems su gyur pa des lus dang
437a2(mdo sde): sems ma rungs par byas te/ ngan du bsam nas tshig rtsub po smras pa/ nal gyi bu/ sbyar ma'i bu/ skyes pa gzhan las grub pa khyod kyi pha ma'ang med na/ khyod la shes rab bam/ tshul
437a3(mdo sde): khrims lta ga la yod ces des ngan du bsam ste/ tshig rtsub po smras pa/ mi mthol/ mi 'chags/ mi 'dor gyi/ zhe la 'dzin te/ de byang chub sems dpa' lha bzang de la rtag
437a4(mdo sde): tu ngan sems dang ldan zhing byams pa'i sems med par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' lha bzang gis kyang de snod ma yin no/ /zhes nas bkye ba dang / de de bas kyang byang chub
437a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' lha bzang la ngan du sems shing bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod de/ snyan pa ma yin pa dang / grags pa ma yin pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa ma yin pa brjod do/ /de
437a6(mdo sde): las bsags shing tshogs su byas pa des lus zhig ste/ shi ba'i 'og tu bud med khyim zab med pa'i mngal du skyes so/ /byang chub kyi sems bsrungs pas des na sems
437a7(mdo sde): can dmyal bar ni/ ma skyes so/ /de btsal ma thag tu bud med des lam srang chen por bor te/ der de khyi dang / spyang ki dang / ce sbyang rnams kyis zos so/ /rgyal po chen po/
437b1(mdo sde): tshul 'di 'dra bar 'di bskal pa dgu bcur sdug bsngal 'di lta bu dang / nyam thag pa 'di lta bus 'chi ba'i dus byas shing btsas pa na'ang bor bar gyur te/ yang skye bo phal po che 'di
437b2(mdo sde): skad du nal gyi bu/ sbyar ma'i bu 'di la khyi dang / sbyang ki dang / ce sbyang rnams za'o/ /zhes 'dzer to/ /rgyal po chen po/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ byang chub sems dpa' sa zhe bya bar gyur pa de
437b3(mdo sde): gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod som nyi'am/ yid gnyis za bar gyur na/ rgyal po chen po/ khyod kyis de de ltar mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di
437b4(mdo sde): de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya bar gyur to/ /rgyal po chen po /'di'i las kyi sgrib pa ni/ zad/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sems ni/ rnam par sbyangs/ de bzhin
437b5(mdo sde): gshegs pa ni/ mnyes par byas/ ngan 'gro thams cad ni/ bcad nas/ khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'dis sangs rgyas bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi mnyes par byas shing / bsti
437b6(mdo sde): stang byas| ri mo byas/ mchod pa byas nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi drung du tshangs par spyod pa spyad do/ /chos yongs su btsal ba la'ang brtson par gyur to/ /rgyal po
437b7(mdo sde): chen po| de sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag nyid chen po 'di thob bo/ /rgyal po chen po/ de ltar na/ las nag po dang / dkar po dag chud za bar 'gyur ba med do/ /rgyal po
438a1(mdo sde): chen po| de lta bas na/ mkhas pas lus kyi las dang / ngag gi las dang / yid kyi las bsdam par bya ste/ srog gi phyir yang sdig pa'i las mi bya'o/ /
438a2(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das la yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyas gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' lha bzang zhes bgyi bar gyur
438a3(mdo sde): pa des/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob lags sam/ 'on te da dung du'ang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
438a4(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha bzang de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na tshangs
438a5(mdo sde): par spyad pa spyod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpal 'byung zhes bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis 'di skad ces gsol
438a6(mdo sde): to| |bcom ldan 'das| rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos gus par bgyis te/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la bsnyen par bgyi'o/ /bsten par bgyi'o/ /bsnyen
438a7(mdo sde): bkur bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen cing bsten te bsnyen bkur bgyis na/ dge ba'i chos 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /
438b1(mdo sde): dge ba'i chos thob pas bsam pa dge bar 'gyur ro/ /bsam pa dge bas sbyor ba dge bar 'gyur ro/ /sbyor ba dge bas dge ba'i las bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /las dge bas 'gro ba dge
438b2(mdo sde): par mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /'gro ba dge bas dge ba'i grogs po mgu bar bgyid do/ /grogs po dge bas sdig pa'i las mi bgyid do/ /bgyid par mi 'gyur ro/ /sdig pa ma bgyis shing dge
438b3(mdo sde): ba'i las bgyis pas bdag la gdung bar mi 'gyur/ gzhan la gdung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /bdag dang gzhan rjes su bsrungs pas byang chub kyi lam yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /
438b4(mdo sde): byang chub kyi lam la gnas pas lam ngan par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams kyi don bgyid nus pa dang / skal ba mchis pa dang / mthu dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das
438b5(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/ /legs so/ /legs so/ /khyod kyis tshig 'di legs par smras so/ /rgyal po chen po/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten te/ byang chub sems dpa'
438b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po yon tan gyi chos nyid thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan
438b7(mdo sde): 'das| byang chub sems dpa' chos du dang ldan na/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / zab mo'i chos rnams la'ang bzod
439a1(mdo sde): pa thob par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khye'u byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
439a2(mdo sde): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / zab mo'i chos rnams la'ang bzod pa thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shes pa la 'jug pa dang /
439a3(mdo sde): chad pa dang rtag pa rnam par spong ba dang / sems can med pa dang / srog med pa dang / gang zag med par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid la mos shing / stong pa nyid spyod yul ba ste/ byang
439a4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / zab mo'i chos rnams la'ang
439a5(mdo sde): bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /khye'u/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
439a6(mdo sde): 'tshang rgya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sngon gyi mtha' dben pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' mi 'pho ba dang / da ltar byung ba 'jig par shes pa dang / dus gsum mnyam pa nyid de/ bzhi po de dag
439a7(mdo sde): go / gzhan yang bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ lus dben pa dang / sems dben pa dang / chos dben pa dang / las dben pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go /gzhan yang bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/
439b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas la chos nyid du mthong gi /gzugs su ma yin pa dang / chos la 'dod chags dang bral bar mthong gi /yi ge dang / nges pa'i tshig tu ma yin pa dang / dge 'dun la 'dus ma
439b2(mdo sde): byas su mthong gi / tshogs su ma yin pa dang / shes rab kyi mig yongs su dag par 'gyur ba ste/ bzhi po de dag go /gzhan yang bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bsdu ba'i dngos po mi gtong
439b3(mdo sde): bas pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / thabs shes pa la mkhas pa dang / sems can med par rnam par dpyod pa dang / snying rje chen po ste/ khye'u/ byang chub sems
439b4(mdo sde): dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / zab mo'i chos rnams la'ang bzod par 'gyur
439b5(mdo sde): ro| |bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhi pa sgrub pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa mi skye ba'i chos la bzod par thob par gyur te/ de dga' ba dang / mchog tu
439b6(mdo sde): dga' ba de nyid kyis ta la bdun srid tsam du steng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /'di ni/ sangs rgyas bcom
439b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od 'phro ba kha dog sna tshogs/ kha dog du ma byung ba 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang /
440a1(mdo sde): ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / le brgan dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu ste/ kha dog du ma de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu
440a2(mdo sde): med pa snang bar byas te/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par byung nas/ zla ba dang nyi ma rnams kyi 'od mog mog por byas te slar log nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i
440a3(mdo sde): gtsug tu nub bo/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das
440a4(mdo sde): ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar pa btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis don de zhus pa/ blta sdug bltar 'os gzugs dang mtshan rnams dang /
440a5(mdo sde): dpe byad bzang po rnams kyis rab mdzes shing / /'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'od kyis 'od mdzad pa/ /'dzum pa mdzad de bdag la bstan du gsol/ /tshul khrims 'phags shing spyod
440a6(mdo sde): pa legs spyad pa/ /ting 'dzin shes rab bsags pa'i ye shes 'od/ /rnam grol snying po stobs ldan yang dag gzigs/ /'dzum pa mdzad de bdag la bstan du gsol/ /bzod
440a7(mdo sde): pa'i stobs ldan stobs kyi shugs mnga' ba/ /brtson 'grus mngon par 'phags te mi bskyod pa/ /mig tu sdug cing bden pa bzhi gzigs pa/ /'dzum pa mdzad de bdag la
440b1(mdo sde): bstan du gsol/ /rdo rje'i sku mnga' sra brtan mi shigs pa/ /sred med bu mthu sred med bu bas mchog /tshangs dbyangs sgra snyan 'jam pa'i dbyangs ldan pa/ /'dzum pa mdzad de bdag la bstan
440b2(mdo sde): du gsol/ /bzhugs kyang tshangs dang de bzhin lha tshogs kyis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyi gtsug ma mthong / /gus dang bcas pas kun nas lta bgyid pa/ /'dzum pa mdzad de bdag la
440b3(mdo sde): bstan du gsol/ /khyod kyis chos kyi 'khor lo dam pa bskor/ /mi rtag sgras ni lha dang lha min dang / /de bzhin klu dang gnod sbyin rab bskyod pa/ /'dzum pa mdzad de bdag la bstan du gsol//
440b4(mdo sde): snang ba brnyes shing mun pa rnam bral ba/ /kun nas spyan mnga' mnyam pa nyid bzhugs pa/ /yon tan mchog mnga' yon tan snying po bstan/ /'dzum pa mdzad de bdag la bstan du gsol//
440b5(mdo sde): de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal do/ /kun dga' bo/ khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa shing ta la bdun srid
440b6(mdo sde): kyi steng gi bar snang la 'dug pa 'di mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mthong lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
440b7(mdo sde): dpa' chen po snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di bskal pa grangs med pa brgya'i 'og tu bskal pa kun tu snang byed ces bya ba la/ 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par sbyong zhes bya bar de bzhin
441a1(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang / zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul
441a2(mdo sde): ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba nyid du 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /kun
441a3(mdo sde): dga' bo/ 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par sbyong ba de ni/ 'di lta bur yongs su dag par 'gyur te/ dper na/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi longs spyod dang / yongs su
441a4(mdo sde): spyod pa lta bur 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de ni/ bar gyi bskal pa nyi shur gnas par 'gyur ro/ /de la nyan thos brgyad khri'i dge 'dun yod par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems
441a5(mdo sde): dpa' sum khri nyis stong gi dge 'dun yod par 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ ci'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya zhing / bskal pa kun tu snang byed ces bya
441a6(mdo sde): bar 'gyur zhe na/ kun dga' bo/ /bar gyi bskal pa brgya stong mang por sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sngon nam yang de bzhin gshegs pa ma byung ste/ der de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba
441a7(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab pa de 'byung bar 'gyur ba de na/ gnas gtsang ma'i rigs kyi lha rnams 'di skad du bskal pa 'di ni/ kun tu snang ba med pa/ kun tu snang ba med pa ste/ de la de
441b1(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa byung ngo / /zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa lung bstan pa brjod pa 'di bshad pa dang /
441b2(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ lha dang mi'i srog chags sum khri nyis stong ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so/ /byang chub sems dpa' drug cu ni/ mi skye
441b3(mdo sde): ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /nyan thos lnga brgya ni/ len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la
441b4(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ khyod kyis nga'i dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba dang / da ltar dang / ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phan gdags pa'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs
441b5(mdo sde): 'di zungs shig / kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung lags na/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/
441b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di las kyi sgrib pa rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba dang / snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas bstan pa zhes bya
441b7(mdo sde): bar zungs shig / kun dga' bo/ gang la la zhig gis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pas zhugs pa la bsti stang byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed/ mchod pa byed cing / me tog gi
442a1(mdo sde): phur ma ri rab tsam gtor ba dang / spos dang / phye ma dang / byug pa dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / lha dang mi'i mchod pa rnam pa mang po
442a2(mdo sde): gzhan dag gis mchod pa bas/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin cing klog la/ kun chub par byed
442a3(mdo sde): cing / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par ston la/ de bzhin du nan tan du byed na/ 'di ni/ bsod nams kyi phung po de bas ches mang du bskyed do/ /kun dga' bo/ de lta bas na/ de bzhin
442a4(mdo sde): gshegs pa chos kyi mchod pas mchod par 'dod pa dang / shes rab kyi snang ba chen po byed par 'dod pas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bya/ bklag par bya/ nan tan gyis bsgrub par
442a5(mdo sde): bya| gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
442a6(mdo sde): dpa' chen po snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal 'khor dang bcas pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang /
442a7(mdo sde): 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la
442b1(mdo sde): mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas bstan pa zhes bya ba chos kyi rnam grangs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhus chen gyi
442b2(mdo sde): lo tsA ba ban+d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ta thA ga tA nA ma bud+d+ha k+She tra gu Nok+ta d+harma par+yA ya/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
442b3(mdo sde): kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom
442b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das yul mnyam dka' na chos kyi dgon pa byang chub kyi snying po na nor bu rdo rjes spras pa'i pad+ma'i snying po'i seng+ge'i khri la bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po sangs
442b5(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang thabs cig go / de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi
442b6(mdo sde): dkyil 'khor 'dus pa de nyid du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 'dus par gyur te 'dug go / de nas byang chub sems dpa'
442b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po 'od bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyal po sangs rgyas kyi mthus stan las langs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad la smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'jig rten
443a1(mdo sde): gyi khams mi mjed kyi bskal pa de ni/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can gyi nyin zhag
443a2(mdo sde): gcig go / kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /gang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can gyi bskal pa de ni/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi
443a3(mdo sde): khams mngon par dga' ba'i nyin zhag gcig go / kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /gang 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba'i bskal pa de ni/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje
443a4(mdo sde): snying pos rab tu 'dul ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams ngur smrig gi rgyal mtshan gyi nyin zhag gcig go / kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /gang 'jig rten gyi khams dur smrig gi rgyal
443a5(mdo sde): mtshan gyi bskal pa de ni/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu rnam par gdon mi za bar pad+mo rab tu rgyas pa'i sku'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams phyir mi ldog
443a6(mdo sde): pa'i 'khor lo dbyangs kyi nyin zhag gcig go / kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /gang 'jig rten gyi khams phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo dbyangs kyi bskal pa de ni/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
443a7(mdo sde): pa chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rdul dang bral ba'i nyin zhag gcig go / kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /gang 'jig rten gyi khams rdul dang bral ba'i bskal pa de ni/ bcom
443b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa seng+ge'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams mar me ldan gyi nyin zhag gcig go / kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /gang 'jig rten gyi khams mar me ldan gyi bskal
443b2(mdo sde): pa de ni| bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams 'od bzang po'i nyin zhag gcig go / kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /gang 'jig rten
443b3(mdo sde): gyi khams 'od bzang po'i bskal pa de ni/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'od zer rab tu rgyas pa'i sku'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams 'da' bar dka' ba'i nyin
443b4(mdo sde): zhag gcig go / kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /gang 'jig rten gyi khams 'da' bar dka' ba'i bskal pa de ni/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par shes pa thams cad blo gros
443b5(mdo sde): 'od zer rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par brgyan gyi nyin zhag gcig go / kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /gang 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par brgyan gyi bskal pa de ni/
443b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i thugs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams me long gi dkyil 'khor dbyangs kyi nyin zhag gcig go /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /gang
443b7(mdo sde): ' jig rten gyi khams brtag cing bgrang ba la 'jug pa'i tshul 'dis sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya stong phrag bcur tshang ba'i rdul phra rab snyed 'das pa'i pha rol na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
444a1(mdo sde): d gra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal bzang po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i sa yongs su spyod
444a2(mdo sde): pa'i khyad par can 'jig rten gyi khams pad+mo dpal gyi nyin zhag gcig go / kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs
444a3(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ngam/ 'dzin tam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston na/ de 'chi
444a4(mdo sde): ba'i dus kyi tshe phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya mtsho rab 'byams dag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams de'i mdun na bzhugs par 'gyur te/ bla na med pa
444a5(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
444a6(mdo sde): kyis gnang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyal po dga' zhing de skad ces smras so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
444a7(mdo sde): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyal pos smras pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa de bzhin
444b1(mdo sde): gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs rdzogs so/ / //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+d+he ye
444b2(mdo sde): shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya maN+Dal aSh+Ta d+har+m+ma par+ya ya nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dkyil 'khor brgyad pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam
444b3(mdo sde): grangs theg pa chen po'i mdo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dge slong gi dge
444b4(mdo sde): 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci
444b5(mdo sde): dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa du mas yongs su bskor te/ mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston to/ /de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' seng+ge'i rgyal po bkod pa zhes bya ba zhig 'khor
444b6(mdo sde): der 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po de mthong nas ltad mor gyur te/ de stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha
444b7(mdo sde): nga sa la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis sangs rgyas
445a1(mdo sde): 'byung ba bye ba khrag khrig phrag du ma zhig 'das na/ gang gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yang bcom ldan 'das kyi ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar ma gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan
445a2(mdo sde): 'das| bdag gi zhu ba bstan pa 'di'i lan stsal du gsol/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag gis thos na'ang dbugs phyin par 'gyur lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan
445a3(mdo sde): 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor yang dag par gzengs bstod pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' seng+ge'i rgyal po bkod pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs
445a4(mdo sde): kyi bu| nyon cig dang / dris pa lan gdab pa dkyil 'khor brgyad pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs gang ngas sngon so so'i skye bo'i dus na kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te lan mang
445a5(mdo sde): du byas pa de bstan par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snang ba bsam gyis mi
445a6(mdo sde): khyab pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/ /de'i dus na khyim bdag drag shul can gyis byin zhes bya ba zhig shin tu ma dad cing yid du mi 'ong ba'i
445a7(mdo sde): chos lnga dang ldan zhing / chos 'dul ba la rgyab kyis phyogs so/ /dge slong rnam par rgyal ba 'byung ba zhes bya ba zhig khyim bdag de la snying brtse ba'i phyir yang dang yang du rgyun mi
445b1(mdo sde): 'chad par khyim bdag de'i khyim du 'gro'o/ /re zhig na dus kyi mthus khyim bdag de dge slong de la rjes su chags pa dang bcas pa'i sems su gyur nas/ re zhig na khyim bdag des
445b2(mdo sde): legs par bya ba'i las kyi 'bras bu dris so/ /de nas dge slong des skye bo mang po la phan pa'i phyir dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba'i phyir dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba'i phyir
445b3(mdo sde): dang / lha dang / mi rnams kyi skye bo phal po che'i don dang / phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir khyim bdag de la dkyil 'khor brgyad pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bstan te/ khyim
445b4(mdo sde): bdag / dkyil 'khor brgyad pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs gang zhe na/ bde ba thams cad sbyin par byed pa'o/ /des 'khor phun sum tshogs pa thob par 'gyur te/ gang dang gang
445b5(mdo sde): du skyes par chos dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ 'khor mang po dang lus phun sum tshogs nas gzugs bzang po nyid thob par 'gyur/ yo byad phun
445b6(mdo sde): sum tshogs pa 'thob par 'gyur te/ btsal mi dgos par yo byad rnams 'byor bar 'gyur/ lus sra zhing brtan la lus phun sum tshogs pa 'thob par 'gyur zhing / de la ri dang
445b7(mdo sde): rtsig pa rnams kyang sgrib par mi byed de/ phun sum tshogs pa bzhi po de dag 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas khyim bdag de dga' zhing mgu la yi rang bar gyur nas/ dge slong de'i rkang pa
446a1(mdo sde): la phyag byas te 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa dkyil 'khor brgyad pa ston cig dang / des bdag la mngon sum du 'gyur ro/ /de nas dge slong
446a2(mdo sde): rnam par rgyal ba 'byung bas khyim bdag de'i bsam pa shes nas yang dag par rab tu bstan te/ rigs kyi bu/ nyon cig dang bstan par bya'o/ /des na lci ba gsar bsres pa'i/ /
446a3(mdo sde): dkyil 'khor gru bzhi lham par bya/ /sems can kun dang thun mong du/ /'das pa'i sangs rgyas gang yin dang / /gang dag ma 'ongs da ltar byung / /byang chub sems
446a4(mdo sde): dpa' nyan thos dang / /rang sangs rgyas dag gang yod pa/ /de dag rnams la yongs su bsngo/ /de nas dkyil 'khor yug dgu /'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams
446a5(mdo sde): bya ste| |'jig rten dbang dang byams pa dang / /thub pa skyes mchog nam mkha' dang / /kun tu bzang po blo ldan dang / /gsang ba pa yi bdag po dang / /'jam dpal
446a6(mdo sde): gzhon nur gyur pa dang / /sgrib pa thams cad rnam sel dang / /de bzhin sa yi snying po ste/ /de dag gi ched du dkyil 'khor brgyad bya'o/ /khyim bdag /'di ni/ dkyil
446a7(mdo sde): 'khor brgyad pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs yin te/ 'di ni/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa de las mngon
446b1(mdo sde): sum du thos so/ /khyim bdag gzhan yang nyon cig /kun nas skal pa mthun pa yi/ /'khor rnams gang zhig 'dod pa des/ /dkyil 'khor brgyad ni 'dri bar bya/ /gang
446b2(mdo sde): zhig brgya byin nyid dang ni/ /tshangs pa'i 'jig rten bdag po dang / /lha mi rgyal po'i rgyal srid dang / /blo ldan sna tshogs gzugs bzang 'dod/ /rtag tu dkyil 'khor
446b3(mdo sde): mchog brgyad bya/ /seng+ge'i rgyal po bkod pa/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe dge slong rnam par rgyal ba 'byung ba zhes bya ba de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du 'dzin na/ de ltar mi blta
446b4(mdo sde): ste| 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong rnam par rgyal ba 'byung ba zhes bya bar gyur to/ /seng+ge'i rgyal po bkod pa/ de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag drag
446b5(mdo sde): shul can gyis byin pa zhes bya ba de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du som nyi'am yid gnyis za na/ de ltar mi blta ste/ nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na drag shul can gyis byin pa zhes bya
446b6(mdo sde): ba'i khyim bdag tu gyur to/ /ngas pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byas pa'i bar dang / sangs rgyas nyid thob kyi bar du tshe rabs bye ba khrag khrig 'bum de dang de dag tu chos
446b7(mdo sde): 'di kun tu bsten to/ /bsgoms so/ /mang du byas so/ /rigs kyi bu/ gang gis na/ nga'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor bkod pa 'di 'dra bar gyur ba'i rgyu ni/ de yin no/ /rkyen ni/ de yin no/ /
447a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' seng+ge'i rgyal po bkod pa dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa'
447a2(mdo sde): de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon
447a3(mdo sde): par bstod do/ /'phags pa dkyil 'khor brgyad pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / zhu chen gyi lots+tsha
447a4(mdo sde): ba ban+d+he ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ / //
